SA10canprasu:13: nāgārjunāya praṇipatya tasmai tatkārikāṇāṃ vivṛtiṃ kariṣye /
SA10canprasu:15: tatra 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām';
SA10canprasu:23: tadaviparītasaṃprakāśatvena māhātmyamudbhāvya tatsvabhāvāvyatirekavartine paramagurave tathāgatāya śāstrapraṇayananimittakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kartukāma āha-
SA10canprasu:56: samutpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārtha iti samutpādaśabdaḥ prādurbhāve vartate /
SA10canprasu:61: ityevaṃ taddhitāntamityaśabdaṃ vyutpādya prati prati ityānāṃ vināśināṃ samutpāda iti varṇayanti /
SA10canprasu:63: “yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharma paśyati” ityevamādau viṣaye vīpsārthasya saṃbhavāt samāsasadbhāvācca syājjyāyasī vyutpattiḥ /
SA10canprasu:64_0: iha tu “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam” ityevamādau viṣaye sākṣādaṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe
SA10canprasu:70_0: taddhitānte cetyaśabde “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam” ityatra
SA10canprasu:70_1: pratītyaśabdasyāvyayatvābhāvāt samāsāsadbhāvācca vibhaktiśrutau satyāṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya
SA10canprasu:70_2: vijñānaṃ rūpāṇi ca iti nipātaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:77: tāṃstān pratyayān pratītya samutpādaḥ prāpya saṃbhava ityeke /
SA10canprasu:78: prati prati vināśināmutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityanye“- iti paravyākhyānamanūdya dūṣaṇamabhidhatte,
SA10canprasu:86: tena idānīṃ prāpya saṃbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityevaṃ vyutpāditena pratītyasamutpādaśabdena yadi niravaśeṣasaṃbhavipadārthaparāmarśo vivakṣitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:87: tadā tāṃ tāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya saṃbhava pratītya samutpāda iti vīpsāsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate /
SA10canprasu:89: tadā cakṣuḥ prāpya rūpāṇi ceti na vīpsāyāḥ saṃbandha iti //
SA10canprasu:93: ayuktametat “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam” iti,
SA10canprasu:97: kathamanenaiva tatprāpteḥ saṃbhava iti yuktyanupādānena pratijñāmātratvāt /
SA10canprasu:120: asminsatīdaṃ bhavati hrasve dīrghaṃ yathā sati /
SA10canprasu:125: tataśca yadeva dūṣyate tadevābhyupagamyate iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:128: tadevaṃ hetupratyayāpekṣaṃ bhāvānāmutpādaṃ paridīpayatā bhagavatā ahetvekahetuviṣamahetusaṃbhūtatvaṃ svaparobhayakṛtatvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhavati,
SA10canprasu:129: tanniṣedhācca sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāvasthitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamudbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:130: sa evedānīṃ sāṃvṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvād āryajñānāpekṣayā nāsminnirodho vidyate yāvannāsminnirgamo vidyate ityanirodhādibhiraṣṭābhirviśe ṣaṇairviśiṣyate /
SA10canprasu:131: yathā ca nirodhādayo na santi pratītyasamutpādasya tathā sakalaśāstreṇa pratipādayiṣyati //
SA10canprasu:134: prapañcānāmupaśamo 'sminniti sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ prapaḥcopaśama ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:136: yathābhihitaviśeṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādasya deśanākriyayā īpsitatamatvāt karmaṇā nirdeśaḥ //
SA10canprasu:141_1: paśyan sarvaparapravādāṃśca bālapralāpānivāvetya atīva prasādānugata ācāryo bhūyo
SA10canprasu:142: atra ca nirodhasya pūrvaṃ prativedhaḥ utpādanirodhayoḥ paurvāparyāvasthāyāḥ siddhayabhāvaṃ dyotayitum /
SA10canprasu:146: iti / tasmānnāyaṃ niyamo yat pūrvamutpādena bhavitavyaṃ paścānnirodheneti //
SA10canprasu:147: idānīmanirodhādiviśiṣṭapratītyasamutpādapratipipādayiṣayā utpādapratiṣedhena nirodhādi pratiṣedhasaukarya manyamāna ācāryaḥ prathamamevotpādaprativedhamārabhate /
SA10canprasu:148: utpādo hi paraiḥ parikalpyamānaḥ svato vā parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:153: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10canprasu:154: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana // 3 //
SA10canprasu:157: kvacanaśabda ādhāravacanaḥ kvacicchabdaparyāyaḥ kecanaśabda ādheyavacanaḥ kecicchabdaparyāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:158: tataścaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ- naiva svata utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:161: nanu ca- naiva svata utpannā ityavadhāryamāṇe parata utpannā ityaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti /
SA10canprasu:164: yayā copapattyā svata utpādo na saṃbhavati, sā-
SA10canprasu:165: tasmāddhi tasya bhavane na guṇo 'sti kaścij-
SA10canprasu:166: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
SA10canprasu:171: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ padārthānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamasti /
SA10canprasu:176: prasaṅga vākyatvācca prakṛtārthaviparyayeṇa viparītārthasādhyataddharmavyaktau parasmādutpannābhāvājanmasāphalyāt janmaniro(bo?)
SA10canprasu:184: pṛcchayate- svata iti hetutvena tadeva cotpadyate iti?
SA10canprasu:185: na ca vidyamānasya punarutpattau prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ,
SA10canprasu:187: na ca tvayā utpannasya punarutpāda iṣyate 'navasthā cāpyaniṣṭeti /
SA10canprasu:189: kimiti codite paronābhyupaiti yato hetudṛṣṭāntopādānasāphalyaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:193: tasmātsarvathā priyānumānatāmevātmanaḥ ācāryaḥ prakaṭayati asthāne 'pyanumānaṃ praveśayan /
SA10canprasu:194: na ca mādhyamikasya sataḥ svatantramanumānaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ pakṣāntarābhyupagamābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:200: yadi kācana pratijñā syānme tata eva me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:201: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ //
SA10canprasu:205: tadā kutaḥ “nādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni” iti svatantrā pratijñā yasyāṃ sāṃkhyāḥ pratyavasthāpyante /
SA10canprasu:206: ko 'rya pratijñārthaḥ kiṃ kāryātmakatvātsvata uta kāraṇātmakatvāditi /
SA10canprasu:210: kuto 'smākaṃ vidyamānatvāditi heturyasya siddhasādhanaṃ viruddhārthatā vā syāt,
SA10canprasu:211: yasya siddhasādhanasya yasyāśca viruddhārthatāyāḥ parihārārthaṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:213_1: svata utpattipratiṣedhapratijñātārthasādhanaṃ mā bhūdubhayasiddhena vānumānena parapratijñānirākaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:214: parapratijñāyāstu svata evānumānavirodhacodanayā svata eva pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntadoṣarahitaiḥ pakṣādibhirbhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:215: tataśca tadanabhidhānāt taddoṣāparihārācca sa eva doṣa iti /
SA10canprasu:220: tena svaniścayavadanyeṣāṃ niścayotpādanecchayā yayā upapattyā asāvartho 'dhigataḥ saivopapattiḥ parasmai upadeṣṭavyā /
SA10canprasu:224_1: iti nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagamāt svātmānamevāyaṃ kevalaṃ visaṃvādayan na śaknoti
SA10canprasu:225: idamevāsya spaṣṭataraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ yaduta svapratijñātārthasādhanāsāmarthyamiti kimatrānumānabādhodbhāvanayā prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:231: atra hi tadityanena svātmanā vidyamānasya parāmarśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:234: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamiti /
SA10canprasu:235: anena ca vākyena sādhyasādhanadharmānugatasya paraprasiddhasya sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasyopādānam /
SA10canprasu:245: iha hi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ puro 'vasthitaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ punarutpādānapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:246: tathā ca mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthāyāmapi yadi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādikamiti manyase,
SA10canprasu:247: tadāpi tasya svātmanā vidyamānasya nāstyutpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:248: evaṃ svātmanā vidyamānatvena upanayābhivyaktena punarutpādapratiṣedhāvyabhicāriṇā hetunā svata eva sāṃkhyasyānumānavirodhodbhāvanamanuṣṭhitameveti /
SA10canprasu:250: na ca kevalaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:253: sāṃkhyā hi naiva abhivyaktarūpasya puro 'vasthitasya ghaṭasya punarabhivyaktimicchanti /
SA10canprasu:256: anabhivyaktarūpasya ca śaktirūpāpannasya utpattipratiṣedhaviśiṣṭasādhyatvāt kutaḥ siddhasādhanapakṣadoṣāśaṅkā,
SA10canprasu:261: athavā / ayamanyaḥ prayogamārgaḥ- puruṣavyatiriktāḥ padārthāḥ svata utpattivādinaḥ /
SA10canprasu:266: yadyapi ca abhivyaktivādina utpādapratiṣedho na bādhakaḥ,
SA10canprasu:267: tathāpi abhivyaktāvutpādaśabdaṃ nipātya pūrvaṃ paścācca anupalabdhyupalabdhisādharmyeṇa utpādaśabdenābhivyakterevābhidhānādayaṃ pratiṣedho na abādhakaḥ //
SA10canprasu:268: kathaṃ punarayaṃ yathoktārthābhidhānaṃ vinā vyastavicāro labhyata iti cet, taducyate /
SA10canprasu:271: tāni ca vyākhyāyamānāni yathoktamarthātmānaṃ prasūyanta iti nātra kiṃcidanupāttaṃ saṃbhāvyate //
SA10canprasu:275: parasya ca yāvadbahavo doṣāḥ prasaṅgaviparītāpattyā āpadyante,
SA10canprasu:277: kuto nu khalu aviparītācāryanāgārjunamatānusāriṇaḥ ācāryabuddhapālitasya sāvakāśavacanābhidhāyitvam,
SA10canprasu:281: na hi śabdāḥ dāṇḍapāśikā iva vaktāramasvatantrayanti,
SA10canprasu:284: tathā ca ācāryo bhūyasā prasaṅgāpattimukhenaiva parapakṣaṃ nirākaroti sma / tadyathā-
SA10canprasu:290: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10canprasu:291: ityādinā / atha arthavākyatvādācāryavākyānāṃ mahārthatve sati anekaprayoniṣpattihetutvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:299: tatra yattāvadevamuktam- atra prayogavākyaṃ bhavati- na paramārthataḥ ādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni,
SA10canprasu:308: “sa cāyaṃ bījahetuko 'ṅkura utpadyamāno na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto nāpyahetusamutpanno niśvarakālāṇuprakṛtisvabhāvasaṃbhūtaḥ” iti /
SA10canprasu:310: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:311: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanucchedaaśāśvatadharmatā //
SA10canprasu:313: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:320: satyadvayāviparītadarśanaparibhraṣṭā eva hi tīrthikā yāvadubhayathāpi niṣidhyante tāvad guṇa eva saṃbhāvyata iti /
SA10canprasu:324: loko hi svataḥ parata ityevamādikaṃ vicāramanavatārya kāraṇātkāryamutpadyate ityetāvanmātraṃ pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:327: api ca / yadi saṃvṛtyā utpattipratiṣedhanirācikīrṣuṇā viśeṣaṇametadupādīyate,
SA10canprasu:333: sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthata utpattipratiṣedhād utpattipratiṣedhaviśeṣaṇe paramārthagrahaṇamiti cet,
SA10canprasu:334: evaṃ tarhi evameva vaktavyaṃ syāt- sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthato nāstyutpattiriti /
SA10canprasu:337: prajñaptisatāmanabhyupagamāt parato 'siddhādhāraḥ pakṣadoṣaḥ syāditi na yuktametat //
SA10canprasu:338: atha syāt- yathā anityaḥ śabda iti dharmadharmisāmānyameva gṛhyate na viśeṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:340: tathā hi- yadi cāturmahābhautikaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:344: tathā vaiśeṣikasya śabdānityatāṃ pratijānānasya yadi kāryaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:361: yadā ca aviparyāsādabhūtaṃ nādhyāropitaṃ vitaimirikeṇeva keśādi,
SA10canprasu:368: ato viduṣāmaviparītāvasthāyāṃ viparītasyāsaṃbhavātkutaḥ sāṃvṛtaṃ cakṣuḥ yasya dharmitvaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:374: tatra hi śabdasāmānyamanityatāsāmānyaṃ ca avivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ dvayorapi saṃvidyate /
SA10canprasu:375: na tvevaṃ cakṣuḥ sāmānyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāvādibhyāṃ saṃvṛtyā aṅgīkṛtaṃ nāpi paramārthataḥ /
SA10canprasu:385: asya paropakṣiptasya sādhanasyedaṃ dūṣaṇamabhihitamanena- ko hi bhavatāmabhipreto 'tra hetvarthaḥ?
SA10canprasu:393: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate //
SA10canprasu:395: tataśca paramārthato nirvartyanirvartakatvāsiddheḥ asiddhārthatā viruddhārthatā vā hetoriti //
SA10canprasu:397: tasmātsarveṣvevānumāneṣu vastu dharmopanyastahetukeṣu svata evaṃ hetvādīnāmasiddhatvāt sarvāṇyeva sādhanāni vyāhanyante /
SA10canprasu:401: athavā- na pare paramārthena vivakṣitāḥ cakṣurādyādhyātmikāyatananirvartakāḥ pratyayā iti pratīyante,
SA10canprasu:405: yathā cānena- utpannā eva ādhyātmikā bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:407: atha samāhitasya yoginaḥ prajñācakṣuṣā bhāvayāthātmyaṃ paśyataḥ utpādagatyādayaḥ santi paramārthata iti sādhyate,
SA10canprasu:413: na paramārthataḥ sabhāgaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati,
SA10canprasu:425: utāho ghaṭādivat svata utpadyantāmiti ghaṭādīnāṃ sādhyasamatvānnānaikāntikateti cet,
SA10canprasu:429: evaṃ svānumāneṣvapi yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅge sati sa eva asiddhādhārāsiddhahetvādidoṣaḥ prāpnoti,
SA10canprasu:431: na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti sarvametaddūṣaṇamayuktaṃ jāyata iti /
SA10canprasu:435: tathā hi- paraḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:438: tasmād yatra yatra svātmādarśanaṃ tatra tatra paradarśanamapi nāsti,
SA10canprasu:442: tataśca svātmādarśanaviruddhaṃ nīlādiparadarśanaṃ svaprasiddhenaivānumānena virudhyata iti etāvanmātramasmadanūmānairudbhāvyata iti kuto 'smatpakṣe yathoktadoṣāvatāraḥ,
SA10canprasu:448: kadāciddhi loke arthipratyarthibhyāṃ pramāṇīkṛtasya sākṣiṇo vacanena jayo bhavati parājayo vā,
SA10canprasu:450: paravacanena tu na jayo nāpi parājayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:454: ata eva kaiściduktam- na parataḥ prasiddhibalādanumānabādhā,
SA10canprasu:459: tenāpi laukikīṃ vyavasthāmanurudhyamānena anumāne yathokta eva nyāyo 'bhyupeyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:460: tathā hi nobhayaprasiddhena vā āgamena bādhā,
SA10canprasu:470: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10canprasu:472: tataśca parābhāvādeva nāpi parata utpadyante / api ca-
SA10canprasu:479: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- na parata utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:480: sarvataḥ sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- tadatra prasaṅgavākyatvāt sādhyasādhanaviparyayaṃ kṛtvā,
SA10canprasu:481: svataḥ ubhayataḥ ahetuto vā utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:486: pūrvameva pratipāditatvād dūṣaṇāntaḥpātitvācca parapratijñātārthadūṣaṇeneti yatkiṃcidetaditi na punaryatna āsthīyate //
SA10canprasu:490: syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi / iti //
SA10canprasu:492: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:499: atrācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- atrāpi prasaṅgavākyatvāt yadi viparītasādhyasādhanavyaktivākyārtha iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:500: tadā etaduktaṃ bhavati- hetuta utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:513: yattarhi bhagavatoktam- avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā avidyānirodhātsaṃskāranirodha iti, tathā-
SA10canprasu:516: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhaḥ //
SA10canprasu:517: tathā- utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
SA10canprasu:518: eko dharmaḥ sattvasthitaye yaduta catvāra āhārāḥ,
SA10canprasu:519: dvau dharmau lokaṃ pālayato hrīścāpatrāpyaṃ cetyādi,
SA10canprasu:529: tattvadarśanāpekṣayā tūktaṃ bhagavatā- etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
SA10canprasu:531: tathā- nāstyatra tathatā vā avitathatā vā /
SA10canprasu:540: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:543: yasyaivaṃ deśanābhiprāyānabhijñatayā saṃdehaḥ syāt- kā hyatra deśanā tattvārthā,
SA10canprasu:546: tayorubhayorapi vineyajanayoḥ ācāryo yuktyāgamābhyāṃ saṃśayamithyājñānāpākaraṇārthaṃ śāstramidamārabdhavān //
SA10canprasu:550: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā //
SA10canprasu:563: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥ sattvanirjīvaniḥ pudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāḥ ta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
SA10canprasu:568: yasmin punaḥ pudgalasattvapūruṣā neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:570: nanu ca- utpādādīnāmabhāve sati yadi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvapratipādanārthamidamārabdhavānācāryaḥ nanvevaṃ sati yanmṛṣā na tadastīti na santyakuśalāni karmāṇi,
SA10canprasu:577: saṃvṛtisatyavyapekṣayā lokasya idaṃsatyābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛṣārthatā bhāvānāṃ pratipādyate 'smābhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:578: naiva tvāryāḥ kṛtakāryāḥ kiṃcidupalabhante yanmṛṣā amṛṣā vā syāditi /
SA10canprasu:580: yena hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ parijñātaṃ kiṃ tasya karmāṇi santi,
SA10canprasu:582: na cāpyasau kasyaciddharmassya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vopalabhate /
SA10canprasu:584: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA10canprasu:586: yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
SA10canprasu:600: kiṃ punaḥ- mṛṣāsvabhāvā api padārthāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:604: tadyathā kulaputra māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaścidrāgaparītacittāḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakrāmet,
SA10canprasu:611: tathā mṛṣāsvabhāvā api bhāvā bālānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti //
SA10canprasu:613: atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni /
SA10canprasu:614: atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo gacchanti sma,
SA10canprasu:615: tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma //
SA10canprasu:616: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau] tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
SA10canprasu:621: tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe /
SA10canprasu:622: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
SA10canprasu:624: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:628: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha?
SA10canprasu:629: tānyavocan- na te 'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
SA10canprasu:631: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmanto mā kalpayata,
SA10canprasu:633: yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha,
SA10canprasu:653: bhikṣūnetadavocat- kutrāyuṣmanto gatāḥ kuto vāgatāḥ te 'vocan- na kvacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha- ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā?
SA10canprasu:658: āhuḥ- yasya na kāyo na cittam /
SA10canprasu:665: āha- kiyaccireṇāyuṣmantaḥ parinirvāsyanti āhuḥ- yadā tathāgatanirmitāḥ parinirvāsyanti /
SA10canprasu:675: āhuḥ- na kāyena na vācā na manasā /
SA10canprasu:684: iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
SA10canprasu:685: dvātriṃśataśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurviśuddham / iti //
SA10canprasu:686: ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti //
SA10canprasu:688: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate /
SA10canprasu:689: sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ /
SA10canprasu:690: evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:691: sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:692: api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti,
SA10canprasu:694: atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti /
SA10canprasu:695: tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam /
SA10canprasu:700: tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta svabhāvasaṃbhūtāḥ?
SA10canprasu:701: āha- svavikalpenaiva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanāṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokaṃ saṃjānanti /
SA10canprasu:702: te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu //
SA10canprasu:703: yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham /
SA10canprasu:704: tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
SA10canprasu:705: sa tatra kvathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt /
SA10canprasu:706: sa tatra kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ tŌṣvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayet /
SA10canprasu:707: sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta /
SA10canprasu:708: sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ- aho duḥkham,
SA10canprasu:711: atha tasya mitrajñāti sālohitāḥ paripṛccheyuḥ- kena tatte duḥkhamiti /
SA10canprasu:712: sa tān mitrajñātisālohitānevaṃ vadet- nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhūtam /
SA10canprasu:713: sa tānākrośet paribhāṣet- ahaṃ ca nāma nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmi /
SA10canprasu:714: yūyaṃ ca me uttari paripṛcchatha kenaitattava duḥkhamiti /
SA10canprasu:715: atha te mitrajñātisālohitāstaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ- mā bhairmoḥ puruṣa /
SA10canprasu:721: tadyathā bhagavan sa puruṣo 'satsamāropeṇa suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt,
SA10canprasu:722: evameva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanā asadbhāgaparyavanaddhāḥ strīnimittaṃ kalpayanti /
SA10canprasu:723: te strīnimittaṃ kalpayitvā tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ ramamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti /
SA10canprasu:727: tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti /
SA10canprasu:730: sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti //
SA10canprasu:731: tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti- mā bhaiḥ,
SA10canprasu:735: evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti- nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ /
SA10canprasu:744: te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti /
SA10canprasu:747: te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti /
SA10canprasu:751: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
SA10canprasu:752: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
SA10canprasu:753: na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:754: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
SA10canprasu:756: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
SA10canprasu:757: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:758: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ //
SA10canprasu:759: tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam //
SA10canprasu:760: yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam //
SA10canprasu:761: atrāha- yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ,
SA10canprasu:762: tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:768: idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:774: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10canprasu:781: atra kecitparicodayanti- anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ?
SA10canprasu:783: tadedaṃ vaktavyam- kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi,
SA10canprasu:784: kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti /
SA10canprasu:788: anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti /
SA10canprasu:789: yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati,
SA10canprasu:791: yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ- anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
SA10canprasu:793: atha te nāsti niścayo 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti,
SA10canprasu:805: kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati- svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ //
SA10canprasu:807: kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām- na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:816: kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ,
SA10canprasu:818: yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante,
SA10canprasu:821: devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet- santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā /
SA10canprasu:822: te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ /
SA10canprasu:823: evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ /
SA10canprasu:825: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam,
SA10canprasu:827: yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam,
SA10canprasu:838: gantṛgantavyagamanādiko 'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham //
SA10canprasu:839: atha syāt- eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti,
SA10canprasu:844: yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt,
SA10canprasu:849: tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:851: kiṃ ca / yadi svasāmānyalakṣaṇadvayānurodhena pramāṇadvayamuktaṃ yasya tallakṣaṇadvayam,
SA10canprasu:853: yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
SA10canprasu:855: tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
SA10canprasu:861: iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:863: tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo 'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ //
SA10canprasu:864: atha syāt- jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:866: tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:867: tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca (Pp_21)
SA10canprasu:869: vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti /
SA10canprasu:871: tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ //
SA10canprasu:872: atha syāt- yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya karmāstyeva,
SA10canprasu:874: evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt,
SA10canprasu:876: tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam- kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:878: atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:881: tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā satyāmastyeva prameyāntarbhāva iti, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:882: vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate,
SA10canprasu:885: tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ?
SA10canprasu:896: tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum,
SA10canprasu:898: evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
SA10canprasu:899: tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva nānyā /
SA10canprasu:900: tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā tathatāṃ na ca nirodhayati /
SA10canprasu:901: tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati /
SA10canprasu:905: kiṃ ca / bhedena vā tallakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyātsyādabhedena vā?
SA10canprasu:918: na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti /
SA10canprasu:921: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // iti //
SA10canprasu:924: avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati /
SA10canprasu:928: iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti /
SA10canprasu:930: api ca / yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede, kaḥ kartā?
SA10canprasu:931: na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva /
SA10canprasu:938: ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt /
SA10canprasu:943: jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam /
SA10canprasu:945: atha syāt- anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti,
SA10canprasu:955: śarīraśiraḥśabdayohi buddhayādipāṇyādivatsahabhāvipadārthāntarasāpekṣatāpravṛttau śarīraśiraḥ śabdamātrālambano buddhayupajananaḥ sahacāripadārthāntarasākāṅkṣa eva vartate,
SA10canprasu:960: iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:963: na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:971: yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:974: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:976: tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ /
SA10canprasu:981: kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:985: kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti /
SA10canprasu:988: yā? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ,
SA10canprasu:991_1: vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim /
SA10canprasu:1000: śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1001: yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam /
SA10canprasu:1002: kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat //
SA10canprasu:1005: tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:1006: evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:1010: sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ /
SA10canprasu:1011: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu- na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1017: lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:1018: nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām / yathoktam-
SA10canprasu:1020: vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:1026: sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate /
SA10canprasu:1031: pratigatamakṣamasminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:1032: tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:1033: yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati,
SA10canprasu:1034: tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1036: atha syāt- yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati cakṣurvijñānamiti,
SA10canprasu:1038: tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:1039: dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
SA10canprasu:1042: vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1044: tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti /
SA10canprasu:1045: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA10canprasu:1046_0: iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva
SA10canprasu:1046_1: tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate /
SA10canprasu:1047_0: prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ
SA10canprasu:1047_1: pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā
SA10canprasu:1048: loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite 'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:1052: yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1054: ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:1055: ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt //
SA10canprasu:1058: laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate /
SA10canprasu:1059: cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt,
SA10canprasu:1060: pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat /
SA10canprasu:1061: tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
SA10canprasu:1063: ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha /
SA10canprasu:1068: sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā //
SA10canprasu:1070: tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti- satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ,
SA10canprasu:1072: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti /
SA10canprasu:1075: laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā // 3 //
SA10canprasu:1076: atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ- yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti,
SA10canprasu:1085: tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1100: ata evāvadhārayati- pratyayo nāsti pañcama iti /
SA10canprasu:1102: atrocyate- naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1103: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10canprasu:1105: iti / yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1116: athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt //
SA10canprasu:1120: tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:1124: tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate- na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti /
SA10canprasu:1132: sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet /
SA10canprasu:1135: iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:1141: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
SA10canprasu:1144: kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā /
SA10canprasu:1149: atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:1152: ata evāha- kriyā na pratyayavatī iti /
SA10canprasu:1161: na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate /
SA10canprasu:1167: tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ?
SA10canprasu:1168: atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate-
SA10canprasu:1175: evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1176: atrāha- kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa?
SA10canprasu:1177: yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante,
SA10canprasu:1183: yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante,
SA10canprasu:1184: nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ?
SA10canprasu:1185: apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya /
SA10canprasu:1186: atha matam- pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti,
SA10canprasu:1188: yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:1189: tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati /
SA10canprasu:1191: kiṃ ca / iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya kalpyeran, asato vā?
SA10canprasu:1195: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim // 8 //
SA10canprasu:1196: asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:1202: evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate //
SA10canprasu:1208: syāddhetupratyayo yadi tasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1209: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10canprasu:1210: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:1233: ayaṃ ca vidyamānānāṃ vā parikalpyeta avidyamānānāṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:1237: athaivamanālambane dharme svātmanā prasiddhe kimasya ālambanayogena parikalpitena,
SA10canprasu:1238: ityanālambana evāyaṃ san vidyamāno dharmaḥ cittādikaḥ kevalaṃ sālambana ityucyate bhavadbhiḥ svamanīṣikayā,
SA10canprasu:1249: tenāyamarthaḥ- athaivamanālambane dharme 'sati avidyamāne bhūyaḥ kuta ālambanam?
SA10canprasu:1258: tenaivaṃ pāṭhaḥ- niruddhe ca pratyayaḥ kaḥ?
SA10canprasu:1262: atra vicāryate- anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kāryabhūteṣvaṅkurādiṣu nirodho nopapadyate kāraṇasya bījādeḥ /
SA10canprasu:1266: evaṃ sati niruddha bīje abhāvībhūte aṅkurasya kaḥ pratyayaḥ?
SA10canprasu:1268: ubhayametadahetukamityāha- niruddhe ca kaḥ pratyaya iti /
SA10canprasu:1270: tena anutpanne cāṅkure bījādīnāṃ nirodhe iṣyamāṇe 'pyubhayametadahetukamapadyata iti nānantaramato yuktam /
SA10canprasu:1272: na svato nāpi parata ityādinā utpādo niṣiddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:1281: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1285: bhāvānāṃ ca pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvābhāve kutastada yadasminniti kāraṇatvena vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:1288: atrāha- tantvādibhyaḥ paṭādikamupalabhya paṭādestantvādayaḥ pratyayā iti /
SA10canprasu:1294: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat // 13 //
SA10canprasu:1295: tatra vyasteṣu tantuturīvematasaraśalākādiṣu pratyayeṣu paṭo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1305: apratyayebhyo 'pi vīraṇādibhyaḥ kasmānnābhipravartate paṭa iti nāsti phalapravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ // 14 //
SA10canprasu:1306: atrāha- yadi anyat phalaṃ syādanye ca pratyayāḥ,
SA10canprasu:1307: tadā kiṃ pratyayeṣu phalamasti nāstīti cintā syāt /
SA10canprasu:1318: te hi aṃśumayā aṃśuvikārā na svabhāvasiddhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1332: tathā ca bhavān bravīti- yadi asat phalaṃ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate,
SA10canprasu:1334: na cāsati phale paṭakaṭākhye tantuvīraṇānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ yuktam,
SA10canprasu:1338: sati hi phale ime 'sya pratyayā ime 'pratyayā iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:1344: śūnyavidya na hi vidyate kvaci antarīkṣi śakunasya vā padam /
SA10canprasu:1345: yo na vidyati sabhāvataḥ kvaci so na jātu parahetu bheṣyati //
SA10canprasu:1346: yasya naiva hi sabhāvu labhyati so 'svabhāvu parapaccayaḥ katham /
SA10canprasu:1347: asvabhāvu paru kiṃ janīṣyati eṣa hetu sugatena deśitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1348: sarva dharma acalā dṛḍhaṃ sthitā nirvikāra nirupadravāḥ śivāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1351: śailaparvata yathā akampiyā evaṃ dharma avikampiyāḥ sadā /
SA10canprasu:1352: no cyavati na pi copapadyayu evaṃ dharmata jinena deśitā // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:1354: yo na pi jāyati nā cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1355: taṃ jinu deśayatī narasiṃhaḥ tatra niveśayi sattvaśatāni /
SA10canprasu:1356: yasya sabhāvu na vidyati kaści no parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1357: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1358: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gati upalabhyati kāci /
SA10canprasu:1359: tatra ca voharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayamī bahusattvān //
SA10canprasu:1361: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pratyayaparīkṣā nāma prathamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1368: yadi gamanaṃ nāma syānniyataṃ tadgate vā adhvajāte parikalpyeta agate gamyamāne vā /
SA10canprasu:1370: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10canprasu:1374: yadgatamuparatagamikriyaṃ tadvartamānagamikriyāyogavācinā gamyate ityanena śabdenocyamānamasaṃbaddhamiti kṛtvā gataṃ tāvad gamyata iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1384: iha hi gantā yaṃ deśamatikrāntaḥ sa tasya deśo gataḥ,
SA10canprasu:1386: na ca gatāgatavyatirekeṇa tṛtīyamaparamadhvajātaṃ paśyāmo gamyamānaṃ nāma /
SA10canprasu:1390: ato na tad gamikriyayā āviśyate na gamyata iti nāsti gamyamāne 'pi gamanam //
SA10canprasu:1401: evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi pūrvāparadigbhāgasaṃbandhena vicāraḥ kārya iti /
SA10canprasu:1405: tatrāha- gamyata eva gamyamānam / iha hi-
SA10canprasu:1406: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1407: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1410: yato vrajato ganturyatra deśe ceṣṭā gatiḥ tatraiva deśe /
SA10canprasu:1411: sā ca ceṣṭā na gate 'dhvani saṃbhavati nāpyagate,
SA10canprasu:1419: evamapi parikalpyamāne gamyamānaṃ na gamyata ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1426: gamyata iti bhūyaḥ kriyāsaṃbandho gamyamānasya na yujyata iti
SA10canprasu:1433: gamyata ityayaṃ vyapadeśo vinā gamanena yadā naivopapadyate,
SA10canprasu:1434: tadā gamyamānaṃ gamyata iti paripūrṇo vākyārtho nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1438: evaṃ sati gamyamānavyapadeśe nāsti kriyāsaṃbandha iti na paripūrṇatā vākyārthasyetyāha-
SA10canprasu:1447: yasmād gatirahitameva gamyamānaṃ sat tasya vādino gamyate,
SA10canprasu:1450: atha ubhayatrāpi kriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate gamyamāne gamyate ityatra ca, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:1452: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:1455: tatra gamyamāne 'dhikaraṇabhute dvitīyaṃ gamanaṃ yena so 'dhvā gamyate /
SA10canprasu:1464: yasmādavaśyaṃ kriyā svasādhanamapekṣate karma kartāraṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:1467: nāsti ca ekasminneva gacchati devadatte dvitīyaḥ karteti /
SA10canprasu:1477: kriyābhedācca tatsādhanasyāpi śakteḥ siddha eva bhedaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1487: atrāha- yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi gantari devadatte gamanamupalabhyate devadatto gacchatīti vyapadeśāt /
SA10canprasu:1490: syādevaṃ yadi gamanāśrayo gantā syāt, na tvasti /
SA10canprasu:1495: tataśca gantāraṃ cetiraskṛtya pratyākhyāya gamanaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1503: gamanavato devadattasya gacchatīti vyapadeśo na syāt,
SA10canprasu:1508: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1512: yathā ca na gacchati tathottareṇa ślokatrayeṇa pratipādayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:1521: ko hi ganturaganturvinirmuktastṛtīyo 'sti yo gacchatīti kalpyeta?
SA10canprasu:1531: ganteti tu vyapadeśe nāsti dvitīyā gamikriyā iti /
SA10canprasu:1539: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10canprasu:1542: tasya ganturgamanamicchataḥ sagamanagantṛvyapadeśādgamanena vinā gantā gacchatīti syāt,
SA10canprasu:1545: gacchatītyetasyārthe ganteti śabdo gamanena vinā gantetyatra vākye // 10 //
SA10canprasu:1546: atha ubhayatrāpi gatiyoga iṣyate gantā gacchatīti, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:1547: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1548: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati // 11 //
SA10canprasu:1549: yena gamanena yogād gantetyucyate vyapadiśyate tadekaṃ gamanam /
SA10canprasu:1553: ato gantṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavad dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA10canprasu:1558: yasmāddevadattāśrayaivaiṣā cintā kimasau gantā san gacchati,
SA10canprasu:1567: syādgamanaṃ yadi tadāramme eva syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1583: yathā ca gamanaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1584: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10canprasu:1591: atha syāt- yadyapi gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gataṃ na gamyamānaṃ tathāpyagatamasti,
SA10canprasu:1596: tatra gamanārambha ityasaṃbaddhametadityāha- agate gamanaṃ kutaḥ iti // 13 //
SA10canprasu:1599: na cāsati gamane etāni yujyanta iti /
SA10canprasu:1602: sati hi gamikriyāprārambhe yatroparatā gamikriyā tad gatamiti parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:1605: yadā tu gamikriyāprārambha eva nāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:1606: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamanaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10canprasu:1616: syād gamanaṃ yadi tatpratipakṣaḥ sthānaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1619: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10canprasu:1621: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tathottareṇa ślokenākhyāsyati /
SA10canprasu:1628: ekayā sthityā agantā aparayā tiṣṭhatīti sthitidvayaprasaṅgāt sthātṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavaddoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1632: kiṃ tarhi gantaiva tiṣṭhatīti naivam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1641: iha gaternivartamānaḥ sthitimārabhate gamanābhāve tu na tato nivarteta /
SA10canprasu:1646: tatra gantā gatādadhvano na nivartate gatyabhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:1660: atra hi yadgamanaṃ sthitisiddhaye varṇitaṃ tadgatyā samaṃ gatidūṣaṇena tulyamityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1661: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadityādinā gatiprasiddhaye sthiterhetutvenopāttāyā dūṣaṇamuktam,
SA10canprasu:1662: evamihāpi sthitiprasiddhaye gamanasya hetutvenopāttasya sthātā na gacchati tāvadityādinā ślokadvayapāṭhaparivartena dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nāsti gamanam,
SA10canprasu:1664: evaṃ tāvad gamanaṃ gatyā tulyaṃ pratyākhyeyam //
SA10canprasu:1665: atha syāt- vidyata eva sthānaṃ tadārambhasadbhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:1669: tatra yathā pūrvaṃ gate nārabhyate gantumityādinā gamanārambho niṣiddhaḥ, evamihāpi-
SA10canprasu:1680: iti gatyā tulyaṃ dūṣaṇamiti nāsti sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1685: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1686: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate // 18 //
SA10canprasu:1688: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
SA10canprasu:1689: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca // 19 //
SA10canprasu:1697: ato yadeva gamanaṃ sa eva ganteti na yujyate // 19 //
SA10canprasu:1703: gantṛnirapekṣaṃ ca gamanaṃ gṛhyeta pṛthak siddhaṃ ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1704: na ca gantuḥ pṛthaksiddhaṃ gamanaṃ gṛhyata iti /
SA10canprasu:1705: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate iti prasādhitametat // 20 //
SA10canprasu:1708: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 21 //
SA10canprasu:1709: yayorgantṛgamanayoryathoditanyāyena ekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:1711: ata āha- tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyata iti /
SA10canprasu:1714: atrāha- iha devadatto gantā gacchatīti lokaprasiddham /
SA10canprasu:1718: evaṃ yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate tāṃ gacchatīti na yathoktadoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1720: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1722: sa gantā san tāṃ tāvanna gacchati,
SA10canprasu:1723: na prāpnoti yadi vā na karotītyarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1726: yadi gantā gateḥ pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1730: kaściddevadattaḥ kiṃcidarthāntarabhūtaṃ grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā gacchatīti dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:1732: tasyāḥ pūrvaṃ siddharūpo gatinirapekṣo gantā nāma asti yastāṃ gacchet // 22 //
SA10canprasu:1737: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1740: tato 'nyāmapi sa gantā san na gacchati,
SA10canprasu:1743: gantā san yāṃ cāparāṃ gacchatītyetad gatidvayaṃ prasaktam /
SA10canprasu:1746: etena vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate kartā kriyāṃ karoti,
SA10canprasu:1749: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1757: tatra sadbhūto gantā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtaṃ triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1759: evamasadbhūto 'pi gantā triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1762: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate // 25 //
SA10canprasu:1767: yatra na saṃkarṣaṇapadaṃ na niṣkarṣaṇapadaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ padam /
SA10canprasu:1775: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:1776: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā // iti //
SA10canprasu:1778: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ // iti ca //
SA10canprasu:1780: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ alaṃkṛtam /
SA10canprasu:1781: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo //
SA10canprasu:1782: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
SA10canprasu:1783: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:1785: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
SA10canprasu:1786: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate //
SA10canprasu:1787: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1789: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā /
SA10canprasu:1790: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato //
SA10canprasu:1792: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1793: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
SA10canprasu:1794: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1795: na ca dṛṣṭa sthānagatiśuddhiriho na ca satvacāra supaśāntagati //
SA10canprasu:1796: supinopamaṃ hi tribhavaṃ vaśikaṃ laghu bhagnamanityena māyasamam /
SA10canprasu:1797: na ca āgataṃ na ca ihopagataṃ śūnyānimitta sada saṃtatiyo //
SA10canprasu:1798: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā /
SA10canprasu:1799: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāna iyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā //
SA10canprasu:1803: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau gatāgataparīkṣā nāma dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1807: atrāha- yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate,
SA10canprasu:1810: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1817: yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1818: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
SA10canprasu:1819: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1820: tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:1825: tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam,
SA10canprasu:1826: evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva drakṣyati na svātmānamiti /
SA10canprasu:1830: sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1834: so 'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1836: yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam,
SA10canprasu:1837: evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam /
SA10canprasu:1838: yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate, evam-
SA10canprasu:1839: na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate /
SA10canprasu:1842: yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam,
SA10canprasu:1843: evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam /
SA10canprasu:1844: evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam,
SA10canprasu:1847: tataśca siddhametat- svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti // 3 //
SA10canprasu:1854: yadyapi darśanaśabdādanantaraṃ ślokabandhānurodhena darśana paśyatīti pāṭhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:1855: tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam // 4 //
SA10canprasu:1856: kiṃ cānyat- iha paśyatīti darśanamityucyamāne darśanakriyayā darśanasvabhāvasya vā cakṣuṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:1860: darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca /
SA10canprasu:1862: paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyatyadarśanam / tadā
SA10canprasu:1866: ye tu manyante- nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti,
SA10canprasu:1879: kriyāvān śāśvato nāsti nāsti sarvagate kriyā /
SA10canprasu:1880: niṣkriyo nāstinā tulyo nairātmyaṃ kiṃ na te priyam // iti /
SA10canprasu:1883: atrāha- naiva hi paśyatīti darśanamiti kartṛsādhanamabhyupagamyate,
SA10canprasu:1895: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān //
SA10canprasu:1900: na tasya karmakaraṇe vidyete tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ /
SA10canprasu:1901: asti ca draṣṭuḥ karaṇaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ca karma /
SA10canprasu:1912: tadā siddhasya vā darśanāpekṣā syādasiddhasya vā /
SA10canprasu:1913: tatra siddho draṣṭā na hi darśanamapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:1914: kiṃ siddhasya sato draṣṭuḥ punardarśanāpek ṣā kuryāt?
SA10canprasu:1915: na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyata iti /
SA10canprasu:1921: tadevaṃ tiraskṛtyātiraskṛtya vā darśanaṃ yadā draṣṭā nāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:1922: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1923: draṣṭaryasati nirhetuke draṣṭavyadarśane na saṃbhavataḥ iti kutastatsadbhāvād draṣṭā prasetsyati?
SA10canprasu:1928: iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate /
SA10canprasu:1938: iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam /
SA10canprasu:1950: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1954: na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca /
SA10canprasu:1955: etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate //
SA10canprasu:1960: no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi //
SA10canprasu:1964: na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati //
SA10canprasu:1966: sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam /
SA10canprasu:1967: naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1969: yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci //
SA10canprasu:1970: yo 'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so 'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1971: saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ // iti //
SA10canprasu:1974: gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ svapnopamā hi ratayo 'budhamohanāśca /
SA10canprasu:1975: saṃkalpalālasa gatā abudhā 'tra nāśaṃ kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi // iti //
SA10canprasu:1976: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau cakṣurādīndriyaparīkṣā nāma tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1985: syureva, yadi skandhāḥ syuḥ tatra rūpaskandhamadhikṛtyāha-
SA10canprasu:1990: tadvayatiriktaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ nopalabhyate ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1996: evaṃ rūpakāraṇacaturmahābhūtavyatirikta bhautikaṃ rūpamiṣyamāṇaṃ na bhūtahetukaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1999: idānīṃ rūpeṇāpi vinirmuktaṃ yathā rūpakāraṇaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:2004: yathā ghaṭātkuṇḍaṃ pṛthaksiddhaṃ ghaṭahetukaṃ na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:2013: atha cedaṃ rūpasya kāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sati vā rūpe kāraṇatveneṣyate 'sati vā?
SA10canprasu:2017: sati vā saṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:2018: asati asaṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam,
SA10canprasu:2022: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:2029: asati kāraṇe kuto nirhetukaṃ kāryaṃ rūpaṃ bhavet?
SA10canprasu:2030: naiva naivetyanena sāvadhāraṇena pratiṣedhadvayena ahetukatvādasyātyaniṣṭatāṃ darśayati /
SA10canprasu:2031: yataścaivaṃ rūpaṃ sarvathā vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:2036: api ca / idaṃ rūpakāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ niṣpādayedasadṛśaṃ vā?
SA10canprasu:2042: bāhyaṃ tu rūpādyāyatanādikaṃ cakṣurvijñānādigrāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na mahābhūtasvabhāvamiti /
SA10canprasu:2045: na cāpi sadṛśānāṃ śālibījādīnāṃ parasparakāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, ityataḥ
SA10canprasu:2050: yathā cedaṃ rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ sarvathā nopapadyate,
SA10canprasu:2056: yathaiva hyekasya dharmasya śūnyatā pratipādayitumiṣṭā mādhyamikena,
SA10canprasu:2059: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10canprasu:2063: śūnyatayā kāraṇabhūtayā rūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvamityevaṃ sasvabhāvavāde pratiṣiddhe,
SA10canprasu:2067: yasmādvedanādīnāmapi sadbhāvaḥ sādhyena rūpasadbhāvena samo veditavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2072: saṃskārapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ svakāraṇātsparśādeḥ tattvānyatvādinā vicāryamāṇaṃ nāstīti sarvametatsādhyasamaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2074: evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇakāryakāraṇāvayavyavayavādayo 'pi sarva eva padārthāḥ rūpeṇa sādhyena samā iti kutaḥ parasya parīhāra saṃbhavet?
SA10canprasu:2075: sarvaṃ vacanamasya sādhyasamaṃ bhavatīti sarvatra śāstre parīhāreṇa sādhyasamatvaṃ mādhyamikenā grāhaṇīyamityācāryaḥ śikṣayati // 8 //
SA10canprasu:2078: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10canprasu:2082: bhāvasyaikasya yo draṣṭā draṣṭā sarvasya sa smṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2083: ekasya śūnyatā yaiva saiva sarvasya śūnyatā // iti /
SA10canprasu:2085: ekena dharmeṇa tu sarvadharmān anugacchate māyamarīcisādṛśān /
SA10canprasu:2086: agrāhyatucchānalikānaśāśvatān so bodhimaṇḍaṃ nacireṇa gacchati // iti //
SA10canprasu:2088: yatha ñāta tayātmasaṃjña tathaiva sarvatra peṣitā buddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2089: sarve ca tatsvabhāvā dharma viśuddhā gaganakalpāḥ //
SA10canprasu:2091: kiyadbahu pi bhāvetvā na tasyotpadyate madaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:2092: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau skandhaparīkṣā nāma caturtha prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:2097: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā- ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣapudgala ityādi /
SA10canprasu:2100: syuḥ skandhāyatanāni yadi dhātava eva syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:2114: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
SA10canprasu:2120: tataśca asati asaṃvidyamāne alakṣaṇe lakṣaṇarahite bhāve kuha idānīṃ lakṣaṇaṃpravartatāmiti nāsti lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:2121: api ca / idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pravartamānaṃ salakṣaṇe vā pravarteta alakṣaṇe vā?
SA10canprasu:2127: kiṃ hi lakṣaṇavataḥ prasiddhasya bhāvasya punarlakṣaṇakṛtyaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:2129: na hyasau kadācinna salakṣaṇaḥ syāditi sadaiva lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ prasajyeta /
SA10canprasu:2132: tatraivaṃ syāt- salakṣaṇālakṣaṇābhyāmanyatra pravartiṣyata iti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:2140: tasmādasaṃbhavādeva salakṣaṇe cālakṣaṇe ca lakṣaṇapravṛttirnopapadyate iti // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2145: yadā lakṣaṇapravṛttireva nāsti tadā kathaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:2147: atrāha- lakṣaṇapravṛttistvayā niṣiddhā na tu lakṣaṇam,
SA10canprasu:2151: lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate iti pratipāditam / tadā
SA10canprasu:2155: tadā lakṣaṇasadbhāvādvidyate lakṣyamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yataścaitadevam-
SA10canprasu:2156: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
SA10canprasu:2158: atrāha- yadyāpi lakṣyalakṣaṇe na staḥ, tathā (pyā)
SA10canprasu:2159: kāśamasti, bhāvarūpaṃ ca bhavadākāśa lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vā syāt /
SA10canprasu:2178: yadyapi rūpaṃ syāttadā rūpābhāva ākāśamiti syāt /
SA10canprasu:2179: yadā ca yathoktena nyāyena rūpameva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:2183: asti ca bhavān bhāvābhāvayoḥ parīkṣakaḥ, ya evāha-
SA10canprasu:2186: iti / tasmād bhavato bhāvābhāvaparīkṣakasya sadbhāvāt parīkṣyāvapi bhāvābhāvau vidyete iti /
SA10canprasu:2191: tadā tayoḥ parīkṣako bhāvo va syādabhāvo vā /
SA10canprasu:2198: na ca bhāvābhāvavisadṛśadharmā kaścit tṛtīyaḥ padārtho 'sti,
SA10canprasu:2201: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
SA10canprasu:2202: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ bhajate samādhim // iti /
SA10canprasu:2204: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku balaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2205: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:2206: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cinta na jātu na bhūtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2207: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān //
SA10canprasu:2210: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:2217_0: tadevaṃ padārthānāṃ svabhāve vyavasthite avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā anādisaṃsārābhyastatayā
SA10canprasu:2218: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2219: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam // 8 //
SA10canprasu:2220: draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivalakṣaṇaṃ sarvakalpanājālarahitaṃ jñānajñeyanivṛttisvabhāvaṃ śivaṃ paramārthasvabhāvam /
SA10canprasu:2221: paramārthamajaramamaramaprapañcaṃ nirvāṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ te na paśyanti mandabuddhitayā astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ cābhiniviṣṭāḥ santa iti /
SA10canprasu:2226: astīti nāstīti ume 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
SA10canprasu:2227: tasmādume anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2228: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2229: vivādaprāptyā na dukhaṃ praśāmyate avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:2230: tasmādasaṃbhava eva yatsāṃsārikeṇa mārgeṇa nirvāṇamadhigamyata iti // 8 //
SA10canprasu:2231: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dhātuparīkṣā nāma pañcamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:2240: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā- bālo bhikṣave aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate /
SA10canprasu:2242: raktaḥ san rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manaseti vistaraḥ /
SA10canprasu:2244: syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavo yadi rāgādaya eva kleśāḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:2245: ihāyaṃ rāgaḥ parikalpyamāno bālapṛthagjanaiḥ sati rakte nare parikalpyeta asati vā?
SA10canprasu:2248: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati // 1 //
SA10canprasu:2249: tatra rāgaḥ saktiradhyavasānaṃ saṅgo 'bhiniveśa iti paryāyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2251: sa yadi rakto rāgātpūrvaṃ rāgatiraskṛto rāgarahito bhavet,
SA10canprasu:2252: tadā taṃ rāgatiraskṛtaṃ raktaṃ pratītya rāgo bhavet /
SA10canprasu:2253: evaṃ sakti rakte rāgo bhavediti yuktam /
SA10canprasu:2260: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:2262: tadā kathamasati rakte nirāśrayo rāgaḥ setsyati?
SA10canprasu:2263: na hi asati phale tatpakvatā saṃbhavatīti //
SA10canprasu:2271: yasmādayaṃ rakta iṣyamāṇaḥ sati vā rāge parikalpyeta, asati vā?
SA10canprasu:2273: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:2274: tatra yadi sati rāge raktaḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:2275: tatrāpi eṣa eva rāgānupapattikramo 'nantarokto rakte 'pi tulyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2279: rāge 'sati punā raktaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:2283: atrāha- naiva hi rāgaraktayoḥ paurvāparyeṇa saṃbhavo yata idaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2293: api ca / anayo rāgaraktayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ ekatve parikalpyeta pṛthaktve vā?
SA10canprasu:2299: na hi rāgasvātmā rāgādavyatirikto rāgeṇa saheti vyapadiśyate //
SA10canprasu:2302: na hi pṛthagbhūtayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇayorvā sahabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti // 4 //
SA10canprasu:2307: tadā yatra yatraikatvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva ityekasyāpi sahabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2308: pṛthaktve 'pi sahabhāve iṣyamāṇe yatra yatra pṛthaktvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva iti aśvādivyatiriktasya pṛthagavasthitasya goḥ asahāyasya sahabhāvaḥ syāt // 5 //
SA10canprasu:2314: kiṃ rāganirapekṣo raktaḥ siddho yatastayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:2316: na tvevaṃ rāgaraktau pṛthakpṛthaksiddhāviti nāstyanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:2328: pṛthakpṛthag rāgaraktayoḥ siddhirnāstīti kṛtvā yadyanayoḥ sahabhāvamicchasi,
SA10canprasu:2331: nanvevaṃ sati itaretarāśrayāyāṃ siddhau sthitāyāṃ kasyedānīṃ siddhau satyāṃ kasya siddhirastu? // 8 //
SA10canprasu:2335: nāstyeva sa pṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvānapekṣo yasmin pṛthagbhāve sati sahabhāvasiddhiḥ syādityasaṃbhāvayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2338: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
SA10canprasu:2339: iti / yathā ca rāgaraktayorna paurvāparyeṇa siddhiḥ nāpi sahabhāvena,
SA10canprasu:2344: yo rajyeta yatra vā rajyeta yena vā rajyeta,
SA10canprasu:2345: yo duṣyeta yatra vā duṣyeta yena vā duṣyeta,
SA10canprasu:2346: yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta yena vā muhyeta,
SA10canprasu:2347: sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati taṃ dharma nopalabhate /
SA10canprasu:2353_0: niḥkleśo vaśībhūtaḥ suvimuktacittaḥ suvimuktaprajña ājāneyo mahābhāgaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ
SA10canprasu:2358: na vikalpayanti na virāgamapīha teṣām [āśu] sarvabhavabhāvavibhāvitānām //
SA10canprasu:2359: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau rāgaraktaparīkṣā nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:2365: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni /
SA10canprasu:2378: iyaṃ ca utpādasthitibhaṅgasamāhārasvabhāvasarvasaṃskṛtāvyabhicāriṇīti kṛtvā yadi utpādaḥ saṃskṛta iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:2386: api ca / ime utpādādayaḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyamānā vyastā vā pṛthagvā lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyeran,
SA10canprasu:2392: yadi utpādakāle sthitibhaṅgau na syātāṃ tadā sthitibhaṅgarahitasya ākāśasyeva saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvenānupapadya evotpādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2395: utpādabhaṅgarahitaśca padārtho nāstyeveti na asyāvidyamānasya khapuṣpavat sthitiryujyate /
SA10canprasu:2399: atha syāt- pūrvaṃ śāśvato bhūtvā paścādaśāśvata iti,
SA10canprasu:2400: na caikapadārthaḥ śāśvataścāśāśvataśca yukta iti notpādabhaṅgarahitasya sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2401: tathā yadi bhaṅgakāle sthityutpādau na syātām,
SA10canprasu:2403: evaṃ tāvadutpādādayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nālaṃ na paryāptā ityarthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2404: idānīṃ samastā api na yujyanta ityāha-
SA10canprasu:2412: tasminneva tiṣṭhati vinaśyati ceti kaḥ sacetāḥ pratipadyeta?
SA10canprasu:2413: tasmātsamastānāmapi utpādādīnāṃ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nāsti sāmarthyam // 2 //
SA10canprasu:2415: tena yadi utpādādīnāṃ trilakṣaṇī prāptā prasaktā,
SA10canprasu:2420: asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2421: nanu ca pakṣadvaye 'pi vihita eva doṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:2431: kiṃ pūrvaṃ syād yata uttarakālamaparaṃ bhavediti vyavasthābhāvādasaṃbhava evaṃ utpādādīnāmityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2434: nāsti cette na saṃskṛtā iti gatārthametat // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2438: yasmādiha saṃskṛtadharmaḥ kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā utpadyamānaḥ ātmanā pañcadaśaḥ utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:2439: sa dharmastasya cotpādaḥ samanvāgamaḥ sthitirjarā anityatā /
SA10canprasu:2448: idānīmutpāda syāpara utpādaḥ yāvadanairyāṇikatānairyāṇikatetyeṣa parivārasya parivāraḥ /
SA10canprasu:2449: tatra yo 'yaṃ maula utpāda sa ātmānaṃ vihāya anyāṃścaturdaśa dharmān janayati /
SA10canprasu:2451: evaṃ yāvadanairyāṇikatā caturdaśa dharmān na niryāṇayati,
SA10canprasu:2470: yadi tava utpādasyotpādo mūlotpādasya janaka iti matam,
SA10canprasu:2471: sa kathamidānīṃ maulenotpādenānutpāditaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati? // 5 //
SA10canprasu:2472: atha manyase- utpādita eva maulenotpādena utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati,
SA10canprasu:2474: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
SA10canprasu:2476: sa utpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādo maulena janito yadi maulaṃ janayati,
SA10canprasu:2478: tasmānmaulena janitaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayatīte na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2479: tataśca parasparanirvartyanirvartakatvābhāvātsa eva anavasthāprasaṅga iti nāstyutpādaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:2487: sa ca ajātaḥ kathamutpādayiṣyatīti na yuktamevaitadityabhiprāyaḥ evamutpādotpāde 'pi vācyam // 7 //
SA10canprasu:2488: atrāha- naiva hi utpādasyāpara utpādo 'sti yato 'navasthāprasaṅgaḥ syāt / kiṃ tarhi-
SA10canprasu:2493: ucyate / syādetadevaṃ yadi pradīpaḥ svaparātmānau saṃprakāśayet /
SA10canprasu:2497: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ // 9 //
SA10canprasu:2501: na cāpi pradīpo yatra deśe tiṣṭhati tatra tamo 'sti,
SA10canprasu:2514: tadā anutpanne iva pradīpe utpanne 'pi ghaṭādayo nopalabhyeran,
SA10canprasu:2519: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā // 10 //
SA10canprasu:2522: tadā kathaṃ kena prakāreṇedānīmutpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatamiti yuktaṃ parikalpayitum?
SA10canprasu:2523: yasmācca evamutpadyamāna pradīpaḥ tamo na prāpnoti,
SA10canprasu:2525: atha manyase- yathā aprāptāmeva avidyāṃ jñānaṃ nihanti,
SA10canprasu:2526: aprāptameva rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati aprāptameva ayaḥ ayaskānto maṇirākarṣati,
SA10canprasu:2528: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2532: ihastha eva pradīpaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ tamo nihaniṣyati,
SA10canprasu:2537: atha aprāptāvapi satyāmayaskāntamaṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ yogyadeśāvasthānāmeva svakāryakṛtvaṃ debhaviṣyatīti cet,
SA10canprasu:2539_1: aprāptatvād yogyadeśāvasthitānāmapi yogyadeśāvasthitatvaṃ na yuktamiti kuto yogyadeśāvasthitānāṃ
SA10canprasu:2542: yathā hi bhavān parikalpayati na tathā loke dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:2543: yasmāt na lokaḥ prāptyaprāpticintāmevamādau viṣaye 'vatārya pradīpādīnāṃ prakāśakatvādikaṃ kalpayati /
SA10canprasu:2544: yathoditaṃ tu vicāramanavatārya pradīpena tamo hatam,
SA10canprasu:2548: tattvavicārakāle tu lokasyāprāmāṇyānna tena bādhā śakyate kartum /
SA10canprasu:2553: yadyapi ceyaṃ prāptyaprāptyādicintā laukikavyavahāre nāvataratīti nirupapattikatvena mṛṣārthatvādasya,
SA10canprasu:2556: yadi ca svaparātmānau pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti parikalpyate tvayā,
SA10canprasu:2557: tamaso 'pi tarhi pratipakṣa bhūtasya svaparātmanoḥ pracchādanaṃ prakalpyatamityāha-
SA10canprasu:2566: iha sāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā /
SA10canprasu:2567: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭho eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena //
SA10canprasu:2568: pravrajitvā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2569: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ //
SA10canprasu:2570: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
SA10canprasu:2571: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭhupadeśita yukti jinena // iti //
SA10canprasu:2574: yathā hi dīpo layane cirasya kṛto hi gehe puruṣeṇa kenacit /
SA10canprasu:2575: tatrāndhakārasya na bhoti evaṃ cirasthito nāhamito gamiṣye //
SA10canprasu:2576: tamondhakārasya na śaktirasti kṛte pradīpe na vigacchanāya /
SA10canprasu:2577: pratītya dīpaṃ ca vinaśyate tama ubhayaṃ pi śūnyaṃ na ca kiṃ ca manyati //
SA10canprasu:2578: jñānaṃ tathā ārya pratītya nāsravaṃ ajñāna kleśopacitaṃ vigacchati /
SA10canprasu:2579: saṃparka teṣāṃ na kadāci vidyate jñānasya kleśasya ca nityakālam //
SA10canprasu:2580: jñānaṃ na kalpeti añānu no bhavet jñānaṃ pratītyaiva vinaśyate tamo /
SA10canprasu:2581: bhayaṃ pi agrāhya khapuṣpasaṃnibhaṃ jñānaṃ tathājñānu bhayaṃ pi śūnyam // iti // 12 //
SA10canprasu:2587: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ // 13 //
SA10canprasu:2593: idānīṃ paramapi yathā notpādayati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2612: tataśca utpanna utpadyate ityucyamāne atītavartamānayorekakālatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:2627: viśeṣata etadvaktavyaṃ syāt- asyotpattiṃ pratītya idaṃ nāmotpadyamānaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10canprasu:2629: na hi tadutpadyamānaṃ viśeṣato nirdhārayituṃ śakyate idaṃ tadutpadyamānamiti,
SA10canprasu:2640: yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityādyaviparītaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prakaṭayatā /
SA10canprasu:2641: tasya ca tvayā notpadyamānaṃ notpannaṃ nānutpannamityādinā dūṣaṇaṃ vidadhatā tathāgatajananyāḥ pratītyasamutpattimāturvadha evācarita ityalaṃ bhavatā sarvanāstikena tvayeti /
SA10canprasu:2644: bhavāneva tu paramagambhīrapratītyasamutpādādhimuktivirahādviparītaṃ tadarthamavadhārya asmākameva adhilayaṃ karoti /
SA10canprasu:2645: nanu ca idaṃ pratītyedaṃ bhavatītyevamabhidhānena bhagavatā tathāgatena niḥsvabhāvatvameva sarvadharmāṇāṃ spaṣṭamāveditam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2648: yo hi padārtho vidyamānaḥ sa sasvabhāvaḥ svenātmanā svaṃ svabhāvamanapāyinaṃ bimarti /
SA10canprasu:2651: iti kṛtvā sasvabhāvabhāvābhyupagame sati kutaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti bhavateva sasvabhāvatāṃ bhāvānāmabhyupagacchatā sarvathā pratītyasamutpāda eva bādhito bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2652: tataśca paramadharmabuddhadarśanamapi bādhitaṃ bhavati- yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati,
SA10canprasu:2653: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ paśyatītyāgamāt /
SA10canprasu:2654: mayā tu yatpratītya bījākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhavatyaṅkurākhyaṃ kāryam,
SA10canprasu:2655: tacca ubhayamapi śāntaṃ svabhāvavirahitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ pratipādayatā sarvathā bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pratītyasamutpattimātā dyotitā bhavati / yata evam-
SA10canprasu:2663: tathā hi ghaṭotpattiṃ pratītya ghaṭa utpadyamāno bhavati,
SA10canprasu:2667: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati // 17 //
SA10canprasu:2668: yadi kaścidanutpannaḥ utpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāma kvacitsaṃvidyeta,
SA10canprasu:2669: sa utpattikriyāṃ pratītyotpadyeta na caivaṃ kaścidutpādātpūrvaṃ kvacidasti /
SA10canprasu:2683: yadi paṭa utpadyamānaḥ sa kathamutpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhaviṣyatīti atha naivaṃ kiṃcit,
SA10canprasu:2685: kathaṃ vā sa utpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhavet?
SA10canprasu:2688: api ca / evaṃ na yujyamānāyāmapyutpadyamānasyotpattau bhavato matamabhyupetyocyate-
SA10canprasu:2693: idaṃ tu vaktavyam- tamidānīmutpādaḥ katamo 'paraḥ utpādamutpādayiṣyatīti // 18 //
SA10canprasu:2694: atha syāt- utpādasyāpara utpādaḥ utpādakaḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:2699: nanvevaṃ sati vinā utpādena utpāda utpadyate ityevaṃ prāpnoti /
SA10canprasu:2700: tataśca utpādotpādyānāmapi padārthānāṃ vinaivotpādena utpattirastu bhāvatvādutpādavaditi pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2703: api ca / utpāda ātmānaṃ parāṃścotpādayatītyatra pakṣe dūṣaṇameva na vaktavyamadhunāsmābhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2707: naivāsato naiva sataḥ pratyayo 'rthasya yujyate / iti
SA10canprasu:2709: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10canprasu:2712: svaparātmānau vā utpādayatītyasyāḥ kalpanāyā nāstyevāvatāra iti kuta etatprasetsyati- utpāda utpadyate,
SA10canprasu:2715: kiṃ cānyat- ihāyamutpādaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nirudhyamānasya anityatānugatasya vartamānasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:2721: anirudhyamānasyāpi vināśarahitasya atītānāgatasya bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇasya khapuṣpasyeva nāstyutpāda iti // 21 //
SA10canprasu:2722: evaṃ bhāvānāmutpādābhāvaṃ pratipādya ataḥ paraṃ sthitirvicāryate //
SA10canprasu:2738: tatra sthitaṃ na tiṣṭhati tatra sthitikriyānirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:2743: ihotpādapratiṣedhātko 'sāvanutpannaḥ padārtho yastiṣṭhediti sarvathā nāsti sthitiḥ // 22 //
SA10canprasu:2744: api ca / iyaṃ sthitirnirudhyamānasya bhāvasya syādanirudhyamānasya vā?
SA10canprasu:2745: ubhayathā ca na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2748: nirudhyamānasya nirodhābhimukhasya tāvadbhāvasya virodhinī sthitirna saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:2749: yaścāpyanirudhyamānaḥ sa bhāva eva na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:2751: api ca / jarasā maraṇena ca sarva eva bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamapi na tyajyante /
SA10canprasu:2752: yadā caitadevam tadā jarāmaraṇavirodhinyāḥ sthiterbhāveṣu pravṛttyavakāśa eva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2754: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // 24 //
SA10canprasu:2755: ke hi nāma jarāmaraṇarahitā bhāvā yeṣāṃ sthitiḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:2757: yadi ca, asyāḥ sthiteranyā vā sthitiḥ sthityarthaṃ parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:2760: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2763: '; ityādinā yathā utpāda ātmānaṃ na janayati ityuktam,
SA10canprasu:2775: asthitā hi ime dharmāḥ sthitiścaiṣāṃ na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:2778: lokanāthaṃ viditvaivaṃ samādhiṃ tena jānathā // iti //
SA10canprasu:2780: ākāśaniśrita samāruta āpakhandho tanniśritā iya mahī pṛthivī jagacca /
SA10canprasu:2781: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānamevaṃ ākāśathānu kṛta cittama etamartham //
SA10canprasu:2796: sā niruddhasya bhāvasya aniruddhasya vā nirudhyamānasya vā syāt /
SA10canprasu:2797: tatra niruddhaṃ nirudhyate iti na yuktam,
SA10canprasu:2802: tathāpi nirudhyamānaṃ na nirudhyate ityanena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2806: tasmānnāstyeva nirodha iti kutastatsahacāristhityutpādasaṃbhavaḥ syāt? api ca /
SA10canprasu:2810: api ca / ayaṃ nirodhaḥ sthitasya vā bhāvasya syādasthitasya vā?
SA10canprasu:2817: kiṃ cānyat / yadi iha nirodhaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2818: sa tayaivāvasthayā tasyā evāvasthāyāḥ syādanyayā vā anyasyā avasthāyāḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2822: tayaiva tāvatkṣīrāvasthayā saiva kṣīrāvasthā na nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:2834: anyayā vā avasthayā anyāvasthā na nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:2844: api ca / nirodho nāma yadi kaścit syāt,
SA10canprasu:2845: sa sato vā bhāvasya syādasato vā / tatra-
SA10canprasu:2847: svabhāvādapracyutasya bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2853: tataśca sato bhāvasya nirodha iti bruvatā bhāvābhāvayorekādhikaraṇatā abhyupagatā bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2860: tasmādekatve sati bhāvābhāvayoḥ sa padārtho naiva bhāvo nāpyabhāva iti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2861: athavā, parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekatve sati na hi bhāvaśca nābhāvaścopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:2862: evaṃ tāvatsato bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ // 30 //
SA10canprasu:2869: tadevamasato bhāvasya nirodho na saṃbhavati, sato 'pi na /
SA10canprasu:2873: kiṃ cānyat / yadi nirodho nāma bhāvānāṃ nirodhaka iti kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:2874: tasyedānīṃ kimanyo nirodha iṣyate, uta na?
SA10canprasu:2876: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
SA10canprasu:2885: atha naṣṭo nāśayati naṣṭe kiṃ nāśyate punaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2889: katham? tatra yathā utpāde gaditam- 'anya utpādayatyenam'; ityādi,
SA10canprasu:2893: athāvināśo naṣṭo 'yaṃ sarvaṃ naśyatu te tathā //
SA10canprasu:2894: iti / tadevaṃ parātmanāpi nirodho na saṃbhavatīti nāsti nirodhasya nirodhaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2895: atha manyase- nāstyeva nirodhasya nirodha iti,
SA10canprasu:2897: yadi hi nirodhasya nirodho na syāta,
SA10canprasu:2899: tadevaṃ yadi vināśasya vināśaḥ parikalpyate tathāpi na yukto vināśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2903: atha syāt- tathāpi evameva vicāre sati vināśo bhavato 'pi na yujyate,
SA10canprasu:2910_0: te ca niḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāmidaṃsatyābhiniveśināṃ vyavahārapathamupayānti
SA10canprasu:2910_1: avicāraprasiddhenaiva nyāyeneti teṣu nāsti yathoditavicārāvatāro 'smākam māyāsvapnagandharvanagarādivattu
SA10canprasu:2910_3: prasiddhimupagatā iti parasparāpekṣayaiva kevalaṃ prasiddhimupagatā bālairabhyupagamyante /
SA10canprasu:2922: kuto vināśarahitānāṃ saṃskṛtatvamapīti sarvameva asamañjasaṃ tasya jāyate /
SA10canprasu:2923: jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhāntarbhāva varṇayatā bhagavatā nanu sahetukatvaṃ spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ vināśasya /
SA10canprasu:2924: jātimātrāpekṣatvāccāsya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'pi sukhasādhya iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ jāyate //
SA10canprasu:2925: atha syāt- vināśo hi nāma abhāvaḥ,
SA10canprasu:2931: yaśca vidyamānaḥ tasya ca kiṃ hetunā prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:2934: api ca / yathā utpādaḥ sahetukaḥ pūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:2942: kiṃ tarhi vināśa eva kriyate iti varṇayāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2943: nanvevaṃ sati kriyamāṇatvādvināśo 'pi bhāvaḥ prāpnotīti cet,
SA10canprasu:2950: cetyāgamāt kathaṃ na sahetuko vināśaḥ? api ca /
SA10canprasu:2951: kalpitābhāvalakṣaṇāyāśca śūnyatāyāḥ pareṇa bhāvarūpatāmabhyupagacchatā kathamabhāvasya bhāvatvaṃ nābhyupagataṃ bhavati?
SA10canprasu:2956: na saṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau //
SA10canprasu:2961: tathāhi kāṭhinyādikaṃ sāsnādikaṃ ca tasya viśeṣalakṣaṇamupadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:2967: yadā yathoktena nyāyena utpādasthitibhaṅgā eva niṣiddhāḥ,
SA10canprasu:2985: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10canprasu:2988: yathā māyādayaḥ svabhāvenānutpannā avidyamānā māyādiśabdavācyā māyādivijñānagamyāśca lokasya,
SA10canprasu:2989: evamete 'pi lokaprasiddhimātreṇa utpādādayaḥ svabhāvena avidyamānā api bhagavatā tathāvidhavineyajanānugrahacikīrṣuṇā nirdiṣṭā iti /
SA10canprasu:2991: tvaksnāyumāṃsāsthisamucchraye ca utpādya saṃjñāṃ mama patnireṣā /
SA10canprasu:2992: mūḍhā hi balā janayanti rāgaṃ striyo na jānanti yathaiva māyām //
SA10canprasu:2993: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ sā putra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca paśyati /
SA10canprasu:2994: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasthitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:2995: yathaiva gandharvapuraṃ marīcikā yathaiva māyā supinaṃ yathaiva /
SA10canprasu:2996: svabhāvaśūnyā tu nimittabhāvanā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:3000: eṣa samādhibalī balavanto yo imu jānati śūnyakadharmān // iti // 34 //
SA10canprasu:3001: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskṛtaparīkṣā nāma saptamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3005: atrāha- vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvato vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ,
SA10canprasu:3019: syādvijñānādikaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yadi tasya niṣpādakakarmakārakau syātām /
SA10canprasu:3021: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
SA10canprasu:3025: tacca karaṇaṃ sadbhūtasya vā kartuḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:3031: tatra sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ kriyāyuktaḥ sadbhūtaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ karma na karotītyekā pratijñā /
SA10canprasu:3032: idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kriyākārakarahito 'sadbhutaṃ kriyārahitaṃ karma na karotītyaparā pratijñā // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3034: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10canprasu:3036: karoti kriyāyukta eva kaścitsadbhūtaḥ kārakavyapadeśaṃ labhate,
SA10canprasu:3037: tataśca tasyaivaṃvidhasya kriyāhetukalabdhakārakavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kuryāt /
SA10canprasu:3038: kriyābhāvācca yadā kārakaḥ karma na karoti,
SA10canprasu:3040: na cākartṛkaṃ karma saṃbhavati bandhyāsūnoriva ghaṭakaraṇamiti / evaṃ tāvat
SA10canprasu:3041: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10canprasu:3042: iti doṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti /
SA10canprasu:3043: idānīṃ sadbhūtamapi karma kārako na karotīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3044: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:3046: tasyedānīṃ kriyānibandhanalabdhakarmavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kriyeteti /
SA10canprasu:3050: yadā ca na karoti karmaṇo dvitīyakriyābhāvāt, tadā (Pp_76)
SA10canprasu:3051: akarmaka eva avidyamānakarmaka eva tasya karmaṇaḥ kārakaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3054: evaṃ sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti iti saṃsādhya idānīṃ yathā asadbhūtamapi karma asadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3058: kriyā ca kārakavyapadeśe heturiti kriyārahita kārako 'pi nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3060: sati ca ahetukavādābhyupagame kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca sarvamapoditaṃ syādityāha-
SA10canprasu:3061: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3062: satyeva hi hetorabhyupagame hetunā yanniṣpādyate tat kāryam,
SA10canprasu:3063: tasya ca yo niṣpādakaḥ tatkāraṇamiti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:3069: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3071: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3074: kasyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ kumbhakārasya svātantryātkartṛtvaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:3075: na cāpi mṛdāṃ tādātmyapravṛttyā sādhakatamatvena karaṇatvaṃ yujyata iti evaṃ tāvat-
SA10canprasu:3076: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10canprasu:3079: iha yadā devadattaḥ prāṇātipātaviratikriyāsvātantryātkartā san svatantrakāryeṇa karaṇabhūtena prāṇātipātaviratikriyāṃ karoti,
SA10canprasu:3081: evaṃ daśasvapi kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu kuśalakriyāniṣpādyeṣu ratnatrayamātāpitṛtadanyapūjyapūjādilakṣaṇeṣu ca kuśaladharmaprārambheṣu yojyam /
SA10canprasu:3082: evamadharme 'pi prāṇātipātādilakṣaṇe kuśalaviparyayeṇa kriyākartṛkaraṇānāmabhāve sati karmaṇāmabhāvaprasaṅga udbhāvanīyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:3086: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:3095: yadi ca mokṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ phalaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3104: tā api sarvāḥ phalābhāve sati nopapadyanta iti /
