SA10canprasu:3108: saddhiḥ asadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ karma karotīti pakṣo nikṛṣṭa eveti tyājyaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3113: tat sadasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karotīti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:3115: ekaḥ padārthaḥ ekasmin kāle kriyāyuktaścākriyāyuktaśceti na yujyata evaitat /
SA10canprasu:3116: tataśca sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti,
SA10canprasu:3118: evaṃ same pakṣe dūṣaṇamudbhāvya viṣamapakṣasyāpi nirācikīrṣayā āha-
SA10canprasu:3120: satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat /
SA10canprasu:3122: satā sadbhūtena tāvatkartrā kriyāyuktena asadbhūtamasadakriyāyuktaṃ karma na kriyate / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:3123: sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi // 8 //
SA10canprasu:3124: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10canprasu:3125: ityevaṃ tāvat sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti,
SA10canprasu:3127: asadbhūtaṃ hi karma ahetukaṃ bhavet / tataśca-
SA10canprasu:3128: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10canprasu:3131: yathā caitat satā kartrā asatkarma na kriyate iti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:3132: evamasatā kartrā akriyāyuktena satkarma na kriyate iti vyākhyeyamuktapathānusāreṇa // 8 //
SA10canprasu:3133: evaṃ tāvadviṣamapakṣe ekaikapadaparāmarśena dūṣaṇamabhidhāya idānīmekaikasya padasya padadvaya parāmarśena dūṣaṇābhidhānamāha-
SA10canprasu:3136: sa kārakaḥ sadbhūtaḥ asadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtameva vā na karotīti /
SA10canprasu:3146: evaṃ tāvatsadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhutaṃ ca karma na karoti // 9 //
SA10canprasu:3147: idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtaṃ ca karma na karotītyāha-
SA10canprasu:3153: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3154: iti prasaṅgāt sadbhūtaṃ karma na kriyate /
SA10canprasu:3159: idānīṃ sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ ekaika evobhayarūpaḥ san yathā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ ca bhinnasaṃketaṃ karma na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3164: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3168: yataścaivaṃ samapakṣeṣu viṣamapakṣeṣu ca kartuḥ karmaṇaśca sarvathā siddhirayuktā,
SA10canprasu:3169: tasmādyaduktaṃ vidyanta eva vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ taddhetukakarmakārakasadbhāvāditi,
SA10canprasu:3171: atrāha- kimavadhāritametadbhavatā na santi bhāvā iti? na hi /
SA10canprasu:3172: bhavatastu sasvabhāvavādinaḥ svabhāvasya bhāvānāṃ vaidhuryātsarvabhāvāpavādaḥ saṃbhāvyate /
SA10canprasu:3177: yadi nāstīti tattoyaṃ gṛhṇīyānmūḍha eva saḥ //
SA10canprasu:3179: nāstīti cāpi moho 'yaṃ sati mohe na mucyate //
SA10canprasu:3181: yadā na labhate bhāvamevābhāvastadā kuha // iti // 11 //
SA10canprasu:3184: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10canprasu:3187: iha akurvāṇasya karmanirapekṣasya kārakatvābhāvāt karmāpekṣya kārakasya kārakatvaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:3189: taṃ kārakaṃ pratītya karma pravartate ityevaṃ karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ muktvā nānyatsiddhikāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ // 12 //
SA10canprasu:3198: sā ca svasādhanaṃ kartāramupādātāraṃ karma copādānaṃ saṃnidhāpayati /
SA10canprasu:3199: tayośca upādeyopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣayoḥ karmakārakavadeva siddhirna svābhāvikī /
SA10canprasu:3200: kasmātpunaḥ svābhāvikī na bhavati ityāha- vyutsargāditi karmaṇaḥ,
SA10canprasu:3204: tataśca ayamartha upapadyate- yaireva hetubhiḥ karmaṇaśca vyutsargo 'smābhiruktaḥ,
SA10canprasu:3205: taireva hetubhiḥ upādātā upādeyaṃ ca pratiṣiddhaṃ veditavyam /
SA10canprasu:3206: na ca kevalamanayoranyonyāpekṣikī siddhiḥ katurśca karmaṇaśca pratiṣedhenāvaseyā, api ca
SA10canprasu:3211: teṣāṃ kartṛkarmavicāreṇa svabhāvato 'stitvaṃ pratiṣidhya parasparāpekṣikīmeva siddhi prājño nirmumukṣurjātijarāmaraṇādibandhanebhyo mokṣāya vibhāvayet //
SA10canprasu:3213: nanu ca śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayedityanenaiva upādānopādānnoradhigatatvādupādānopādānaṃ punarayuktam /
SA10canprasu:3216: tathā hi uttareṣu prakaraṇeṣu bhūyasā anayoreva vicāro bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:3218: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
SA10canprasu:3219: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
SA10canprasu:3220: na ca kāraku kāraṇaṃ santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3221: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
SA10canprasu:3223: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
SA10canprasu:3224: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3225: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ // iti // 13 //
SA10canprasu:3226: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmakārakaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3235: yasya upādātuḥ darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasanādīni vedanāsparśamanaskārādīni ca bhavanti,
SA10canprasu:3236: sa upādātā pūrvamebhya upādānebhyo 'stīti sāṃmitīyā vadanti // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3240: iha vidyamāna eva devadatto dhanopādānaṃ kurute nāvidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3241: evaṃ yadi tāvatpudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ vyavasthito na syāt,
SA10canprasu:3243: tasmādasti asau dhanātprāgeva sthitadevadattavat darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo yo 'sya upādānaṃ kariṣyatīti // 2 //
SA10canprasu:3246: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:3252: yaśca svakāraṇanirapekṣaḥ sa nirhetuko dhanādinirapekṣaḥ dhanikavannāstītyabhiprāyaḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:3255: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3256: yadi manyase- darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo nāmāsti,
SA10canprasu:3258: nanvevaṃ sati nirastasaṃśayamamūnyapi darśanādīni vinā pudgalena bhaviṣyanti /
SA10canprasu:3259: tathāhi devadatto dhanasaṃbandhātpūrvaṃ dhanavyatirikto vyavasthitaḥ san arthāntarabhūtameva pṛthaksiddhaṃ dhanamupādatte /
SA10canprasu:3266: tena ca kāryeṇa kiṃcit kāraṇamabhivyajyate bījākhyam- asyedaṃ kāraṇamidamasya kāryamiti /
SA10canprasu:3269: tadānīṃ syātparasparāpekṣayorupādānopādātroḥ siddhiḥ yadā tu upādātāraṃ vinā pṛthak siddhaṃ darśanādikamabhyupagamyate,
SA10canprasu:3271: iti na yuktametat- darśanādibhyaḥ pṛthagavasthita upādāteti // 5 //
SA10canprasu:3273: yadi sarvebhyo darśanādibhya prāgavasthita ityabhyupagataṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3282: ucyate / etadapi na yuktaṃ darśanādirahitasya nirupādānasya nirhetukasya nirañjanasyāstitvāsaṃbhavāt /
SA10canprasu:3283: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3286: yo hi sarvebhyaḥ pūrvo na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:3288: tadyathā sarvebhyo vṛkṣebhya prāg vanaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:3290: sarvāsāṃ ca sikatānāṃ tailajananābhāve sati ekaikasyā api sikatāyāstailaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:3293: nanu sa sarvebhyo 'pi pūrvaṃ evetyabhyupagataṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:3297: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3300: na ca yuktaṃ vaktuṃ sa eva draṣṭā sa eva śroteti /
SA10canprasu:3301: yadi syāt, tadā darśanakriyārahitasyāpi śroturdraṣṭṭatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3303: na caivaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yaddarśanakriyārahito 'pi draṣṭā syāt,
SA10canprasu:3307: iti / pratikriyaṃ ca kārakabhedātkuta etadevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratipādayannāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyata iti //
SA10canprasu:3308: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- ekatve hi ātmanaḥ indriyāntaragamanaprasaṅgaḥ puruṣasya syāt,
SA10canprasu:3310: asya ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- sarvagatasyātmano nendriyāntaragamanamastītyayuktaḥ prasaṅgadoṣa iti /
SA10canprasu:3319: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet // 9 //
SA10canprasu:3320: tadyathā goranyo 'śvaḥ na hi gavi sati na bhavati yaugapadyena,
SA10canprasu:3325: evaṃ sati bahava evātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti draṣṭṭaśrotṛvedakādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak siddhayupagamāt /
SA10canprasu:3326: tasmādekaikasmādapi darśanādeḥ pūrvaṃ nāsti pudgalo nāma kaścit // 9 //
SA10canprasu:3327: atrāha- vidyata eva pūrvaṃ sa sarvebhyo darśanādibhya ātmā /
SA10canprasu:3330: iha darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni santi yataḥ kramānnāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamiti darśanaśravaṇādīnyutpadyante /
SA10canprasu:3335: teṣvapi mahābhūtopādānanimittako 'pyeṣa na yujyate pūrveṇaiva hetunetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3358: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi // 11 //
SA10canprasu:3359: yasya darśanādīni parikalpyante sa yadā nāstītyuktam,
SA10canprasu:3360: nanu tadaiva darśanādikamapi nāstīti spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:3378: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca /
SA10canprasu:3390: yaścaivamātmā darśanādibhyaḥ prāk paścād yugapacca parīkṣyamāṇo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:3391: tasya idānīmanupalabdhasvabhāvasya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā kaḥ parikalpayetprājñaḥ?
SA10canprasu:3392: tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣā siddhirna svābhāvikīti sthitam //
SA10canprasu:3394: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
SA10canprasu:3395: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate //
SA10canprasu:3397: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3399: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā /
SA10canprasu:3400: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato //
SA10canprasu:3401: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:3402: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
SA10canprasu:3403: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3404: na ca dṛṣṭisthānagatiśuddhiriha na ca sattvacārasupaśāntagati //
SA10canprasu:3405: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā /
SA10canprasu:3406: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣamitā paramā //
SA10canprasu:3407: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvaparīkṣā nāma navamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3411: atrāha- yadidamuktaṃ tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātrorapi na svābhāvikī siddhiriti,
SA10canprasu:3424: yadi agnīndhane eva syātām, na tu staḥ /
SA10canprasu:3426: niyataṃ te ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā?
SA10canprasu:3433: tatra yadi tāvad yadindhanaṃ sa evāgniriti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:3441: na hi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭastannirapekṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3443: api ca / yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadānīm-
SA10canprasu:3448: evaṃ ca sati akarmaka eva syāt // 2 //
SA10canprasu:3466: evaṃ ca sati akarmako 'gniḥ kartā syāt /
SA10canprasu:3472: ihānyatve 'pi sati agnīndhanayorna vinaiva indhanena agnerastitvam /
SA10canprasu:3495: tadā kutaḥ kasyacijjvālāparigatiriti sa eva doṣo na vepate // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3498: anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3511: anyo na prāpsyati na dhakṣyati na ca nirvāsyati svaliṅgavāṃśca sthāsyati /
SA10canprasu:3520: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3531: te ca na saṃbhavantīti na yuktametadanyatve sati prāptirastīti // 7 //
SA10canprasu:3554: tasmānnāsti atra kiṃcitpūrvasiddhaṃ yadapekṣya itarasya siddhi syāt // 8 //
SA10canprasu:3559: evaṃ tarhi siddhasya sato 'gneḥ punarapi sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3561: na hi avidyamāno devadatto gṛhe kaṃcidapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:3565: tadā ca kimasya indhanasyāpekṣayā punaḥ kartavyam?
SA10canprasu:3585: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ // 10 //
SA10canprasu:3586: tatra yadi yaḥ agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ yamindhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3588: sa yadi tameva agnyākhyaṃ padārthamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3590: yadā ca agnyabhāve sati indhanasya siddhireva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:3592: evaṃ ya indhanākhyo bhāvaḥ yamagnyākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3595: kathyatāṃ kimidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:3596: yadā hi indhanābhāve sati agneḥ siddhirnāsti,
SA10canprasu:3602: yo hi agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ indhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3603: saḥ asiddho vā indhanamapekṣate siddho vā?
SA10canprasu:3608: na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyate vaiyarthyāt /
SA10canprasu:3618: yathā ca agnirapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā indhanaṃ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:3623: ye vayaṃ brūmaḥ- yasmādagninā idhyamānamindhanaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate,
SA10canprasu:3641: idameva tāvatsaṃpradhāryate- kiṃ punarmūlodakādīnāmabhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kriyata iti /
SA10canprasu:3642: tatra svarūpaṃ tāvanna kriyate vidyamānatvāt abhivyaktiḥ kriyata iti cet,
SA10canprasu:3648: api ca iyamabhivyaktirabhivyaktasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeta anabhivyaktasya vā?
SA10canprasu:3653: athāpi syāt- vidyamānasyaiva pratyayaiḥ sthaulyaṃ kriyate iti,
SA10canprasu:3654: evamapi yadeva sthaulyaṃ pūrvaṃ nāstīti tadeva kriyata iti kutaḥ sthaulyāpādanamabhivyaktiḥ?
SA10canprasu:3655: saukṣmyasya ca nirhetukasyāsaṃbhavāt kasya sthūlatāpādanādabhivyaktiḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:3656: tadevaṃ sarvathā indhane agnerna saṃbhava iti indhane 'gnirna vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3657: na cāvidyamānāgninā indhanasya dahanamupajāyate ityasatyamevaitadupalabhate bhavān /
SA10canprasu:3658: api ca / yathā pūrvaṃ gatāgatagamyamānānāṃ dūṣaṇamuktam-
SA10canprasu:3660: agninā indhanaṃ dahyamānamupalabhyate ityatra indhanaprastāve śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ gamyamānagatāgatadūṣaṇena veditavyam,
SA10canprasu:3663: dagdhaṃ na dahyate tāvadadagdhaṃ naiva dahyate /
SA10canprasu:3680: indhanamasyāsmin vā vidyata iti vyatirekeṇa vā vyutpādena avyatirekeṇa vā /
SA10canprasu:3690: yathā cāgniḥ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:3699: tadasyātmana upādānasya ca yaḥ kramaḥ siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:3702: kaḥ punaḥ sarvasya niravaśeṣasya ca bhedaḥ?
SA10canprasu:3704: sarve ete pañcāpi pakṣāḥ agnīndhanavadātmopādānayorapyavikalā ḍhaukanīyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3706: tena niravaśeṣeṇa ātmopādānayoḥ pratiṣedho veditavyaḥ ityanena sarvātmanā pratiṣedhasāmyamagnīndhanābhyāmātmopādānayorveditavyamityupadarśanārthaṃ sarvo nirava śeṣeṇetyāha /
SA10canprasu:3713: yata evaṃ pañcasu prakāreṣu ātmano na sattvam,
SA10canprasu:3719: ghaṭādayo hi kāryakāraṇabhūta avayavāvayavibhūtā lakṣaṇalakṣyabhūtā guṇnaguṇibhūtā vā syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:3727_0: tadevaṃ karmakārakavadātmopādānayorghaṭādīnāṃ ca parasparāpekṣikyāṃ siddhau vyavasthitāyāṃ
SA10canprasu:3728: ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
SA10canprasu:3730: tatra saha tena vartata iti satat,
SA10canprasu:3740: evaṃ yena kāraṇena mṛdādinā ghaṭaḥ prajñapyate,
SA10canprasu:3742: evamātmano bhāvānāṃ ca satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti,
SA10canprasu:3743: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādastha śāśvatocchedarahitasya upādāyaprajñaptyabhidhānasya tattvaṃ paśyanti /
SA10canprasu:3754: evaṃ ca agnīndhanaparīkṣayā adhigatadharmatattvaparamasya yoginaḥ kalpenākālālipsitairapi naiva vapurdahyate rāgadveṣamohahutāśanairapi vā iti /
SA10canprasu:3756: yatha gagaṇu na jātu dagdhapūrvaṃ subahubhi kalpaśatairhi dahyamānam /
SA10canprasu:3757: gaganasama vijānamāna dharmān so 'pi na dahyati jātu sāgnimadhye //
SA10canprasu:3758: sarvi hi jvalamāṇi buddhakṣetre praṇidhi karoti samādhiye sthihitvā /
SA10canprasu:3759: jvalata ayu praśāmyatāmaśeṣa pṛthivi vinaśyipi naivasyānyathātvam //
SA10canprasu:3761: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāmu trayebhi saṃgatiḥ /
SA10canprasu:3762: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtu kārya laghū nirudhyate //
SA10canprasu:3763: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta ayamāgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA10canprasu:3764: vidiśo diśa sarvi mārgato nāgatirnāsya gatiśca labhyati //
SA10canprasu:3765: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya ādhyātmika śūnya bāhirāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3767: imu īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṃkaradarśane tvayā //
SA10canprasu:3769: anubuddha yatha tvayātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣān //
SA10canprasu:3773: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau agnīndhanaparīkṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3780: kasya pañcagatike ājavaṃjavībhāvena janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:3781: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:3782: avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇāgaṇḍurabaddhānāṃ saṃsaratāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyata iti /
SA10canprasu:3793: yadi hi saṃsāro nāma kaścit syāt,
SA10canprasu:3797: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti /
SA10canprasu:3800: saṃsāra eva nāstīti nanu spaṣṭamādeśayāmāsa bhagavān /
SA10canprasu:3805: atredaṃ vicāryate- yadi pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca saṃsārasya niṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā,
SA10canprasu:3806: kathaṃ punaridamāha- tasmāttarhi saṃsārakṣayāya pratipatsyāmaha ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam, iti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:3809: teṣāṃ tu lokottaramārgajñānāgninā dagdhāśeṣakleśavāsanāmūlaniḥśeṣapādapānāṃ bhavatyeva antaḥ iti vijñeyam //
SA10canprasu:3813: yathā bījasya dṛṣṭo 'nto na cādistasya vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3815: sa ca antopadeśo laukika eva vyavahāre sthitvā saṃsāracārakāvabaddhānāmutsāhanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ deśito laukikajñānāpekṣayā /
SA10canprasu:3820: atrāha- yadyevaṃ laukikajñānāpekṣayā antavad ādirapi kiṃ nocyate? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:3821: ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgāt laukikajñānāpekṣayāpi saṃsārasyāderabhāva ityubhayathāpyāderabhāva eveti vijñeyam // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3822: atrāha- yadyāpi avarāgre na staḥ saṃsārasya,
SA10canprasu:3830: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA10canprasu:3842: ata eva saṃsārābhāvājjātijarāmaraṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparasahakramā api naiva santītyāha-
SA10canprasu:3851: jarāmaraṇarahitasya bhāvasya jātau parikalpyamānāyāmanyatra amṛtasyaiva devadattasya prathamamiha jātiḥ parikalpyamānā syāt /
SA10canprasu:3856: atha syāt- āmrādīnāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ vināpi jarāmaraṇasaṃbandhāt prathamameva utpādo dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA10canprasu:3860: āmrādīnāmapi hi svabījanirodhe samutpadyamānatvāt nānyatrāvinaṣṭānāmutpāda iti samametat pūrveṇa //
SA10canprasu:3865: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:3880: yatha ukkhitte loḍhammi ukkheve atthi kāraṇaṃ /
SA10canprasu:3881: ṣaḍane kāraṇaṃ ṇatthi aṇṇaṃ ukkhevakāraṇā // iti /
SA10canprasu:3885: jātihetukatvāccāsyodgamanameva vināśasya heturiti kṛtvā eṣāpi gāthā sunītā bhavati-
SA10canprasu:3887: sa bhāva eva dhammāṇaṃ yaṃ vibhonti samuggatā //
SA10canprasu:3896: na caivaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ yajjāyamāna eva mriyate iti /
SA10canprasu:3899: na hi sahabhūtayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayoranyonyahetukatā dṛṣṭeti na yuktametat // 5 //
SA10canprasu:3902: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3903: yasyāṃ jātau yatra jarāmaraṇe ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ na santi,
SA10canprasu:3908: evamavidyamāneṣu jātyādiṣu tāṃ jātibhavidyamānāṃ bālāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti tacca jarāmaraṇaṃ yanna saṃvidyate?
SA10canprasu:3913: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
SA10canprasu:3914: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana // 7 //
SA10canprasu:3915: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
SA10canprasu:3917: tatra yadi pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paścātkāryaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3924: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya vyākhyānena kāryakāraṇādikaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam,
SA10canprasu:3926: teṣāmapi pūrvā koṭirna vidyata iti yojyam //
SA10canprasu:3927: ata eva āryaratnameghasūtre āryasarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇā mahābodhisattvena bhagavān stutaḥ-
SA10canprasu:3931: ādita śūnya anāgata dharmā no gata asthita sthānaviviktāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3932: nityamasāraka māyasabhāvāḥ śuddha viśuddha nabhopama sarvi //
SA10canprasu:3933: yaṃ ca pabhāṣati dharma jinasya taṃ ca na paśyati so 'kṣayatāya /
SA10canprasu:3934: ādinirātma nisattvimi dharmāstāṃśca ca pabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti /
SA10canprasu:3935: kalpita buccati kalpitamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe /
SA10canprasu:3936: koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdeti anāgati pratyayatāye //
SA10canprasu:3937: karma kriyā ca pravartati evaṃ hīnautkṛṣṭatayā samudenti /
SA10canprasu:3939: jaḍḍaka dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān //
SA10canprasu:3941: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā nāmaikādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3949: tena ca duḥkhena kasyacidbhavitavyaṃ na nirāśrayeṇeti,
SA10canprasu:3950: ato vidyata eva duḥkhasyāśrayaḥ, sa cātmeti /
SA10canprasu:3953: taddhi bhavet svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā parakṛtaṃ vā ubhayakṛtaṃ vā heturahitaṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:3954: sarvathā ca iṣyamāṇaṃ tatkāryameva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3956: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3957: tatraike vādinaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3961: sarvathā ca tadduḥkhamiṣyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na yujyate,
SA10canprasu:3964: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
SA10canprasu:3966: yasmādimān maraṇāntikān skandhān pratītya ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā utpadyante tasmātsvayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti nopapadyate // 2 //
SA10canprasu:3967: idānīṃ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:3969: yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
SA10canprasu:3971: yadā amībhyo maraṇāntikebhyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā anye syuḥ,
SA10canprasu:3972: ebhyo vā aupapattyāṃśikebhyaḥ amī maraṇāntikā skandhāḥ pare syuḥ,
SA10canprasu:3976: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:3977: na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // iti /
SA10canprasu:3981: tadā sati anyatve etaiḥ parabhūtaiḥ skandhairamī parabhūtāḥ kṛtā iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3984: atha syāt- na brūmo yasmādduḥkhenaiva duḥkhaṃ kṛtam,
SA10canprasu:3988: ityataḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti brūmaḥ / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:3990: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3991: yadetanmanuṣyaduḥkhaṃ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ pudgalena kṛtamiti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:3992: kalpyatāmasau pudgalo yena tadduḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam /
SA10canprasu:3996: athāpi manuṣyaduḥkhopādānena pudgalena tadeva duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4002: evaṃ tāvat svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavati // 4 //
SA10canprasu:4008: tasmāttasya pudgalasya tadduḥkhaṃ parapudgalajameva bhavati / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:4010: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:4012: tena ca manuṣyapudgalena tadduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā parasmai devapudgalāya pradīyata iti sa devapudgalo devaduḥkhavinirmuktaḥ kuto yasmai pradīyeteti /
SA10canprasu:4013: evaṃ tāvadaparapudgalajasya duḥkhasya pratigrāhaka eva nāsti // 5 //
SA10canprasu:4017: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat // 6 //
SA10canprasu:4019: sa manuṣyopādānavyatiriktaḥ katamo yo devapudgalāya devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā praheṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4023: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam // 7 //
SA10canprasu:4029: tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam,
SA10canprasu:4030: tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:4033: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam /
SA10canprasu:4035: itaśca svaparābhyāṃ duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ na yujyate,
SA10canprasu:4043: sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt /
SA10canprasu:4045: sa kathamavidyamānasvabhāvaḥ san paraṃ kariṣyatīti na yuktametat // 8 //
SA10canprasu:4048: yadi hi ekaikena duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ syāt syāttadānīmubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkham /
SA10canprasu:4050: na caikaikena prāṇātipāte kṛte dvābhyāṃ kṛta iti vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4058: tadidānīṃ kuta eva nirhetukaṃ bhaviṣyati khapuṣpasaugandhyavat?
SA10canprasu:4061: evaṃ bāhyā api bījāṅkuraghaṭapaṭādayo bhāvā veditavyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4063: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:4068: tatkatamena tarhi idānīṃ prakāreṇa eṣāṃ siddhiriti /
SA10canprasu:4071: niyatameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ prakārāṇāmanyatamena prakāreṇa siddhiḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4075: mṛgyate, tadā karmakārakaparīkṣāprakaraṇavihitavidhinā yathoditapakṣacatuṣṭayatiraskāreṇa idaṃpratyayatāmātrārthapratītyasamutpādasiddhayā siddhirabhyupeyā / yathoktam-
SA10canprasu:4077: tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam // iti //
SA10canprasu:4080: saṃvṛti bhāṣitu dharma jinena saṃskṛta 'saṃskṛta paśyatha eva /
SA10canprasu:4081: nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā ettaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya //
SA10canprasu:4082: kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam /
SA10canprasu:4083: no 'pi tu saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti //
SA10canprasu:4084: sarvi bhavā alikā vasikāśca riktaka tucchaka phenasamāśca /
SA10canprasu:4085: māyamarīcisamā sada śūnyā deśituḥ saṃvṛtu te ca viviktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:4087: evimu saṃskṛta sarvi vijāna māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam //
SA10canprasu:4089: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau duḥkhaparīkṣā nāma dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:4093: yataścaivaṃ samanantarātikrāntaprakaraṇavidhinā svaparobhayakṛtatvamahetusamutpanatvaṃ ca nirūpyamāṇaṃ bhāvānāmasat,
SA10canprasu:4095: utpannarūpatvena caite bhāvā avidyātimiropahatamatinayanānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ khyānti,
SA10canprasu:4096: tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāṃ visaṃvādakā māyākarituragādivat tadanabhijñānāṃ na tu vijñānām /
SA10canprasu:4099: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā // 1 //
SA10canprasu:4100: sūtre uktam- tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadidaṃ saṃskṛtam /
SA10canprasu:4101: etaddhi khalu bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yadidamamoṣadharma nirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:4106: tadanena nyāyena yanmoṣadharma tanmṛṣetyevaṃ yasmāduktavāṃstathāgato bhagavān,
SA10canprasu:4108: tasmānmoṣadharmakatvena te saṃskārā mṛṣā bhavanti citrakarayantradārikāvat,
SA10canprasu:4111: ato niḥsvabhāvatvena mṛṣā sarvasaṃskārāḥ moṣadharmakatvāt marīcikādijalavat /
SA10canprasu:4114: tataśca vihitayā upapattyā asmāccāgamāt siddhaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam /
SA10canprasu:4115: śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena iti ca prajñāpāramitā- ardhaśatikāpāṭhāt // 1 //
SA10canprasu:4116: atrāha- yadyevaṃ moṣadharmakatvena sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavatā,
SA10canprasu:4117: nanvevaṃ sati na santi sarve bhāvā iti sarvapadārthāpavādinī mithyādṛṣṭireva syāt /
SA10canprasu:4122: tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
SA10canprasu:4135: tanna bhāvānāmabhāvaparidīpakam kiṃ tarhi śūnyatāparidīpakam svabhāvānutpādaparidīpakamityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4138: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto no tasya utpādu sabhāvato 'sti /
SA10canprasu:4139: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4148: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt,
SA10canprasu:4153: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:4156: na ca asati dharmiṇi tadāśrito dharma upapadyate /
SA10canprasu:4157: na hi asati vandhyātanaye tacchayāmatopapadyata iti /
SA10canprasu:4166: iha yo dharmo yaṃ padārthaṃ na vyabhicarati,
SA10canprasu:4169: agnerauṣṇyaṃ hi loke tadavyabhicāritvāt svabhāva ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:4174: evaṃ bhāvānāṃ sati svabhāvābhyupagame 'nyathātvameva na saṃbhavet /
SA10canprasu:4177: api ca / ayamanyathābhāvo bhāvānāṃ naiva saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:4183: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:4184: tasyaiva tāvat prāgvat prāgavasthāyāṃ vartamānasya bhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:4185: tathā hi yūno yuvāvasthāyāmeva vartamānasya nāsti anyathātvam /
SA10canprasu:4194: kiṃ hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ kuryāt?
SA10canprasu:4195: tadāgamanāntareṇa jīrṇatābhāvājjīrṇo jīryata iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:4205: yadi kṣīraṃ dadhi bhavatīti neṣyate parasparavirodhāt-
SA10canprasu:4209: tadevamanyathātvāsaṃbhavāt kutastaddarśanāt sasvabhāvatā bhāvānāṃ prasetsyatīti na yuktametat /
SA10canprasu:4211: yo na pi jāyati no cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4212: taṃ jinu darśayatī narasiṃha tatra nideśayi sattva maharṣī //
SA10canprasu:4213: yasya svabhāva na vidyati kaści no 'parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4214: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4215: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gatī upapadyati kāci /
SA10canprasu:4216: tatra ca vyoharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayasī bahusattvān //
SA10canprasu:4218: sarvi vadesi nirātmaka dharmān sattvatu grāhatu mocasi lokam /
SA10canprasu:4219: mukta svayaṃ gatito gatimukto tenasi pāragato na ca tīrṇaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4220: pāragato 'si bhavārṇavatīrṇaḥ pāragato na ca labhyati kaści /
SA10canprasu:4221: pāru na vidyati nāpi apāru pāragato 'smi vadesi ca vākyam //
SA10canprasu:4222: vāca na vidyati yāṃ ca vadesi yaṃ pi vadesi na vidyati taṃ pi /
SA10canprasu:4223: yasya vadesi na vidyati so 'pi yo 'pi vijānati so 'pi asanto //
SA10canprasu:4224: tatra praṇaṣṭu jagaṃ imu sarvaṃ vitathavikalpaniveśavaśena /
SA10canprasu:4225: śānta vijānati yo naru dharmāṃ stehi tathāgatu dṛṣṭa svayaṃbhūḥ //
SA10canprasu:4226: śānta prajānati dharma praṇītān prīti sa vindati toṣati sattvān /
SA10canprasu:4227: so bhavatī jinu jitvena kleśān ātma ............ /
SA10canprasu:4228: tena vijānita bodhi jinānāṃ buddhiya bodhayate sa jagaṃ pi /
SA10canprasu:4235: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati // 7 //
SA10canprasu:4239: iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti /
SA10canprasu:4240: yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi,
SA10canprasu:4245: tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam // 7 //
SA10canprasu:4246: atrāha- trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante /
SA10canprasu:4247: yeṣāmupadeśārthameva buddhā bhagavanto 'śeṣatīrthyavādamahāmohāndhakārānugatajagati jagadekapradīpā nairātmyopadeśāvicchinnaśikhā utpadyante /
SA10canprasu:4248: sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān,
SA10canprasu:4251: aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā,
SA10canprasu:4252: kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate /
SA10canprasu:4256: iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā /
SA10canprasu:4259: tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto 'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4261: sa cet 'dehi bhostadeva mahyaṃ nakiṃcinnāma paṇyam,
SA10canprasu:4265: kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti?
SA10canprasu:4266: ato mahābhaiṣajye 'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te /
SA10canprasu:4276: ye hi kāśyapa śūnyatopalambhena śūnyatāṃ pratisaranti,
SA10canprasu:4288: tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /
SA10canprasu:4289: tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet?
SA10canprasu:4292: yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /
SA10canprasu:4293: bhagavānāha- evameva kāśyapa sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:4296: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskāraparīkṣā nāma trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:4309: tathā saṃjñā ca vedanā ca saṃsṛṣṭāvetau dharmau nāsaṃsṛṣṭāviti saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4315: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4320: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo nāsti /
SA10canprasu:4324: ityevaṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:4326: yathā ca draṣṭavyadarśanadraṣṭaṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ sarvaśaśca saṃsargābhāvaḥ,
SA10canprasu:4327: evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
SA10canprasu:4337: te ete dveṣadviṣṭadveṣaṇīyādinā traidhena śrotraśrotṛśrotavyādinā ca // 2 //
SA10canprasu:4343: tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4349: na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:4356: iha yadetad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyaditi vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:4362: yacca paṭākhyaṃ vastu anyad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu pratītya anyadbhavati,
SA10canprasu:4368: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:4372: taṃ ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ paṭamapekṣya anyo ghaṭaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4380: yadi hi etad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyasmādanyat syāt,
SA10canprasu:4381: tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu anyasmādapi paṭākhyādṛte anyadbhavet,
SA10canprasu:4382: tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:4386: sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:4389: na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam/
SA10canprasu:4393: nanu idamapi tadā na saṃbhavati vaktum- yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti,
SA10canprasu:4397: ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā /
SA10canprasu:4399: yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne 'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:4400: atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:4401: naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate,
SA10canprasu:4405: yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke- ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti,
SA10canprasu:4408: atrāha- yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4411: kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo 'sti,
SA10canprasu:4412: tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate,
SA10canprasu:4416: ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā?
SA10canprasu:4422: sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva,
SA10canprasu:4424: ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:4426: tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:4427: yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:4430: tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham //
SA10canprasu:4433: na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati,
SA10canprasu:4437: tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4442: iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:4443: tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ saṃgatiḥ sparśa iti saṃsargo 'sti /
SA10canprasu:4444: tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti /
SA10canprasu:4446: syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:4450: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10canprasu:4452: sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā?
SA10canprasu:4454: na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:4456: na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate /
SA10canprasu:4457: evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:4467: na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:4471: yasmādyadā saṃsarga eva nāstīti pratipāditam, asati ca (Pp_113)
SA10canprasu:4479: sarvasayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam /
SA10canprasu:4481: ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣu rūpa manorama citravicitram /
SA10canprasu:4482: yena ca yogasamāśrita cakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci //
SA10canprasu:4483: te parinirvṛta laukika śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:4484: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅga vivarjiya sattva vinenti //
SA10canprasu:4485: no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści sattvahitaṃ ca karonti jinendrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:4486: ............. sattvu na asti karonti ca artham //
SA10canprasu:4490: bhāvitu mārga pavartitu jñāna śūnyaka dharma nirātmaka sarvi /
SA10canprasu:4492: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃsargaparīkṣā nāma caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:4498: iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya /
SA10canprasu:4499: upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4504: yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4507: atha syāt- naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4508: kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti /
SA10canprasu:4511: atha syāt- iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam,
SA10canprasu:4512: tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti,
SA10canprasu:4514: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10canprasu:4516: iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ,
SA10canprasu:4518: sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:4523: tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ- yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt,
SA10canprasu:4529: nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti /
SA10canprasu:4531: etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ- nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt /
SA10canprasu:4532: avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4533: yathā hi (Pp_115) taimirikāḥ timirapratyayādasantameva keśādisvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4534: evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:4536: bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam /
SA10canprasu:4539: tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat bālajanamatiparikalpitānupalabdhasvabhāvairāryaiḥ pura ucyate parahitavyāpāraiḥ,
SA10canprasu:4544: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4547: svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:4549: atrāha- yadi khalu idamagnyāderauṣṇyādikaṃ hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvena kṛtakatvānniḥsvabhāvamityucyate,
SA10canprasu:4550: kimidānīṃ tatsvabhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ kaścāsau svabhāva iti vaktavyam / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:4551: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca // 2 //
SA10canprasu:4552: iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:4554: yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam /
SA10canprasu:4555: yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4557: yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram /
SA10canprasu:4558: yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:4559: ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:4563: yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat dīrghahrasvavadvā,
SA10canprasu:4566: na tadasti, na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ /
SA10canprasu:4568: tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4570: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
SA10canprasu:4575: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
SA10canprasu:4591: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avidyātimiraprabhāvopalabdhaṃ bhāvajātaṃ yenātmanā vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti,
SA10canprasu:4594: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
SA10canprasu:4596: sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:4598: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
SA10canprasu:4599: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim //
SA10canprasu:4603: tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:4607: iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:4610: yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:4616: sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet,
SA10canprasu:4620: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati // 4 //
SA10canprasu:4622: bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet,
SA10canprasu:4637: iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat,
SA10canprasu:4639: ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke /
SA10canprasu:4643: tadevaṃ sarvathā svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāveṣu anupapadyamāneṣu avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītam-
SA10canprasu:4644: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
SA10canprasu:4645: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane // 6 //
SA10canprasu:4654: vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti,
SA10canprasu:4656: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti /
SA10canprasu:4660: ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4662: ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt,
SA10canprasu:4664: āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:4673: yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko 'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:4686: tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham,
SA10canprasu:4693: iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti //
SA10canprasu:4695: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
SA10canprasu:4696: tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4697: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4698: vivādaprāptyā na duḥkhaṃ praśāmyati avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:4699: atrāha- yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4703: api ca / yadi ayameṣāmagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4704: tasya vidyamānasya sato na syāt punaranyathātvamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:4708: tadā asya svabhāvasya prakṛtyā vidyamānasya punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:4714: evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4717: atrāha- yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate,
SA10canprasu:4720: kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4725: yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:4727: kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4728: tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva /
SA10canprasu:4733: tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati,
SA10canprasu:4740: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:4746: pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate /
SA10canprasu:4750: nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam,
SA10canprasu:4753: yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate,
SA10canprasu:4756: sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:4757: viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ- na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:4760: yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti,
SA10canprasu:4765: tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto 'ntadvayaparihāraḥ?
SA10canprasu:4775: tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ sāṃmitīyapudgalavādavat,
SA10canprasu:4779: yasmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:4782: bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi /
SA10canprasu:4784: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvi acintiya sarvi abhūtaṃ /
SA10canprasu:4785: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāḥ te dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu //
SA10canprasu:4786: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānatī sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
SA10canprasu:4787: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim // iti /
SA10canprasu:4789: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatīta adhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4791: sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarvāṇa dharmāṇabhāva deśayi /
SA10canprasu:4792: tadānurūpaṃ kṛta nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñayī //
SA10canprasu:4793: devāpi sarve pramumocu śabdaṃ abhāvanāmeti jino bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:4794: yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakraman abhāva dharmāṇa samaṃ prakāśayī //
SA10canprasu:4795: buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ /
SA10canprasu:4798: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4799: tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya ravu niścarī lokavināyakasya // iti /
SA10canprasu:4801: na vidyate sattā svabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4806: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ / ityādi /
SA10canprasu:4808: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau svabhāvaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:4814: iha saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsṛtiḥ gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāra ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:4817: na hi avidyamānānāṃ vandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:4818: tasmāt saṃsārasadbhāvāt vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti /
SA10canprasu:4824: sa niyataṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vā bhavet sattvasya vā?
SA10canprasu:4827: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
SA10canprasu:4828: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // 1 //
SA10canprasu:4830: kiṃ te nityāḥ saṃsaranti uta anityāḥ?
SA10canprasu:4839: athāpi syāt- anityā eva santo hetuphalasaṃbandhaparaṃparayā avicchinnakramāḥ saṃtānena ca pravartamānāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti /
SA10canprasu:4849: uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet,
SA10canprasu:4854: kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4855: na hi eko devadattaḥ ekadā pūrvaścottaraśceti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:4856: evamihāpi ekatvāt pūrvottarakṣaṇavyapadeśa eva na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4857: api ca pūrvakṣaṇo naṣṭa iti na syāduttarakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt /
SA10canprasu:4878: yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti,
SA10canprasu:4880: tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti //
SA10canprasu:4881: atraike varṇayanti- satyaṃ saṃskārā na saṃsaranti utpattividhuratvāt,
SA10canprasu:4887: iti vicāryamāṇe ya eva saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇānupapattikramaḥ,
SA10canprasu:4890: atrāha- naiva hi sattvasaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsārānupapattikramaḥ samo bhavitumarhati,
SA10canprasu:4894: tasmādātmaiva saṃsaratīti na coktadoṣaprasaṅga iti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:4910: ityevaṃ pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati pūrvoditena nyāyena /
SA10canprasu:4911: yaścedānīṃ skandhāyatanadhātuṣvevaṃ vicāryamāṇaḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:4920: yadi anupādānasya sato 'sya saṃsāro yuktaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4921: kathaṃ punarasya anupādānatā prasajyata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:4923: iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā?
SA10canprasu:4925: tadā pūrvopādānasya parityāgāduttarasya cānupādānāttadantarāle vibhavaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4931: yaśca anupādāno nirañjano 'vyakto nirhetukaḥ, kaḥ saḥ?
SA10canprasu:4934: tasmiṃścāsati tadabhāvādeva upādānamapi nirupādātṛkaṃ nāstīti kiṃ saṃsariṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4943: pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:4947: taiśca sopādānatvāt sopādānaṃ saṃsarato 'pi na vibhavatāprasaṅga iti /
SA10canprasu:4957: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre 'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4958: na ca sarvātmanā ekasya padārthasya abhinnapadārthasya viṣaye yugapat tyāgopādāne dṛṣṭe /
SA10canprasu:4959: na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:4960: atha ekena pādena ekasya parityāgādaparasya copādānād yugapattyāgopādāne parikalpyete,
SA10canprasu:4961: nanu evaṃ sati pādadvayavad dvayātmakatā ātmanaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4963: tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam /
SA10canprasu:4964: tasmādantarābhavopādāne 'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ //
SA10canprasu:4982: tat parikalpyamānaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānāṃ vā parikalpyeta anityānāṃ vā?
SA10canprasu:4984: anityānāmapi asaṃvidyamānānāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāditi sarvaṃ pūrveṇa tulyam /
SA10canprasu:4987: tadapi nityasya vā anityasya vā pūrvavannopapadyate //
SA10canprasu:4989: nanvevaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pyātmāstītyabhyupeta bhavati saṃsāra iva /
SA10canprasu:4992: na ca nirvāṇe upādānamastīti kuto 'sya avācyatā?
SA10canprasu:4994: api tu kimasau nirvāṇe 'sti uta nāsti?
SA10canprasu:4995: yadi asti, tadā mokṣe 'pi tasya sadbhāvānnityatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:4996: atha nāsti, tadā anitya ātmā syāt /
SA10canprasu:4997: tataśca tattvānyatvāvācyatāvannityānityatvenāpi ātmanaḥ avaktavyateti na syāt /
SA10canprasu:5001: na tarhi nirupādāno 'sāvātmā nirvāṇe vijñeyatvāt saṃsāra iva /
SA10canprasu:5008: buddhadharmā āyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamā ityādi /
SA10canprasu:5013: mana evamotarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam //
SA10canprasu:5015: nirodhasatyaṃ supinaṃ yathaiva svapnasvabhāvāmatha nirvṛtiṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:5016: yeneha vācottari bodhisattvo ayaṃ khu so vuccati vācasaṃvaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:5021: tasmād bandhamokṣasadbhāvād vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti /
SA10canprasu:5027: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:5028: iha ya ime rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ baddhānāmasvatantrīkaraṇe bandhanamiti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:5029: yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:5030: tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudayavyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmutpādānantaradhvaṃsināṃ naṣṭānāmasattvānna saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:5033: yathā ca pūrvoktavidhinā saṃskārāṇāṃ bandhamokṣau na saṃbhavataḥ,
SA10canprasu:5034: evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo 'pi na badhyate nāpi mucyate,
SA10canprasu:5036: atrāha- yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti,
SA10canprasu:5055: yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate,
SA10canprasu:5059: yadā caivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ bandhanaṃ na kaṃcidapi badhnāti,
SA10canprasu:5060: tadā kaṃcidapyabadhnata upādānasya rāgādeḥ kuto bandhanatvamiti /
SA10canprasu:5065: iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:5066: evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:5067: tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā /
SA10canprasu:5069: pūrvasiddhasya ca bandhanasya paścād bandhyena saha saṃbandhasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
SA10canprasu:5070: (Pp_128) bandhyasya ca bandhanātpṛthaksiddhasya pūvabandhanāpekṣāniṣprayojanatvācca nāsti bandhyādbandhanasya pūrvasiddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:5072: na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti bandhanam/
SA10canprasu:5078: baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate /
SA10canprasu:5082: tathāpi saṃsāracārakāgārāvabaddhānāmatrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikaistathāgataiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakarakandhatrayopadeśo yadarthamuktaḥ,
SA10canprasu:5088: ihāyaṃ mokṣaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ baddhasya vā parikalpyeta abaddhasya vā?
SA10canprasu:5091: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10canprasu:5093: tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt /
SA10canprasu:5094: atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt,
SA10canprasu:5095: na tarhi baddho mucyata iti vaktavyam,
SA10canprasu:5099: tadā samīpe syāt yadā tu kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ mokṣe iṣyamāṇe baddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavena mokṣābhāvaḥ pratipipādayiṣita tadā kuto vartamānasamīpatā?
SA10canprasu:5100: evaṃ tāvad baddho na mucyate iti sthitam //
SA10canprasu:5104: muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt,
SA10canprasu:5106: atha syāt- abaddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti,
SA10canprasu:5107: evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām /
SA10canprasu:5121_1: ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate-
SA10canprasu:5127: nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati,
SA10canprasu:5132: tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:5135_0: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtārthādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ
SA10canprasu:5136: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
SA10canprasu:5139: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
SA10canprasu:5141: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate /
SA10canprasu:5144: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
SA10canprasu:5148: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān,
SA10canprasu:5164: tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
SA10canprasu:5168: sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
SA10canprasu:5175: sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
SA10canprasu:5176: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:5177: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate,
SA10canprasu:5185: tasya kāṅkṣā ca vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
SA10canprasu:5188: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati //
SA10canprasu:5189: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
SA10canprasu:5199: sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati- ime kuśalā dharmāḥ,
SA10canprasu:5208: tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati yaṃ parikalpayet /
SA10canprasu:5209: bālapṛthagjanāstu etān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣanti ca muhyanti ca /
SA10canprasu:5211: tasya evamanāvyūhato 'nirvyūhataḥ traidhātuke citta na sajjati,
SA10canprasu:5216: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate // 10 //
SA10canprasu:5217: yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:5221: kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā /
SA10canprasu:5222: yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayorapyanupalabhyamānatvāt,
SA10canprasu:5227: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma,
SA10canprasu:5228: yanmāraḥ pāpīyānindrakīlabandhanabaddho dharaṇītalaprapatitaḥ utkrośati sma- gāḍhabandhanabaddho 'smi /
SA10canprasu:5229: mañjuśrīrāha- asti pāpīyannetasmādbandhanādgāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ yena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase?
SA10canprasu:5233: ato bandhanād gāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ na saṃvidyate /
SA10canprasu:5236: āha- kiṃ tvaṃ pāpīyannāttamanā bhūyāḥ yadi mucyethāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5239: atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam /
SA10canprasu:5241: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat- kenāsi pāpīyan baddho yadātmānamutsṛjasi?
SA10canprasu:5242: āha- na jāne mañjuśrīḥ- kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:5243: āha- yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī,
SA10canprasu:5262: ata eva āgamād asadviparyāsakalpanāmātralatābandhanavicchedo vimokṣo nirvāṇamityucyate svapnopalabdhadahanajvālānirvāpaṇavat tadanilasalilairiti // 10 //
SA10canprasu:5263: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau bandhamokṣaparīkṣā nāma ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:5269: yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:5271: yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:5272: saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare 'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati /
SA10canprasu:5274: kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate-
SA10canprasu:5276: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca // 1 //
SA10canprasu:5279: cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5281: ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam /
SA10canprasu:5282: tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛttividhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate //
SA10canprasu:5285: tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante /
SA10canprasu:5287: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca //
SA10canprasu:5291: kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti? netyāha /
SA10canprasu:5292: kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ,
SA10canprasu:5312: yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat /
SA10canprasu:5314: ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam /
SA10canprasu:5316: kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha- pretya ceha ca /
SA10canprasu:5320: evaṃ tāvat cittātmakamevaikaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpya punarapi dvividhaṃ bhagavatā-
SA10canprasu:5323: paramaścāsau ṛṣiśceti paramarṣiḥ sarvākāratayā paramārthagamanāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhyo 'pi utkṛṣṭatvāt paramarṣiḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān /
SA10canprasu:5332: manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñānasaṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA10canprasu:5336: evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate,
SA10canprasu:5341: evaṃ ca trividham- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca // 3 //
SA10canprasu:5342: etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate,
SA10canprasu:5343: ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo 'nuvarṇitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5348: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:5351: tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate /
SA10canprasu:5352: evaṃ kuśalo 'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate //
SA10canprasu:5356_0: tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ
SA10canprasu:5356_1: kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo 'pi akuśalakarmābhyupagamahetukāḥ
SA10canprasu:5357: kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
SA10canprasu:5359: yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5360_1: taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
SA10canprasu:5362: etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ //
SA10canprasu:5373: yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante,
SA10canprasu:5374: tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate,
SA10canprasu:5377: saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati- kuśalākuśalā vāk,
SA10canprasu:5384: ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:5387: atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi tāvat-
SA10canprasu:5390: yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:5391: tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt /
SA10canprasu:5394: pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:5401: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:5402: abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:5407: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:5411: iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate /
SA10canprasu:5413: tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate /
SA10canprasu:5414: ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate /
SA10canprasu:5415: tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati // 7 //
SA10canprasu:5426: yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo 'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam-
SA10canprasu:5430: tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu /
SA10canprasu:5431: ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:5435: yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta,
SA10canprasu:5442: tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ / te ca-
SA10canprasu:5444: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca // 11 //
SA10canprasu:5445: ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:5452: pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti,
SA10canprasu:5454: tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante /
SA10canprasu:5455: kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:5459: ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5460: te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:5461: asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5466: tān prati apare doṣamudbhāvya anyākṣepaparihāraṃ varṇayantaḥ āhuḥ-
SA10canprasu:5470: tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ saṃkhyābahutvena mahāntaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhena parapakṣe prāpruvanti /
SA10canprasu:5472: yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate,
SA10canprasu:5486: tataśca yo devaḥ sa deva eva syāt,
SA10canprasu:5487: yo manuṣyaḥ sa manuṣya eva syādityādi /
SA10canprasu:5488: tataśca akuśalamapi kurvatāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gatiyonivarṇabuddhīndriyabalarūpabhogādi vaicitryaṃ na syādapāyapatanaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:5490: evaṃ bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā yasmādbījasaṃtānasādharmyakalpanāyāṃ prasajyante,
SA10canprasu:5492: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
SA10canprasu:5497: iha kuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ sat utpādānantarameva nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:5500: tadā etasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśo nāma viprayukto dharmaḥ kartuḥ saṃtāne samupajāyate ṛṇapatrasthānīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5501: tadevaṃ patraṃ yathā avipraṇāśaḥ tathā veditavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5502: yasya ca asau avipraṇāśākhyo dharma utpadyate,
SA10canprasu:5504: yathā ca ṛṇapatrāvasthānāt prayukte 'pi dhane dhanino na dhananāśo bhavati,
SA10canprasu:5505: saṃbadhyata eva sa kālāntareṇa pañcamena dhanaskandhena,
SA10canprasu:5506: tathā vinaṣṭe 'pi karmaṇi avipraṇāśākhyadharmāntarāvasthānāt tannimittakena phalena abhisaṃbadhyata eva kartā /
SA10canprasu:5507: yathā ca ṛṇapatraṃ dāturdhanābhyāgamaṃ kṛtvā nirmuktaṃ sat punarapi vidyamānaṃ vā avidyamānaṃ vā na dhanābhyāgame samartham,
SA10canprasu:5508: evamavipraṇāśo 'pi dattavipākaḥ san vidyamāno vā avidyamāno vā na śaknoti nirmuktapatravat kartuḥ punarapi vipākasaṃbandhaṃ kartum //
SA10canprasu:5520: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
SA10canprasu:5522: pārthagjanikāni karmāṇi darśanamārgeṇaiva prahīyante mā bhūdāryaḥ pṛthagjanakarmasamanvāgata iti /
SA10canprasu:5524: kiṃ tu bhāvanāmārgeṇa vā tasyā prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:5530: yadi punarapi asya avipraṇāśasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇena prahāṇātprahāṇataḥ prahāṇaṃ syāt karmaṇaśca saṃkrameṇa karmaṇo vināśena karmāntarasaṃmukhībhāvena vināśaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:5539: evaṃ karmavadhādayo doṣāḥ prasajyante prahāṇataḥ praheyatvābhyupagame sati avipraṇāśasya /
SA10canprasu:5545: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sabhāgānāṃ ca viṣabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyadhātupratisaṃdhiṣu sarvakarmāpamardanaḥ eka eva avipraṇāśa utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:5546: sa cāpi sadhātūnāṃ samānadhātukānāmeva utpadyate na viṣabhāgadhātukānām // 17 //
SA10canprasu:5547: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
SA10canprasu:5549_0: sa cāyamavipraṇāśākhyo dharmaḥ sarvasyaiva karmaṇaḥ cetanācetayitvāsvabhāvasya sāsravānāsravabhedena
SA10canprasu:5549_1: vā dviprakārabhinnasya dṛṣṭe dharme ihaiva janmani karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ekaiko 'vipraṇāśa utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:5550: sa cāyamavipraṇāśo vipakke 'pi vipāke nāvaśyaṃ nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:5551: nirbhuktapatravacca vidyamāno 'pi san na śaknoti punarapi vipaktum // 18 //
SA10canprasu:5553: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet // 19 //
SA10canprasu:5557: pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnāmeka utpadyate tu saḥ / iti /
SA10canprasu:5561: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:5570: bījasaṃtānasādharmyaparikalpanābhāvācca nānāgatijātiyonidhātubhedabhinnaśca pāñcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vicitraḥ siddho bhavati /
SA10canprasu:5575: evaṃ niravaśeṣāvidyānidrāpagamādvibuddhena bhagavatā yasmādayaṃ dharmo deśitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:5578: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati // iti,
SA10canprasu:5581: atrocyate- kimiha bhavanto gandharvanagaraprākārapatanātiśaṅkitayā atīvodvignāḥ tatparirakṣāpariśramāyāsamāpannāḥ,
SA10canprasu:5582: ye nāma yūyaṃ karmaṇyanupapadyamāne tatphalanimittaṃ vipravadadhvam?
SA10canprasu:5596: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // iti?
SA10canprasu:5601: avaśyaṃ caitadevaṃ vijñeyam- niḥsvabhāvaṃ karmeti / anyathā hi-
SA10canprasu:5603: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam // 22 //
SA10canprasu:5613: yacca vidyamānaṃ tasya karaṇānupapatteḥ tannaiva kāraṇamapekṣata iti // 22 //
SA10canprasu:5614: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi akṛta eva sakalasya lokasya vipāko yasmāt, tataśca-
SA10canprasu:5621: tasyāpi akṛtamapi sat tat karma astyeveti tenāpyasya saṃbandhādakṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5626: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5628: ye hi ete kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣādayaḥ kriyārambhāḥ phalārthamārabhyante,
SA10canprasu:5637: ubhayorapi puṇyapāpakṛtoḥ akṛtayorapi puṇyapāpayoḥ pratyekaṃ vidyamānatvāt // 24 //
SA10canprasu:5644: yasmāt tatkarma vyavasthitamasti tasmānniḥsaṃśayaṃ yathopavarṇitā doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti sasvabhāvatve /
SA10canprasu:5660: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
SA10canprasu:5661: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham // 26 //
SA10canprasu:5666: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmātkleśā na tattvataḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:5671: atrāha- vidyanta eva kleśā karmāṇi ca,
SA10canprasu:5681: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā // 27 //
SA10canprasu:5684: tataśca karma kleśā yadā na santi,
SA10canprasu:5685: tadā tatkāryāṇāṃ dehānāmasattve kā kathā bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:5694: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ // 28 //
SA10canprasu:5695: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamaḥ saṃmoha iti paryāyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5703: atha ca punaridaṃ pāpaṃ karma svayameva kṛtam,
SA10canprasu:5704: asya svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti vacanāt /
SA10canprasu:5710: atrocyate- syātkarmaṇaḥ kartā karmaphalasya copabhoktā yadi karmaiva syāt /
SA10canprasu:5715: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam /
SA10canprasu:5716: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati // 30 //
SA10canprasu:5724: tadapi- hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca ityādinā karmakārakaparīkṣāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:5725: yataścaivaṃ pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā karmedaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:5727: yadā caivaṃ karma ca kartā ca nāsti,
SA10canprasu:5728: tadā nirhetukaṃ karmajaṃ phalaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti,
SA10canprasu:5729: asati ca phale kuta eva phalabhoktā bhaviṣyatīti,
SA10canprasu:5732: atrāha- yadi evaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati,
SA10canprasu:5733: yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā- svayaṃ kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti,
SA10canprasu:5741: atha manyase- niḥsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vyāpārakaraṇānupapatteḥ tadavastha eva doṣa iti,
SA10canprasu:5745: tathāhi niḥsvabhāvā eva santo ghaṭādayaḥ loke svakāryakṛt upalabhyante // 30 //
SA10canprasu:5748: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ // 31 //
SA10canprasu:5749: tadyathā- ekaṃ nirmitakaṃ śāstā buddho bhagavān ṛddhisaṃpadā ṛddhiprabhāveṇa nirmimīta,
SA10canprasu:5750: sa cāpi nirmitakaḥ punaḥ yo 'yaṃ buddhena bhagavatā nirmitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:5752: tatra ya eṣa nirmitakaḥ aparasya nirmitakasya nirmātā,
SA10canprasu:5760: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam /
SA10canprasu:5762: yo hyatra karmaṇaḥ kartā sa nirmitakākāraḥ svabhāvaśūnyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5763: tena ca svabhāvaśūnyena svatantrakartrā yat kiṃcit karma kriyate,
SA10canprasu:5765: tadyathā nirmitakena anyo nirmitako nirmitaḥ tathā veditavyam /
SA10canprasu:5771: yada sugatu kathāṃ katheti nātho vīthigatān manujān kṛpāyamānaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5772: nirmita jinu tatra nirminitva vicarati teṣu praṇītabuddhadharmān //
SA10canprasu:5775: kada vaya labhi jñānamevarūpaṃ āśaya jñātva jino 'sya vyākaroti //
SA10canprasu:5776: raśmi śatasahasra aprameyān avasiri pādatalehi dharmarājā /
SA10canprasu:5777: sarvi niraya śītalā bhavanti dukhamapanīya sukhaṃ ca vedayanti //
SA10canprasu:5778: dharma daśabalaprabhāṣite 'tra marumanujāna viśuddha bhoti cakṣuḥ /
SA10canprasu:5780: keci spṛha janenti tatra kāle parama acintya tehi labdhalābhā /
SA10canprasu:5781: yehi jinu nimantrito narendro na ca pariyanta teṣu dakṣiṇāyā //
SA10canprasu:5784_3: saṃtarpya prītyākāraṃ nāma mahāsamādhiṃ lambhayāmāsa / iti //
SA10canprasu:5789: api ca amībhyo dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ sphuṭaṃ naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratīyatāmiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:5790: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca /
SA10canprasu:5803: pañca ca bhikṣuśatāni dhyānalābhīni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāmanavabudhyamānāni anavataranti anavagāhamānāni anadhimucyamānāni /
SA10canprasu:5804: bhagavānāha- tathā hyete kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ ābhimānikāḥ imāmanāsravāṃ śīlaviśuddhiṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante /
SA10canprasu:5805: gambhīraḥ kāśyapa gāthābhinirhāro gambhīrā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:5808: etāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni kāśyapasya tathāgatasya pravacane 'nyatīrthikaśrāvakā abhūvan /
SA10canprasu:5809: taireva tasya kāśyapasya tathāgatasyāntikādupālambhābhiprāyaireṣā dharmadeśanā śrutā /
SA10canprasu:5811: evaṃtairvāg bhāṣitā- āścaryaṃ yāvat madhurapriyamāṇī kāśyapastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
SA10canprasu:5812: ta etenaikacittaprasādena pratilabdhena kālagatāḥ trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5814: tenaiva ca hetunā iha mama śāsane pravrajitāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5815_0: tānyetāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni dṛṣṭipraskandhāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ
SA10canprasu:5815_1: nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante
SA10canprasu:5818: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma- gaccha subhūte,
SA10canprasu:5820: subhūtirāha- bhagavata eva tāvadete bhāṣitaṃ vilomayanti,
SA10canprasu:5822: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣāvo gacchanti sma,
SA10canprasu:5823: tasmin mārge drau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma /
SA10canprasu:5824: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena mārgeṇa tau dvau bhikṣū nirmitakau tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
SA10canprasu:5828: ..... tānyapi pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmantau bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
SA10canprasu:5830: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5834: kaścitpunaratra kāyaḥ ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo va,
SA10canprasu:5838: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣayiṣyatha?
SA10canprasu:5839: te 'vocan- na te adhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
SA10canprasu:5841: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmaphalaparīkṣā nāma saptadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:5845: atrāha- yadi kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca sarvametanna tattvam,
SA10canprasu:5846: kevalaṃtu gandharvanagarādivadattatvameva sat tattvākāreṇa pratibhāsate bālānām,
SA10canprasu:5849: ādhyātmikabāhyāśeṣavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvathā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
SA10canprasu:5853: ātmānamasyā viṣayaṃ ca buddhā yogī karotyātmaniṣedhameva //
SA10canprasu:5855: kāyadṛṣṭimūlakameva saṃsāramanupaśyan ātmānupalambhācca satkāyadṛṣṭiprahāṇaṃ tatprahāṇācca sarvakleśavyāvṛttiṃ samanupaśyan prathamataramātmānamevopaparīkṣate,
SA10canprasu:5858: sa cāyamahaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavetskandhavyatirikto vā?
SA10canprasu:5859: ādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāmapi ekatvānyatvapakṣe eva antarbhāvāt saṃkṣepeṇaiva ca vivakṣitatvādekatvānyatvapakṣadvayapratiṣedhenaiva ātmaniṣedhamārabdhukāma ācārya āha-
SA10canprasu:5862: kimartha punaranyatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāmagnīndhanaparīkṣāyāṃ ca pañca pañca pakṣā upanyastāḥ,
SA10canprasu:5864: yenaiva tatra prakaraṇadvaye pañca pañca pakṣā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
SA10canprasu:5865: ata eva anyatra nirdiṣṭatvānna punariha nirdiśyante /
SA10canprasu:5868: tadā udayavyayabhāg utpādī ca vināśī ca ātmā prāpnoti,
SA10canprasu:5873: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:5879: skandhā ātmā cedatastadbahutvāt ātmānaḥ syuste 'pi bhūyāṃsa eva /
SA10canprasu:5880: dravyaṃ cātmā prāpnuyāttādṛśaśca dravye vṛttau vaiparītye ca na syāt //
SA10canprasu:5881: ātmocchedo nirvṛtau syādavaśyaṃ nāśotpādau nirvṛteḥ prāk kṣaṇeṣu /
SA10canprasu:5883: ityādinā madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇa vihitavicārādapi pakṣo boddhavya iti neha punarvistaraprapañca ārabhyate //
SA10canprasu:5884: evaṃ tāvat skandhā ātmā na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:5888: yathā hi goranyo 'śvaḥ na golakṣaṇe bhavati,
SA10canprasu:5891: tatra askandhalakṣaṇa ātmā bhavan bhavanmatena utpādasthitibhaṅgalakṣaṇāyuktaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5893: saḥ avidyamānatvādasaṃskṛtatvādvā khapuṣpavannirvāṇabadvā naiva ātmavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate,
SA10canprasu:5896: athavā / ayamanyo 'rthaḥ- yadi ātmā skandhavyatiriktaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:5899: ātmā ca rūpādiva vijñānaṃ skandhebhyo vyatirikta iṣyamāṇaḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:5903: nanu ca tīrthikāḥ skandhebhyo vyatiriktamātmānaṃ pratipannā bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate,
SA10canprasu:5905: yathā ca tīrthikā ātmano bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate tathoktaṃ madhyamakāvatāre-
SA10canprasu:5906: ātmā tīrthyaiḥ kalpyate nityarūpo 'kartā bhoktā nirguṇo niṣkriyaśca /
SA10canprasu:5907: kaṃcitkaṃcidvedamāśritya tasya bhedaṃ yātā prakriyā tīrthikānām //
SA10canprasu:5911: na punaste svarūpata ātmānamupalabhya tasya lakṣaṇamācakṣate,
SA10canprasu:5914: teṣāṃ ca karmakārakaparīkṣādiṣu ātmopādānayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ bruvatā saṃvṛtyāpi pratiṣedho vihita eva / uktaṃ ca-
SA10canprasu:5916: dṛśyate nāma taccaiva na kiṃcidapi tattvataḥ //
SA10canprasu:5925: yasyedaṃ skandhapañcakamupādānatvena pratibhāsate kimasau skandhalakṣaṇaḥ uta askandhalakṣaṇaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:5926: sarvathā ca vicārayanto mumukṣavo nainamupalabhante bhāvasvabhāvataḥ / tadā eṣām-
SA10canprasu:5929: yathaiva hi dagdhe rathe tadaṅgānyapi dagdhatvānnopalabhyante,
SA10canprasu:5934: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ //
SA10canprasu:5937_2: cāsādya viparītaṃ ca darśanamapekṣya salilākārā marīcaya upalabhyamānā vidūradeśāvasthitānāṃ
SA10canprasu:5942: marīciryadi vāri syādāsannaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate //
SA10canprasu:5947: ata eva ca ātmātmīyānupalambhātparamārthadarśanasamīpastho yogī niyataṃ bhavati-
SA10canprasu:5952: ātmano 'haṃkāraviṣayasya ātmanīnasya ca skandhādervastunaḥ mamakāraviṣayasya śamādanutpādādanupalambhānnirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca jāyate yogī // 2 //
SA10canprasu:5953: nanu ca yo 'sāvevaṃ nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca yogī bhavati,
SA10canprasu:5955: sati ca tasmin siddha ātmā skandhāśceti naitadevam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:5956: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:5957: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati // 3 //
SA10canprasu:5958: ātmani skandheṣu ca sarvathānupalabhyamānasvarūpeṣu kutastadvayatirikto 'parapadārtho bhaviṣyati yo 'sau nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśceti /
SA10canprasu:5959: yastu evamasaṃvidyamānasvarūpaṃ nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ ca paśyati,
SA10canprasu:5963: na vidyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām //
SA10canprasu:5965: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyaka dharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5966: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:5968: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5969: cittavitarkiṇa sarvi papañcāḥ tasya acintiya budhyatha dharmān // iti /
SA10canprasu:5971: skandha sabhāvatu śūnya vivikta bodhi sabhāvatu śūnya vivikta /
SA10canprasu:5972: yo 'pi caretsa pi śūnyasabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya //
SA10canprasu:5977: satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudayāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ sarvakleśāḥ sūtre uktāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5981: yataśca ayaṃ janmanivṛttikramaḥ evaṃ vyavasthāpitaḥ, tasmāt-
SA10canprasu:5984: upādāne hi kṣīṇe tatpratyayo bhavo na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:5985: bhave niruddhe kuto jātijarāmaraṇādikasya saṃbhava iti /
SA10canprasu:5987: karmakleśānāṃ tarhi kasya kṣayātparikṣaya iti vaktavyam // ucyate-
SA10canprasu:5990: ayoniśo hi rūpādikaṃ vikalpayato bālapṛthagjanasya kleśa upajāyate rāgādikaḥ vakṣyati hi-
SA10canprasu:5994: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase /
SA10canprasu:5995: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi // iti //
SA10canprasu:5999: sa cāyaṃ laukikaḥ prapañco niravaśeṣa śūnyatāyāṃ sarvasvabhāvaśūnyatādarśane sati nirudhyate /
SA10canprasu:6001: yasmātsati hi vastunaṃ upalambhe syād yathoditaprapañcajālam /
SA10canprasu:6002: na hi anupalabhya vandhyāduhitaraṃ rūpalāvaṇyayauvanavatīṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti rāgiṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6003: na ca anavatārya prapañcaṃ tadviṣayamayoniśo vikalpamavatārayanti /
SA10canprasu:6004: na ca anavatārya kalpanājālam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakān kleśagaṇānutpādayanti /
SA10canprasu:6005: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayātmakān kleśagaṇān karmāṇi śubhāśubhāniñjyāni kurvanti /
SA10canprasu:6006: na ca akurvāṇāḥ karmāṇi jātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasya[upāyāsādirūpaṃ] ekajālībhūtaṃ saṃsārakāntāramanubhavanti /
SA10canprasu:6007: evaṃ yogino 'pi śūnyatādarśanāvasthā niravaśeṣaskandhadhātvāyatanāni svarūpato nopalabhante /
SA10canprasu:6008: na ca anupalabhamānā vastusvarūpaṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti /
SA10canprasu:6009: na ca anavatārya tadviṣayaṃ prapañcaṃ vikalpamavatārayanti /
SA10canprasu:6010: na ca anavatārya vikalpam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakaṃ kleśagaṇamutpādayanti /
SA10canprasu:6011: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayādikaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ karmāṇi kurvanti /
SA10canprasu:6020_2: āryaśrāvakasyāpi ātmātmīyavastvabhāvād dharmamātramidaṃ jāyate mriyate ceti darśanamutpadyate /
SA10canprasu:6023: tadabhāvādeva na kvacidādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā vastu astīti mamakārānutpatteḥ nirmamo nirahaṃkāro 'hamiti na svarūpaviniścitirupajāyate,
SA10canprasu:6025: prāgeva ajātasarvasaṃskāradarśināṃ nirvikalpaprajñācāravihāriṇāṃ mahābodhisattvānāmiti / ata āha-
SA10canprasu:6026: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate // iti //
SA10canprasu:6028: tadayamācāryo yathaivaṃvidhe viṣaye nācāryapādamatānuvartī tathā pratipāditaṃ madhyamakāvatāre-
SA10canprasu:6033: pratyeka bodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
SA10canprasu:6034: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamityādi //
SA10canprasu:6036: yo icchatī sugataśrāvaku haṃ bhaveyaṃ pratyekabuddhu bhavijā tatha dharmarājo /
SA10canprasu:6037: imu kṣānti nāgatya na śakyati pāpuṇotuṃ yatha ārapāragamanīyaṃ atīradarśī //
SA10canprasu:6041: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA10canprasu:6042: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:6043: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA10canprasu:6044: ātmā hi ātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpakṛtasya ca //
SA10canprasu:6046: kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam /
SA10canprasu:6047: no pi ca saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti //
