SA10canprasu:6051: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ / iti?
SA10canprasu:6052: tathā hi- rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavānnāpi cātmā rūpe nātmā nātmani rūpaṃ .... /
SA10canprasu:6054: vijñānavānnātmā vijñāne nātmā nātmani vijñānam iti /
SA10canprasu:6069: madhyamakāvatārācca vistareṇa veditavyeti tatpratiṣedhārtha neha punaryatna āsthīyate //
SA10canprasu:6070_1: gatāḥ kuśalakarmakāriṇo 'kuśalakarmapathavyāvṛttā api na śaknuvanti traidhātukabhavopapattimativāhya
SA10canprasu:6071: teṣāṃ madhyānāṃ vineyānāṃ satkāyadarśanābhiniveśaśithilīkaraṇāya nirvāṇābhilāṣasaṃjananārthaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhirvineyajanānugrahacikīrṣubhiranātmetyapi deśitam //
SA10canprasu:6084: kāśyapa madhyamā pratipada dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā iti //
SA10canprasu:6088: dṛṣṭaśrutādyaṃ muninā na satyaṃ na mṛṣoditam /
SA10canprasu:6089: pakṣāddhi pratipakṣaḥ syādubhayaṃ tacca nārthataḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:6090: yataścaivaṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanāśayanānātvena ātmānātmatadubhayapratiṣedhena buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā,
SA10canprasu:6094: sarvasya vāraṇaṃ paścādyo jānīte sa buddhimān // iti //
SA10canprasu:6102: athavā- ayamanyo 'rthaḥ- ātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ sāṃkhyādibhiḥ pratikṣaṇavinaśvarāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāvamutprekṣya /
SA10canprasu:6103: anātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ lokāyatikaiḥ upapattyā ātmānaṃ saṃsartāramapaśyadbhiḥ-
SA10canprasu:6109: atha khalu śāntamatirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat- upaśama upaśama iti bhagavannucyate,
SA10canprasu:6121: ucchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭayupaśama iti satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamasyaitadadhivacanam iti śāntamate ye kecidārambaṇahetudṛṣṭisaṃyuktāḥ saṃkleśāḥ pravartante,
SA10canprasu:6126: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūle chinne sarvaśākhāpatraphalāni śuṣyanti,
SA10canprasu:6131_0: bhagavānāha- ātmāsamutthānaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā sattvāsamutthānaṃ jivāsamutthānaṃ
SA10canprasu:6131_1: pudgalāsamutthānaṃ dṛṣṭayasamutthānaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā na khalu punaḥ śāntamate
SA10canprasu:6139: satkāya iti śāntamate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādadṛṣṭayā tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nodgṛhṇāti,
SA10canprasu:6142: na kasati na vikasati na cinoti nopacinoti,
SA10canprasu:6145: tanna parikalpitaṃ na parikalpyate na vikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:6157: tatra śāntamate upāyakuśalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhaḥ ālambanasamatāṃ ca prajānāti,
SA10canprasu:6181: yasmādanutpannāniruddhā nirvāṇamiva dharmatā dharmasvabhāvaḥ dharmaprakṛtiḥ vyavasthāpitā,
SA10canprasu:6190: athavā / ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ- yaduktaṃ prapañcaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate iti,
SA10canprasu:6191: kathaṃ punaḥ prapañcasya śūnyatāyāṃ nirodha iti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:6193: athavā yadetaduktaṃ prāgādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvadā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6199: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra tattve nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare ityāha-
SA10canprasu:6203: yāṃ ca śāntamate rātriṃ tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6205: asminnantare tathāgatena ekākṣaramapi nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhariṣyati /
SA10canprasu:6206: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavatā sakalasurāsuranarakiṃnarasiddhavidyādharoragaprabhṛtivineyajanebhyo vividhaprakārebhyo dharmadeśanā deśitā?
SA10canprasu:6207: ekakṣaṇavāgudāhāreṇaiva tattajjanamanastamoharaṇī bahuvidhabuddhinalinīvanavibodhinī jarāmaraṇasaritsāgarocchoṣiṇī kalpakālānalasaptārkaraśmivisarahrepiṇī śaradaruṇamahāprabheti //
SA10canprasu:6210: na cātra vādakaḥ kaścinniścarantyatha ca svarāḥ //
SA10canprasu:6214: pratiśrutkādayaḥ śabdā nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6215: vāgapyevaṃ narendrasya nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:6217: devata codani dundubhi divya karmavipāka nivṛtta marūṇaṃ /
SA10canprasu:6218: deva pamattavihāriṇa ñātvā dundubhighoṣa pamuñci nabhāto //
SA10canprasu:6219: sarva anitya aśāśvata kāmā itvara adhruva phenasabhāvāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6221: dundubhi vādita śakramarudbhiḥ sārddhaya saṃkrami dharmasabhāyām /
SA10canprasu:6222: dharmakathāṃ pakaroti marūṇāṃ yā katha śānta virāganukūlā //
SA10canprasu:6224: buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa pakāśako muniḥ /
SA10canprasu:6225: tṛṇagulmavṛkṣauṣadhi śaila parvata abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati //
SA10canprasu:6226: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6227: tāvantu kho tasya tathāgatasya svaru niścarī lokavināyakasya //
SA10canprasu:6230: ekasvarā tu tava lokahito nānādhimukti svaru niścarati /
SA10canprasu:6231: ekaikamanvimamabhāṣi jino brūhi smitaṃ prakṛtakasya kṛte // iti //
SA10canprasu:6233: yasmāt kuśalākuśalaṃ karma kartāraṃ ca phalaṃ ca sarvaṃ ca lokaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyamiti bruvate /
SA10canprasu:6237: kutaḥ? pratītyasamutpādavādino hi mādhyamikāḥ hetupratyayān prāpya pratītya samutpannatvāt sarvameva ihalokaparalokaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ varṇayanti /
SA10canprasu:6238: yathāsvarūpavādino naiva nāstikāḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād bhāvasvabhāvaśunyatvena na paralokādyabhāvaṃ (Pp_157)
SA10canprasu:6240: kiṃ tarhi aihalaukikaṃ vastujātamupalabhya svabhāvataḥ tasya paralokādihāgamanam,
SA10canprasu:6242: tathāpi vastusvarūpeṇa avidyamānasyaiva te nāstitvaṃ pratipannāḥ ityamunā tāvaddarśanena sāmyamastīti cet, na hi /
SA10canprasu:6247: yathā hi kṛtacaurya puruṣamekaḥ samyagaparijñāyaiva tadamitrapreritaḥ taṃ mithyā vyācaṣṭe cauryamanena kṛtamiti,
SA10canprasu:6252: ekaśca ayaśasā ca apuṇyena ca samyak parīkṣyamāṇo yujyate nāparaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6253: evamihāpi yathāvadviditavastusvarūpāṇāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ bruvatāmavagacchatāṃ ca vastusvarūpābhede 'pi yathāvadaviditavastusvarūpairnāstikaiḥ saha jñānābhidhānayornāsti sāmyam /
SA10canprasu:6254: yathaiva hi upekṣāsāmānye 'pi apratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya upekṣakayoriva pṛthagjanārhatoḥ jātyandhacakṣuṣmatośca viṣamaprapātapradeśaviniścitasāmānye 'pi yathāsti mahān viśeṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6255: tathā nāstikānāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ ca viśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6260: tathāpi naivāsau adeśyamānā śakyā janairvijñātumiti avaśyaṃ tasyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ vineyajanānāṃ saṃvṛtisatyāpekṣayā kadāciddeśanānupūrvyā bhavitavyam,
SA10canprasu:6263: iyamatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāradeśanānupūrvī vijñeyā, yaduta-
SA10canprasu:6264: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca /
SA10canprasu:6268: na hi pratihataḥ pātraṃ saddharmasya kathaṃcana // iti /
SA10canprasu:6277: nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ yathā /
SA10canprasu:6278: na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ tathā //
SA10canprasu:6284_1: sattvalokasya ca aviparītaṃ sthityutpādapralayādikaṃ sātivicitraprabhedaṃ sahetukaṃ
SA10canprasu:6285: tadevaṃ bhagavati utpannasarvajñabuddhivineyajanasya uttarakālaṃ tadeva sarvaṃ na vā tathyamityupadeśitam /
SA10canprasu:6286: tatra tathyaṃ nāma yasya anyathātvaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:6291: keṣāṃcit sarvametat tathyaṃ ca atathyaṃ ceti deśitam /
SA10canprasu:6295: keṣāṃcittu aticirābhyastatattvadarśanānāṃ kiṃcinmātrānutkhātāvaraṇatarūmūlānāṃ naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyaṃtaditi deśitam /
SA10canprasu:6296: tasyāpi kiṃcinmātrasyāvaraṇasya prahāṇārthaṃ vandhyāsutasya avadātaśyāmatāpratiṣedhavadubhayametat pratiṣiddham //
SA10canprasu:6297: etacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmanuśāsanam- unmārgādapanīya samyaṅmārgapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ śāsanam /
SA10canprasu:6300: sarvāścaitā deśanā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākaruṇopāyajñānavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāropāyatvena vyavasthitāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6302: vyādhyanurūpabhaiṣajyopasaṃhāravat te vineyajanānujighṛkṣayā yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
SA10canprasu:6307: kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ tat tattvaṃ yasyaitā deśanā avatārārthamupadiśante bhagavantaḥ?
SA10canprasu:6313: tathāpi vyavahārasatyānurodhena laukikatathyādyabhyupagamavat tasyāpi samāropato lakṣaṇamucyatāmiti / taducyate-
SA10canprasu:6320_0: yathā hi taimirikā vitathaṃ keśamaśakamakṣikādirūpaṃ paśyanto vitimiropadeśenāpi
SA10canprasu:6320_1: na śaknuvanti keśānāṃ yathāvadavasthitaṃ svarūpamadarśananyāyena adhigantavyamataimirikā ivādhigantum,
SA10canprasu:6324: evamaparapratyayaṃ bhāvānāṃ yat svarūpaṃ tat tattvam /
SA10canprasu:6343: mañjuśrīrāha- yatsamā devaputra paramārthatastathatā dharmadhātuḥ atyantājātiśca,
SA10canprasu:6353: yatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ tatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānam,
SA10canprasu:6354: yatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6355: evaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmasamatāprayukto devaputra bhikṣuḥ samyakprayukta ityucyate //
SA10canprasu:6356: devaputra āha- katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti?
SA10canprasu:6357: mañjuśrīrāha- paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6359: paramārthato nirvāṇānānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya /
SA10canprasu:6378: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:6381: tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate,
SA10canprasu:6382: na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum /
SA10canprasu:6383: naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ,
SA10canprasu:6391: evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:6398: yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate,
SA10canprasu:6401: tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum /
SA10canprasu:6404: yasmānnivartate bhāvastena nityo na jāyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:6406: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:6407: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
SA10canprasu:6413_4: yathopavarṇitena nyāyena ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ śāśvatocchedavādavigataṃ ca vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:6417: tathāpi janmāntare 'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate /
SA10canprasu:6432: ato 'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya saddharmatattvaṃ paryeṣitumiti /
SA10canprasu:6434: kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
SA10canprasu:6435_0: evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat- sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena
SA10canprasu:6435_1: mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa
SA10canprasu:6436: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt- gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
SA10canprasu:6438: tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi,
SA10canprasu:6441: yāvat mā kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
SA10canprasu:6449: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi /
SA10canprasu:6458: yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake 'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt- yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
SA10canprasu:6461: mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre nipatet /
SA10canprasu:6463: varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet,
SA10canprasu:6465: bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ,
SA10canprasu:6467: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi //
SA10canprasu:6468_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya
SA10canprasu:6468_1: mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata- tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya
SA10canprasu:6469: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā,
SA10canprasu:6484: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau ātmaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:6492: yasmādutpanno niruddho hi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ atīta iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:6517: pradīpo 'pi andhakāreṇa pratidvandvitvena apekṣyate iti cet,
SA10canprasu:6520: tadatra yadi atīte kāle vartamānānāgatau kālau iṣyete,
SA10canprasu:6521: apekṣāsiddhayarthamevaṃ sati atīte kāle vidyamānatvāt atītakālātmavat tayorapyatītatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6523: yasmāt vartamānāvasthātikrānto hi atītaḥ asaṃprāptaḥ anāgata iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:6530: tatra atīte kāle yadi vartamānānāgatau kālau na staḥ iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:6532: athāpi syāt- kālavādināṃ vidyate eva kālaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6540: yataścaivam pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate iti vijñeyam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:6542: yadā caivam atītamapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā pratyutpannānāgatayornāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:6543_0: evaṃ pratyutpannāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā atītānāgatayoḥ anāgatāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā
SA10canprasu:6543_1: vā pratyutpannātītayoḥ asiddhau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tenaiva pratyutpannāgatayoḥ atītāpekṣayā
SA10canprasu:6551: anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirna jātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ /
SA10canprasu:6560: eṣa dvitīyaḥ kālaparivarta iti vyākhyānakārikā iti /
SA10canprasu:6573: ekatvādīṃśca ityanena ādiśabdena dvitvabahutvayo grahaṇāt te eva uttamādayaḥ ekatvādayaśca kālatrayavyākhyānena vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ // 4 //
SA10canprasu:6577: na tasya parimāṇavattvaṃ vidyate tadyathā kharaviṣāṇasya /
SA10canprasu:6579: tasmāt, parimāṇavattvād vidyata eva kālaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:6584: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:6586: iha yadi kālo nāma kaścidavasthitaḥ kṣaṇādivyatiriktaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6588: na tu avasthitaḥ kūṭasthaḥ kaścit kālo nāma asti,
SA10canprasu:6592: athāpi syāt- nitya eva avasthitasvabhāvaḥ kālo nāma asti,
SA10canprasu:6594: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6595: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:6598: evamapi sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyamāno gṛhyeta /
SA10canprasu:6599: kasmāt punaḥ sthitaḥ kālo nāstīti cet,
SA10canprasu:6601: api ca / ayaṃ kālaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvaḥ san astīti,
SA10canprasu:6606: ityanena / tadevaṃ nāsti vyavasthitaḥ kālaḥ, yo gṛhyeta /
SA10canprasu:6607: yaśca idānīṃ kālo na gṛhyate asthitatvādavidyamānasvarūpatvāt,
SA10canprasu:6608: so 'gṛhyamāṇaḥ san kathaṃ kṣaṇādibhiḥ prajñapayituṃ bhāvataḥ pāryata ityāha- agṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate kathamiti /
SA10canprasu:6610: atrāha- satyaṃ nāsti nityaḥ kālo nāma kaścid rūpādivyatiriktaḥ svabhāvasiddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6611: kiṃ tarhi rūpādīneva sa saṃskārānupādāya prajñaptaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇādivācyo bhavati,
SA10canprasu:6615: yadyevaṃ bhāvaṃ pratītya kālo bhavatīti bhavatā vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:6617: tadā niyataṃ taddhetuko 'pi kālo nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6621: yadā caivaṃ na kaścidbhāvo 'sti bhāvataḥ, tadā-
SA10canprasu:6623: kālābhāvācca na santi kṣaṇalavamuhūrtādayaḥ kālabhedāḥ tatpariṇāmabhūtāḥ,
SA10canprasu:6627: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvako /
SA10canprasu:6628: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:6631: naiva ca dharma na cākṣara kṣīṇā nāsti samudbhavu tena akṣīṇā // iti /
SA10canprasu:6633: utpādakāle hi tathāgatasya maitreyanāmā tviha yo bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:6634: bhaviṣyatīyaṃ kanakāvṛtā mahī tasyā idānīṃ kuta āgamo 'sau //
SA10canprasu:6635: ullāpanāḥ kāmaguṇā hi pañca vibhrāmaṇā mohana moṣadharmiṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6636: madhyāhnakāle hi yathaiva grīṣme jalaṃ marīcyāṃ hi tathaiva kāmāḥ //
SA10canprasu:6637: ekena kalpena bhaveddhi loko ākāśabhūto gaganasvabhāvo /
SA10canprasu:6640: ]ravaḥ kuta āgamaḥ kutra gatiśca teṣām // iti //
SA10canprasu:6642: pañcemāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ yaduta atīto 'dhvā anāgato 'dhvā ākāśaṃ nirvāṇaṃ pudgalaśceti //
SA10canprasu:6643: // ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau kālaparīkṣā nāma ekonaviṃśaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:6653: iha bījāvanisalilajvalanapavanagaganābhidhānahetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya ayamaṅkura upajāyamānaḥ satyāmapi bījādipratyayasāmagryām,
SA10canprasu:6659: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // iti //
SA10canprasu:6668: iha bījādihetupratyayasāmagrīto 'ṅkurādiphalodaye parikalpyamāne vyavasthitasya vā phalasya sāmagryāṃ satyāṃtata utpādaḥ parikalpyeta avyavasthitasya vā?
SA10canprasu:6672: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10canprasu:6673: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // 1 //
SA10canprasu:6677: na hi kuṇḍe dadhi vidyamānaṃ kuṇḍena janyate /
SA10canprasu:6680: abhivyaktiḥ sthaulyaṃ vā sūkṣmātmanā vidyamānasya kriyata iti cet,
SA10canprasu:6686: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10canprasu:6687: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // 2 //
SA10canprasu:6688: yadi hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti tatphalam,
SA10canprasu:6692: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham /
SA10canprasu:6697: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate // 3 //
SA10canprasu:6701: yacca yatra nāsti na tattatra gṛhyate tadyathā sikatāsu tailam,
SA10canprasu:6703: atha syāt- vidyamānā api padārthāḥ atisaukṣmyāt,
SA10canprasu:6710_1: kuḍayādivyavahitaghaṭādivat siddhadevapiśācādiśarīravat viṣayāntaravyāpṛtasya viṣayāntaravanna gṛhyate iti cet,
SA10canprasu:6716: yad rūpīndriyagrāhyaṃ tad ebhiḥ kāraṇairvidyamānamapi sanna gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:6719: kiṃ tarhi sāmānyenaiva yad brūmaḥ- gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāmiti //
SA10canprasu:6728: asmādapyanumānādastitvamasya ayuktamiti kṛtvā nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti kiṃ na gṛhyate?
SA10canprasu:6729: athāpi syāt- ubhyorapi pakṣayoranumānavirodhād yathā astitvaṃ na yuktam,
SA10canprasu:6740: tadevaṃ na sāmagrītaḥ phalamutpadyate vidyamānasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt,
SA10canprasu:6742: atha manyase- nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:6743: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
SA10canprasu:6745: yathā hi jvālāṅgārādiṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā tasya te hetupratyayā na bhavanti,
SA10canprasu:6746: eva vivakṣitānāmapi bījādīnāṃ hetupratyayatā na syāt teṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā /
SA10canprasu:6747: na ca ahetu pratyayebhyaḥ phalapravṛttiryukteti nāsti svabhāvataḥ phalapravṛttiḥ //
SA10canprasu:6749: atrāha- naiva hi sāmagryāḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyamasti yataḥ iyaṃ cintā syāt- kiṃ sāmagryāṃ phalamasti utāho nāstīti /
SA10canprasu:6752: sa hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetuṃ datvā nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:6753: tena ca hetunā anugṛhyamāṇaṃ phalamutpadyate iti /
SA10canprasu:6756: na cāpyajātasya bandhyātanayasyeva kenacitkiṃcinmātraṃ kartuṃ śakyamityayuktaiṣā kalpanā // 4 //
SA10canprasu:6760: yadi hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetukaṃ kāraṇaṃ datvā nirudhyata iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:6761: evaṃ sati yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca tadātmabhāvadvayaṃ hetoḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6764: atha hetorātmabhāvadvayaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ sarvātmanā nirodha iṣyate phalasyotpattyarthaṃ kiṃcidapyadatvā, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:6768: nanu tasmin hetau niruddhe yatphalamutpadyate tat āhetukaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6771: atrāha- yadi evaṃ phalasya hetorutpattau doṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6772: evaṃ sati sahotpannaiva sāmagrī phalasya janikā astu,
SA10canprasu:6780: atrāhureke- naiva hi abhūtvā bhāvānāmutpattiryuktā ākasmikatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:6781: tasmād hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva tat phalamanāgatāvasthāyāṃ vyavasthitamanāgatātmanā /
SA10canprasu:6787: yadi bhavatāmabhīpsitaṃ sāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva phalaṃ svarūpataḥ syāditi,
SA10canprasu:6794: anye punarvarṇayanti- hetureva phalaṃ janayati na sāmagrī /
SA10canprasu:6796: yasmāt na hi anyohetuḥ anyat phalam /
SA10canprasu:6797: yataḥ, kiṃ hetuṃ datvā phalasya heturnirudhyate uta adatvaiveti vicāraḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6798: api tu hetureva niruddhaḥ phalātmanā vyavasthitaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:6800: niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:6805: naṭasya veṣāntaraparityāgena veṣāntarasaṃcāravat hetoḥ saṃkramaṇa mātrameva syāt,
SA10canprasu:6812: kiṃ ca / etasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ pūrvajātasya ca hetoḥ punarjanma prāpnoti /
SA10canprasu:6813: na ca jātasya punarapi [janma] yujyate niṣprayojanatvāt,
SA10canprasu:6815: atha manyase- yenātmanā vidyamāno na tenaivātmanā jāyate,
SA10canprasu:6816: yena cātmanā avidyamānaḥ tenaiva jāyata iti /
SA10canprasu:6818: aparityaktahetusvabhāvasya hetusvarūpasya phalamiti saṃjñāmātrabhedādavasthābhedācca dravyābhedasya sādhayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA10canprasu:6819: phalāvasthāyāṃ ca parityaktahetusvabhāvasya phalaśabdavācyatvād hetuḥ phalātmanā tiṣṭhatīti yatkiṃcidetat // 9 //
SA10canprasu:6820: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10canprasu:6826: [yadi tāvata niruddhaḥ astaṃgataḥ hetuḥ utpannaṃ sat vidyamānaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:6829: kathaṃ niruddhaḥ asaṃvidyamānaḥ hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet?
SA10canprasu:6832: phalaṃ ca sad vidyamānamapi janmanirapekṣamapi kathaṃ heturjanayi ṣyati?
SA10canprasu:6834: kiṃ tu tiṣṭhanneva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:6836: ] tiṣṭhannapi heturavikṛtarūpo vidyamānena phalena vṛtaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? iha hi-
SA10canprasu:6838: iti kāraṇābhāvaṃ pratipadyamānasya hetoravaśyaṃ vikāreṇa bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:6844: atha manyase- vidyamānasya phalasya punarjanayitumaśakyatvāt avṛta eva asaṃbaddha eva hetuḥ phalena phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti,
SA10canprasu:6851: kiṃ cānyat / yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10canprasu:6854: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam // 11 //
SA10canprasu:6860: evaṃ tāvad hetuḥ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā na janayati,
SA10canprasu:6863: atha kimidaṃ darśanaṃ kiṃ vā adarśanamiti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:6865: nanu etad bījādiṣu nirindriyeṣu na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:6868: tatra yaḥ utpādavādī brūyāt- dṛṣṭvā janayatīti,
SA10canprasu:6869: sa vaktavyaḥ- na dṛṣṭametalloke yadbījādikaṃ paśyatīti /
SA10canprasu:6875: aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva /
SA10canprasu:6876: buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti /
SA10canprasu:6878: kiṃ cānyat- yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6880: yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti /
SA10canprasu:6882: sā ca kālatraye 'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:6887: atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti,
SA10canprasu:6889: nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate,
SA10canprasu:6892: nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6896: yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti,
SA10canprasu:6897: evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6898: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10canprasu:6900: jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:6901: nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti,
SA10canprasu:6904: kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ // 13 //
SA10canprasu:6905: idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6906: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10canprasu:6909: tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt /
SA10canprasu:6912: yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:6913: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10canprasu:6914: naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:6915: athāpi syāt- satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti,
SA10canprasu:6918: athāpi kathaṃcid hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatiḥ parikalpyate, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:6919: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:6925: yo 'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:6926: sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet, aśūnyo vā?
SA10canprasu:6927: tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
SA10canprasu:6929: phalena aśūnyo 'pi hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
SA10canprasu:6932: evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati // 16 //
SA10canprasu:6940: tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate /
SA10canprasu:6953: na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau /
SA10canprasu:6955: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10canprasu:6959: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10canprasu:6960: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate // 19 //
SA10canprasu:6964: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6968: evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti //
SA10canprasu:6971: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6972: tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād hetunirapekṣameva phalaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6974: ityataḥ anyatvamapi hetoḥ phalasya ca na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:6978: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10canprasu:6979: sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet,
SA10canprasu:6984: tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam,
SA10canprasu:6997: sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo 'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto 'naikāntikatā?
SA10canprasu:6998: na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam,
SA10canprasu:7000: na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti //
SA10canprasu:7001: tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham /
SA10canprasu:7006: na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:7011: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7013: na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:7018: atrāha- naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam,
SA10canprasu:7019: kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti /
SA10canprasu:7022: api ca, iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:7023: kiṃ sāsvayameva tāvadātmānaṃ janayati, utāho na?
SA10canprasu:7026: na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:7027: na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam,
SA10canprasu:7032: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam /23 //
SA10canprasu:7033: pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati,
SA10canprasu:7038: na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:7039: evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate // 23 //
SA10canprasu:7043: athāpi syāt- yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7044: evaṃ tarhi asāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, ucyate-
SA10canprasu:7049: atha syāt- yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ,
SA10canprasu:7051: na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:7055: yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:7056: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā // 24 //
SA10canprasu:7057: phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7059: kaṇṭhoṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihvaparivarti ravanti akṣarāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7060: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaikaśa nopalabhyate //
SA10canprasu:7061: sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī /
SA10canprasu:7064: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarva vāca pratiśrutakopamā //
SA10canprasu:7066: iha śāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā /
SA10canprasu:7067: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭhā eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena /
SA10canprasu:7069: pravrajitva gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:7070: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ //
SA10canprasu:7071: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
SA10canprasu:7072: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭupadeśita yukti jinena // iti /
SA10canprasu:7074: tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam /
SA10canprasu:7075: na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam // iti //
SA10canprasu:7076: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau sāmagrīparīkṣā nāma viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:7082: iha kaṃcit kālaviśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati,
SA10canprasu:7085: vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām- ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ,
SA10canprasu:7088: syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām /
SA10canprasu:7092: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10canprasu:7093: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai // 1 //
SA10canprasu:7099: tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7101: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10canprasu:7102: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā // 2 //
SA10canprasu:7103: saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:7116: evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7118: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 3 //
SA10canprasu:7119: yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7121: na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti /
SA10canprasu:7122: tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:7123: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:7124: evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7125: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā
SA10canprasu:7126: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate // 4 //
SA10canprasu:7127: naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate /
SA10canprasu:7128: yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate,
SA10canprasu:7129: kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate / uktaṃ hi-
SA10canprasu:7132: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // iti /
SA10canprasu:7134: tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi?
SA10canprasu:7135: ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:7144: yadapi nirdiṣṭam- bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate,
SA10canprasu:7149: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
SA10canprasu:7150: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:7159: api ca / kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:7165: yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati,
SA10canprasu:7174: idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:7177: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:7178: yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt,
SA10canprasu:7183: atha syāt- yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:7192: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:7193: sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:7199: anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti /
SA10canprasu:7202: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmakṣayadharmiṇo vā?
SA10canprasu:7205: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca // 7 //
SA10canprasu:7206: tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7207: akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7214: yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ,
SA10canprasu:7226: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7228: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate // 8 //
SA10canprasu:7230: tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau /
SA10canprasu:7232: tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:7233: bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau //
SA10canprasu:7234: apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate /
SA10canprasu:7245: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7248: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate //
SA10canprasu:7250: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmaśūnyasya vā?
SA10canprasu:7256: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
SA10canprasu:7268: āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati,
SA10canprasu:7270: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti / evamapi-
SA10canprasu:7273: na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam /
SA10canprasu:7274: tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamānamapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt,
SA10canprasu:7277: atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate- avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti /
SA10canprasu:7280: iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet,
SA10canprasu:7288: bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate,
SA10canprasu:7296: yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:7314: athavā / ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ- iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
SA10canprasu:7316: tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:7325: api ca / yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt,
SA10canprasu:7327: na ca kaścid bhāvaḥ svarūpato 'sti kharaviṣāṇavat svabhāvānutpannatvāt /
SA10canprasu:7330: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10canprasu:7333: etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate /
SA10canprasu:7334: yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate?
SA10canprasu:7336: avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam- sarvathā nāsti bhāvasyotpāda iti // 13 //
SA10canprasu:7342: sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet // 14 //
SA10canprasu:7346: yasmāt sa bhāvaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
SA10canprasu:7365: sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo 'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti /
SA10canprasu:7371: yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:7373: tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet,
SA10canprasu:7378: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:7380: ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:7381: anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt?
SA10canprasu:7383: evaṃ tāvad bhāvamabhyupapannasya hetoḥ punaranutpādāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgamudbhāvya idānīṃ śāśvatavāde doṣaprasaṅgamudbhāvayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7385: yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7386: tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt /
SA10canprasu:7406: anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā // 17 //
SA10canprasu:7407: atra ca idaṃ vicāryate- ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:7408: sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate,
SA10canprasu:7412: sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7413: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7414: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ // 18 //
SA10canprasu:7415: tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:7419: tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate //
SA10canprasu:7420: idānīmaniruddhe 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:7427: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7429: idānīṃ nirudhyamāne 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7439: jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7440: na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat // 19 //
SA10canprasu:7444: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate // 20 //
SA10canprasu:7447: yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7448: aniruddhe 'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7449: sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7450: tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:7453: na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam // 20 // tat-
SA10canprasu:7458: carame bhave niruddhe 'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7460: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ // 21 //
SA10canprasu:7461: yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7462: kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
SA10canprasu:7466: tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām,
SA10canprasu:7467: ityato nāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvata utpattiriti siddham /
SA10canprasu:7470: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:7471: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
SA10canprasu:7473: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra anucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA10canprasu:7479: jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ /
SA10canprasu:7480: yasya vijānata eṣa samādhirnāsya durlabhaḥ // iti/
SA10canprasu:7482: sūsukhitā sada te nara loke yehi acintiya jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7483: na ca dharma adharma vikalpo cittapapañca vibhāvita sarvi //
SA10canprasu:7484: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvamacintayi sarvamabhūtam /
SA10canprasu:7485: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāste dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu //
SA10canprasu:7486: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7487: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāste ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:7488: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7489: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān //
SA10canprasu:7491: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā nāma ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:7497_4: svecchāta upabhogyatāmātmānamupagamayatā mahākālena sārvajñaṃ sarvākāraparicchedi padamadhigatam /
SA10canprasu:7498: sa evamadhigatasarvajñajñāno bhagavān yathā dharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tathaiva aśeṣato gatatvād buddhatvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:7501: na hi ekena janmanā śakyaṃ tathāgatatvamanuprāptum /
SA10canprasu:7505: bhavadīyameva hi idamatimahadajñānaṃ bhavasaṃtānasya avicchedavartitāṃ ca atidīrghakālaṃ ca gamayati,
SA10canprasu:7507: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit syāt svabhāvataḥ,
SA10canprasu:7509: na ca tathāgato nāma kaścid bhāvasvabhāvata upalabhyate /
SA10canprasu:7510: kevalaṃ tu bhavānavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā dvicandrakeśamaśakādivanmithyā tathāgataṃ nāma svabhāvata upalabhate /
SA10canprasu:7513: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10canprasu:7515: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit padārtho 'malo niṣprapañcaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7520: pūrvakā eva pañca skandhāḥ sattvaprajñaptinimittatvādiha vicāre parigṛhyante nottare,
SA10canprasu:7525: tathāgato vā skandhavān bhavet dhanavāniva devadattaḥ?
SA10canprasu:7528: tatra tāvat skandhā eva na tathāgataḥ /
SA10canprasu:7556: skandheṣvātmā vidyate naiva cāmī santi skandhā ātmanītīha yasmāt /
SA10canprasu:7557: satyanyatve syādiyaṃ kalpanā vai taccānyatvaṃ nāstyataḥ kalpanaiṣā //
SA10canprasu:7560: iṣṭo nātmā rūpavānnāsti yasmādātmā vattvārthopayogo hi nātaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7562: bhede gomān rūpavānaṣyabhede tattvānyatve 'rūpato nātmanaḥ staḥ //
SA10canprasu:7563: tattvānyatvapakṣe eva tu pañcāpi pakṣā antargatā vastutaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7564: satkāyadṛṣṭipravṛttyapekṣayā tu pañca pakṣāḥ samupavarṇyante ācāryeṇeti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:7565: yaścaivaṃ skandheṣu pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo nāsti tathāgataḥ,
SA10canprasu:7567: sarvathā na saṃbhavatyeva tathāgata iti bhāvasvabhāvādapaśyanta ācāryapādāḥ prāhuḥ- katamo 'tra tathāgata iti /
SA10canprasu:7570: atraike vadanti- naiva hi skandhāstathāgata iti brūmaḥ,
SA10canprasu:7580: kiṃ tarhi skandhānamalānupādāya tattvānyatvādyavācyaṃ tathāgataṃ vyavasthāpayāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7583: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:7584: yadi hi buddho bhagavānamalān skandhānupādāya tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaḥ prajñapyate,
SA10canprasu:7587: yaśca idānīṃ svabhāvato nāsti ātmīyena svarūpeṇa,
SA10canprasu:7588: sa kathamavidyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti?
SA10canprasu:7589: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ parabhāvamapekṣya bhavatīti yujyate // 2 //
SA10canprasu:7590: atha syāt- yathaiva hi pratibimbakaṃ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānamapi parabhāvaṃ mukhādarśādikamapekṣya bhavati,
SA10canprasu:7591: evaṃ ca tathāgato 'pi svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ anāsravān pañca skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:7593: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:7594: yadi pratibimbavat parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:7601: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi tathāgatasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7602: tadā tatsvabhāvāpekṣayā skandhasvabhāvaḥ parabhāva iti syāt,
SA10canprasu:7603: taṃ ca parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:7604: yadā tu tathāgatasya svabhāva eva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7605: tadā kutaḥ skandhānāṃ paratvaṃ syāditi pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7607: yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:7608: yadā caivaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tadā
SA10canprasu:7612: tābhyāṃ tu vinā ko 'sau aparaḥ padārtho 'sti,
SA10canprasu:7618: yadi manyase- skandhebhyastattvānyatvena avaktavyastathāgataḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate iti,
SA10canprasu:7620: yadi skandhānanupādāya agṛhītvā pūrvaṃ kaścittathāgato nāma bhavet,
SA10canprasu:7622: vyatirikta eva hi pūrvasiddho dhanād devadatto dhanasyopādānaṃ kurute,
SA10canprasu:7623: tadvadetān skandhānanupādāya yadi kaścit tathāgataḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7632: tadā skandhānupādāya tathāgato nāma bhaviṣyatīti nopapadyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:7633: yadā caivaṃ tathāgataḥ upādānātpūrvamavidyamānatvāt na kiṃcidupādatte,
SA10canprasu:7634: tadā tadupādānasyāpi kenacidapi anupādīyamānasya upādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeveti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7643: yo hi tathāgato vicāryamāṇo mṛgyamāṇaḥ tattvenaskandhebhya ekatvena nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7644: anyatvena skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvena ca yo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7646: yo nāsti, sa kathamatyanto 'saṃvidyamānastathāgataḥ upādānena śakyaḥ prajñapayitum?
SA10canprasu:7648: na kevalamanena vicāreṇa tathāgata eva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7654: athāpi syāt- yadyapi svabhāvataḥ upādānaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7658: na hi bandhyāsūnuḥ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ śakyaḥ parabhāvena prajñapayitumiti /
SA10canprasu:7663: atha yadyapi upādātṛnirapekṣamupādānaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7676: naiva tatsaṃbhavati yadavidyamānena avidyamānasya tathāgatasya prajñaptiḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:7677: tasmāt skandhānupādāya tathāgataḥ prajñapyate iti nopapadyate //
SA10canprasu:7678: atrāhuḥ- aho vata hatā pratyāśā asmākam,
SA10canprasu:7684: ityādinā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ vruvatā bhavatā hatā asmākaṃ mokṣapratyāśā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyāgamābhilāṣaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:7687_0: asmākameva hatā pratyāśā bhavadvidheṣvabudhajaneṣu ye hi nāma bhavantaḥ mokṣakāmatayā
SA10canprasu:7687_1: anyatīrthyamatāni parityajya bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamapi aviparītaṃ paramaśāstāraṃ
SA10canprasu:7688: na hi tathāgatāḥ kadācidapyātmanaḥ skandhānāṃ vā astitvaṃ prajñapayanti /
SA10canprasu:7691: buddhadharmā apyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ // iti //
SA10canprasu:7693: dharma svabhāvatu śūnya vivikto bodhi svabhāvatu śūnya viviktā /
SA10canprasu:7694: yo hi caretsa pi śūnyasvabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya // iti /
SA10canprasu:7695: na ca vayaṃ sarvathaiva niṣprapañcānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ,
SA10canprasu:7697: api ca / niḥsvabhāvaṃ hi tathāgataṃ vyācakṣāṇena aviparītārthābhidhitsunā yogināṃ satā sarvathā-
SA10canprasu:7701: kiṃ tu anukte yathāvadavasthitaṃ svabhāvaṃ pratipattā pratipattuṃ na samartha ityato vayamapi āropato vyavahārasatye eva sthitvā vyavahārārthaṃ vineyajanānurodhena (Pp_193)
SA10canprasu:7705: naiva śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamityapi brūmaḥ / ata evāha
SA10canprasu:7713: atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tītaṃ rūpamabhyanandiṣyat /
SA10canprasu:7717: evaṃ yāvat atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo vijñānaṃ nābhaviṣyat- ityādi pūrvavat //
SA10canprasu:7724: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA10canprasu:7730: nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ //
SA10canprasu:7736: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretanirayeṣu gatāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7737: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgavaram // iti /
SA10canprasu:7738: sarvāstvetāḥ kalpanā niṣprapañce tathāgate na saṃbhavanti // 11 //
SA10canprasu:7739: na ca kevalaṃ śūnyatvādikameva catuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, api ca-
SA10canprasu:7755: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA10canprasu:7756: naiva bhavati na na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA10canprasu:7761: tatra yathopavarṇitena nyāyena yathā śūnyatvādikaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ prakṛtyā śānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7763: asaṃbhavādeva ca catuṣṭayaṃ vandhyāputrasya śyāmagauratvādivat na vyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā lokasya /
SA10canprasu:7764: yathā ca etaccatuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7766: idānīṃ bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt ityādikasyāpi kalpanācatuṣṭayasya pravṛttyasaṃbhava mudbhāvayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7769: yena hi ghanataro mahatābhiniveśena asti tathāgataḥ iti grāho gṛhītaḥ,
SA10canprasu:7778: yasya tu na kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatvāt tathāgatasya astitvanāstitvam,
SA10canprasu:7781: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā // 14 //
SA10canprasu:7784: tadevaṃ prakṛtiśānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate sarvaprapañcātīte mandabuddhitayā śāśvatāśāśvatādikayā nityānityāstināstiśūnyāśūnyasarvajñāsarvajñādikayā kalpanayā-
SA10canprasu:7786: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:7792: tamitthaṃvidhaṃ tathāgataṃ svotprekṣitamithyāparikalpamalamalinamānasatayā vividhairabhūtaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣaiḥ ye buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ prapañcayanti,
SA10canprasu:7794: tataśca śavabhūtāḥ etasmin pravacane na paśyanti tathāgataṃ jātyandhā ivādityam /
SA10canprasu:7796: ye māṃ rūpeṇa adrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa anvayuḥ /
SA10canprasu:7797: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ //
SA10canprasu:7798: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7799: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum //
SA10canprasu:7801: tadatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ sattvalokaḥ sakalaḥ sasurāsuranarādiḥ parīkṣitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7811: anupādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7812: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke //
SA10canprasu:7813: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
SA10canprasu:7814: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarva loke // iti /
SA10canprasu:7817: atha khalu te devaputrāḥ āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocan- kiṃ punarāryasubhūte māyopamāste sattvāḥ, na te māyā?
SA10canprasu:7818: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:7820: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayameta dadvaidhīkāram /
SA10canprasu:7833: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan- samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti,
SA10canprasu:7835: subhūtirāha- nirvāṇamapi devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi,
SA10canprasu:7837: devaputrā āhuḥ- nirvāṇamapyāryasubhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
SA10canprasu:7838: subhūtirāha- yadyapi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7840: iti hi māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramiti //
SA10canprasu:7841: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau tathāgataparīkṣā nāma dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:7853: tasmāt kāryabhūtāpi janmamaraṇaparaṃparā avicchedaprabandhena bhavasaṃtatirapi bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:7864: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase /
SA10canprasu:7865: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi //
SA10canprasu:7871: tatra hi śubhamākāraṃ pratītya rāga utpadyate,
SA10canprasu:7884: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:7899: atha syāt- yadi astitvanāstitve ātmano na staḥ,
SA10canprasu:7901: yatasteṣāmapi astitvanāstitve na staḥ iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:7902: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
SA10canprasu:7903: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit // 4 //
SA10canprasu:7904: iha amī rāgādayaḥ kuḍayaṃ citravat phalaṃ pakvatādivacca utpattau āśrayamapekṣante /
SA10canprasu:7907: sa ca āśrayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ ātmā vā cittaṃ vā bhavet /
SA10canprasu:7909: taṃ ca kaṃcidāśrayaṃ vinā kasya kleśā bhavantu?
SA10canprasu:7912: āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit // 4 //
SA10canprasu:7913: atrāha- naiva hi kleśānāṃ kaścidāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ siddho 'bhyupagamyate /
SA10canprasu:7917: kiṃ tarhi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ pratītya kleśā upajāyante,
SA10canprasu:7920: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
SA10canprasu:7924: yatheyaṃ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇā svakāye na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:7925: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10canprasu:7927: ityanena / evaṃ kliṣṭe 'pi kleśā vicāryamāṇāḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavanti /
SA10canprasu:7928: tatra kliśyantīti kleśā kliśyate iti kliṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:7929: tatra yadeva kliṣṭaṃ tadeva kleśā iti na yujyate dagdhṛdāhyayorapyekatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:7934: ata eva ca ekatvānyatvābhāvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāṃ ca abhāvānna kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:7937: ityevaṃ kliṣṭe pañcadhā vicāryamāṇāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti /
SA10canprasu:7938: yathā ca kliṣṭahetukāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti,
SA10canprasu:7939: evaṃ kleśahetukamapi kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣu vicāryamāṇaṃ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:7944: na ca kliṣṭe kleśāḥ na ca kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:7946: ityevaṃ svakāyadṛṣṭivadeva kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi pañcadhā nāsti /
SA10canprasu:7956: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā-
SA10canprasu:7959: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā-
SA10canprasu:7973: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate // 7 //
SA10canprasu:7979: rūpaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāśceti /
SA10canprasu:7982: tena śabdena śabdyante prakāśyante padārthā iti śabdaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7983: gandhyante hiṃsyante yatra prāptāḥ tato 'nyatrāgamanād gandhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7992: āghātaḥ sattvaviṣayo 'sattvaviṣayo vā dūṣyate vā anena citamiti doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7995: tadeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ rūpādikaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu ālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:7996: tatra śubhākārādhyāropeṇa yathā rūpādibhyo rāga upajāyate,
SA10canprasu:8000: kiṃ tu avidyamānasvabhāvasattākametad rāgādīnāmālambanatvena parikalpyate bhavatā taimirikairiva asatkeśamaśakamakṣikādvicandrādikamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8008: yathā gandharvanagarādiprakhyā ete kevalaṃ viparyāsādupalabhyante, tadā-
SA10canprasu:8009: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:8013: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ //
SA10canprasu:8021: iha yadi śubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
SA10canprasu:8029: yadaśubhaṃ pratītya yadaśubhamapekṣya śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi vyavasthāpayemahi /
SA10canprasu:8032: yataśca evaṃ śubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyamaśubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:8039: yadi hi aśubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
SA10canprasu:8052: yataścaivamaśubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:8055: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:8057: śubhāśubhanimittakayo rāgadveṣayoḥ śubhāśubhanimittābhāve sati nirhetukatvānnāsti saṃbhava ityabhiprāyaḥ // 12 //
SA10canprasu:8058: tadevaṃ śubhāśubhanimittābhāvena rāgadveṣayorabhāvamupapādya viparyāsasvabhāvābhāvapratipādanena mohasyāpyadhunā svabhāvābhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8060: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ // 13 //
SA10canprasu:8062: tadyathā- anitye pratikṣaṇavināśini skandhapañcake yo nityamiti grāhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8064: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham /
SA10canprasu:8068: tasmādduḥkhātmake skandhapañcake yaḥ sukhamiti viparīto grāhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8073: yaḥ śayīta sa nārīṇāṃ śayīta jaghanodare // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:8081: atredānīṃ vicāryate- yadi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaṃ svabhāvaśūnyeṣu nityagrāho viparyāsa ityevaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:8082: nanu ca svabhāvaśūnyeṣu skandheṣu anityatvamapi nāsti, iti
SA10canprasu:8083: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8084: anityatvaṃ hi viparītamapekṣya nityatvaṃ viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:8087: tadā kutastadvirodhi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaviparyāso bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8089: yathā ca anityatvaṃ śūnye na saṃbhavati bhāvasvabhāvarahite sasvabhāvena anutpanne,
SA10canprasu:8099: avidyayā naiva kadāci vidyate avidyata pratyayasaṃbhavaśca /
SA10canprasu:8100: avidyamāneyamavidya loke tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā //
SA10canprasu:8106: nanu evaṃ sati svabhāvena avidyamāne padārthe anityamityapi grāho na saṃbhavati iti asāvapi kasmānna viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8108: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ // 14 //
SA10canprasu:8109: yadā ca ubhayasyāpi vaiparītyaṃ nityasya anityasya ca,
SA10canprasu:8110: tadā tadvayatiriktaṃ tṛtīyamaparaṃ nāsti yanna viparyayaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8115: yathā ca anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyāso na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:8118: bhagavānāha- kimetat kulaputra tasya bhavati yo mārgeṇa niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate?
SA10canprasu:8119: na kulaputra tathāgatena rañjanīyān dharmān parivarjya rāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam,
SA10canprasu:8120: evaṃ na doṣaṇīyān mohanīyāna dharmān parivarjya tathāgatena doṣamohaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam /
SA10canprasu:8122_0: na kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kasyaciddharmasya utsargāya vā pratilambhāya vā dharmaṃ deśayanti
SA10canprasu:8122_1: na parijñāyai na prahāṇāya na sākṣātkriyāyai nābhisamayāya na saṃsāracaraṇatāyai
SA10canprasu:8135: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāgacittamutpādayet /
SA10canprasu:8137: so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasi kuryādanityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasi kuryāt /
SA10canprasu:8138: bhagavānāha- evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:8143: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare svagṛhe rājabhāryāṃ paśyet /
SA10canprasu:8149: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bhītasrastaḥ palāyamānastato rājabhāryānidānabhayātparimucyeta?
SA10canprasu:8152: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa astriyāṃ strīsaṃjñā utpāditā,
SA10canprasu:8154: bhagavānāha- evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:8155: ye arāge rāgasaṃjñāmutpādya rāgabhayabhītā rāganiḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:8160: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sa puruṣaḥ abhaye bhayasaṃjñāmutpādayedasatsamāropeṇa /
SA10canprasu:8161: evameva kulaputra sarvabālapṛthagjanā rāgakoṭiṃ virāgakoṭimaprajānanto rāgakoṭibhayabhītā virāgakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:8163: mohakoṭiṃ śūnyatākoṭimaprajānanto mohakoṭibhayabhītāḥ śūnyatākoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:8164: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputra mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi /
SA10canprasu:8167: atrāha- yadyapi anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyayo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:8170: tasya ca avaśyaṃ sādhanena karaṇena bhavitavyaṃ sādhakatamena nityatvādinā /
SA10canprasu:8171: kartrā ca bhavitavyaṃ svatantreṇa nityātmanā cittena vā /
SA10canprasu:8173: satyāṃ ca bhāvakaraṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ siddhau sarvasiddheriṣṭasiddhiḥ syādasmākamiti /
SA10canprasu:8177: yena gṛhṇāti yogrāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
SA10canprasu:8179: iha hi kaścid grahītā yena viśeṣeṇa nityatvādinā karaṇabhūtena kiṃcit karmabhūtaṃ rūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu gṛhṇāti,
SA10canprasu:8180: tadyathā na saṃbhavati tathā pūrvaṃ pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:8184: ityādinā yathā nityatvādikaṃ karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:8193: tadā kuto nirhetuko grāho bhaviṣyati? tataśca-
SA10canprasu:8194: yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
SA10canprasu:8199: athavā / pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ prakaraṇairyasmāt sarveṣāmeva karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ sarvathānutpādaḥ pratipāditaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8204: iha hi viparyāsānugato devadatto nāma vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8205: na ca vinā viparyāsaiḥ sa viparyāsānugataḥ saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:8208: iha asmābhiḥ karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāmabhāvāt sarvathā grāha eva nāstīti pratipāditam / tataśca-
SA10canprasu:8209: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā /
SA10canprasu:8211: samyagvā mithyā vā kasyacit kiṃcidapyagṛhṇataḥ kuto viparītatvamaviparītatvaṃ veti /
SA10canprasu:8213: api ca / ime viparyayāḥ kasyacidiṣyamāṇāḥ viparītasya parikalpyeran,
SA10canprasu:8234: ardhaviparīto hi nāma yasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ kiṃcidaviparītam /
SA10canprasu:8235: tatra yadasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ tadviparyāso na viparyāsayati,
SA10canprasu:8242: bhavānidānīṃ vimṛśatu svayaṃ prajñayā madhyasthaḥ san kasya saṃbhavanti viparyāsā iti /
SA10canprasu:8248: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10canprasu:8256: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃna sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8257: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ // 21 //
SA10canprasu:8258: yadi etāni ātmaśucinityasukhāni viparyāsā iti vyavasthāpyante,
SA10canprasu:8266: viparyāsapratibandhyabhāvādanātmādīnāmapi aviparyāsādīnāṃ nāsti sadbhāva iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8267: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8268: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate // 22 //
SA10canprasu:8269: yadi ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca na vidyate iti manyase,
SA10canprasu:8271: evaṃ sati ātmādīnāmapyabhāvād yadi etadanātmādikamaviparyāsatvena gṛhītam,
SA10canprasu:8275: tadā tadapi svarūpato 'vidyamānatvāt ātmādivat kathaṃ na viparyāsaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:8277: asya ca yathopavarṇitaviparyāsavicārasya avidyādiprahāṇahetutvena mahārthatāṃ pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8281: yadā ayaṃ yogī yathoditena nyāyena viparyāsān nopalabhate,
SA10canprasu:8282: tadā evaṃ viparyāsānupalambhanena taddhetukā avidyā nirudhyate /
SA10canprasu:8284: avidyā hi sakalasyaiva saṃkleśagaṇasya jātyādiduḥkhasya ca hetubhūtā /
SA10canprasu:8285: yathā hi kāyendriyahetukāni sarvāṇi rūpīndriyāṇi kāyendriye nirudhyamāne nirudhyante,
SA10canprasu:8286: evamavidyāhetukāni saṃskārādīni bhavāṅgāni pravartamānāni niyatamavidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ nirudhyante iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8289: asti tarhi avidyā yasyā evaṃ viparyāsanirodhānnirodho bhavati /
SA10canprasu:8297_0: yo hi nāma sarvātmanā atyantaduḥkhāyāsakleśāsamañjase saṃsāre nirantaraphullaphalapradasaṃkleśaviṣavṛkṣe
SA10canprasu:8299: api ca / yadi avidyādīnāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavet,
SA10canprasu:8302: yadi syāt, tadā tattvarūpato vidyamānānāṃ vā syāt,
SA10canprasu:8305: tatra yadi svarūpataḥ sadbhatānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamiṣyate,
SA10canprasu:8308: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
SA10canprasu:8309: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati // 24 //
SA10canprasu:8310: svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na śakyaḥ svabhāvo vinivartayitum /
SA10canprasu:8312: evaṃ yadi ime kleśāḥ svabhāvataḥ sadbhūtāḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:8317: kasmātpunaḥ na te prahīyante ityāha- kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyatīti /
SA10canprasu:8325: abhūtā api kleśāḥ svabhāvena avidyamānāḥ aśakyā eva prahātum /
SA10canprasu:8327: evamime 'pi kleśāḥ kecid yadi kasyacit svabhāvato na vidyante,
SA10canprasu:8332: ato yaduktam- vidyanta eva avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ,
SA10canprasu:8344: sa taṃ dharmamasamanupaśyan anupalabhamāno 'rakto 'duṣṭo 'mūḍho 'viparyastacittaḥ samāhita ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8349: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam /
SA10canprasu:8350: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo //
SA10canprasu:8351: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
SA10canprasu:8352: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:8354: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
SA10canprasu:8356: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
SA10canprasu:8357: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ na sa labhyate //
SA10canprasu:8359: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate /
SA10canprasu:8360: śabdaścāpi nirvāṇaṃ ca ubhayaṃ tanna labhyate /
SA10canprasu:8363: nirvāṇaṃ nivṛttireva nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
SA10canprasu:8368: jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyatāṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /
SA10canprasu:8369: vyāhāramātreṇa hi vyāharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi //
SA10canprasu:8371: parinirvṛta loki te śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8372: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅgu vivarjiya sattva vinenti //
SA10canprasu:8374: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau viparyāsaparīkṣā nāma trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:8379: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8381: yadi yuktyā nopapadyate iti kṛtvā sarvamidaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ bhāvajātaṃ śūnyamiti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:8382: nanu ca evaṃ sati bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā bhavata āpadyante /
SA10canprasu:8391: iha hi pūrvahetujanitāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca pratikūlavartitvācca pīḍātmakatvena duḥkhamityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8392: etacca duḥkhamāryā eva viparyāsaprahāṇe sati duḥkhamiti saṃjānate,
SA10canprasu:8396: yathā hi viparyastendriyāṇāṃ madhurasvabhāvamapi guḍaśarkarādikaṃ tiktatayā upalabhamānānāṃ jvarādirogāturāṇāṃ tiktataiva satyaṃ tajjñānāpekṣayā,
SA10canprasu:8403: ataḥ āryāṇāmeva duḥkhātmatā satyamiti kṛtvā duḥkhamāryasatyamityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8404: nanu ca anāryairduḥkhā vedanā duḥkhamiti paricchidyate iti,
SA10canprasu:8406: na hi duḥkhaiva vedanā kevalaṃ duḥkhasatyam,
SA10canprasu:8408: ityataḥ āryāṇāmeva tat satyamiti kṛtvā āryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate / yathoktam-
SA10canprasu:8409: ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vi(ve?)
SA10canprasu:8411: akṣigataṃ tu tadeva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍāṃ ca //
SA10canprasu:8417: yadā tu śūnyatvānna kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:8421: samudeti samutpadyate sa hetuḥ tṛṣṇākarmakleśalakṣaṇaḥ samudaya ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8425: duḥkhasya ca vigamaḥ apunarutpādaḥ nirodha ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8430: asati ca duḥkhanirodhe kuto duḥkhanirodhagāminī āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānugā pratipad bhaviṣyatīti mārgasatyamapi nāstīti /
SA10canprasu:8431: tadevaṃ śūnyatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ bruvataḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prasajyate // 1 //
SA10canprasu:8433: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
SA10canprasu:8435_1: duḥkhasamudayasya ca prahāṇaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminyāśca pratipado bhāvanā duḥkhanirodhasya
SA10canprasu:8440: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:8441: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8443: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:8448: iha kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ phalākhyaṃ pratilabhate /
SA10canprasu:8449: tadyathā- saṃyojanatrayaprahāṇe sati ṣoḍaśe mārge anvayajñānakṣaṇe yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tat srotaāpattiphalam /
SA10canprasu:8450: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyamṛdūnāṃ prakārāṇāṃ punaradhimātramadhyamṛduprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ nava prakārā bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:8451: tatra kāmāvacaraṣaṣṭhakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam /
SA10canprasu:8452: teṣāmeva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ navamaprakārakleśaparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tadanāgāmiphalam /
SA10canprasu:8453_0: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārabhedabhinnānāṃ
SA10canprasu:8460: yadā tu duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:8461: tadā na santi tāni catvāri phalāni /
SA10canprasu:8462: caturṇā ca phalānāmabhāve sati ye teṣu vyavasthitāḥ phalasthāścatvāra āryapudgalāḥ, te na santi /
SA10canprasu:8463: ata eva ca pratipannakā api catvāra āryapudgalā na saṃvidyante //
SA10canprasu:8465: iha hi ṣoḍaśāt mārge 'nvayajñānakṣaṇāt pūrve ye pañcadaśa kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ,
SA10canprasu:8469: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8470: evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktāṣṭādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ duḥkhādyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8474: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣayo dvitīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8479_1: kāmāvacaraduḥkha nirodhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8480: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8481: etaireva ākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8482: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8485: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8488: evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8489: ṣoḍaśe tu mārge 'nvayajñānasthitaḥ sa srotaāpanna ityucyate //
SA10canprasu:8491: ta ete aṣṭāśītiranuśayāḥ satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa bhāvanāmanapekṣyaiva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśanaprahātavyā ityucyante /
SA10canprasu:8492: yathādṛṣṭasatyākārabhāvanayā tu ye paścātprahīyante te bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8496: ārūpyāvacarāśca trayaḥ ete eveti daśa bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:8497: ete ca yathoktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante,
SA10canprasu:8500: ekaikasya ca kleśaprakārasya prahāṇārthamānantaryavimuktimārgabhedena dvau dvau jñānakṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśakṣaṇaviparyayeṇa /
SA10canprasu:8505: tatra darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaṣaṣṭhakleśaprakārapratipakṣavimuktimārgākhyajñānakṣaṇādarvāg jñānakṣaṇāvasthitaḥ āryaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8509: ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇādūrdhva navamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8518: catvāraśca phalasthāḥ ityete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalā bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:8524: sukṣetraṃ te pravakṣyāmi yatra dattaṃ mahatphalam //
SA10canprasu:8527: yadi catvāri āryasatyāni na santi teṣāṃ ca parijñānāni,
SA10canprasu:8530: tatra (Pp_213) adhigamadharmeṇa pratyakṣadharmatayā sarvamārairapi buddhe bhagavati abhedyatvādavetya prasādalābhena saṃghaḥ, sa na syāt /
SA10canprasu:8532: āryasatyānāṃ ca abhāvāt saddharmo 'pi na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:8540: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddhao bhaviṣyati //
SA10canprasu:8542: tadā taddharmapratipattyā sarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhād buddho bhavatīti yuktaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8544: tadā tadupadeśairupacīyamānajñānasaṃbhāraḥ taddānamānaśaraṇagamanādibhiśca upacīyamānapuṇyasaṃbhāraḥ kramād buddho bhavet //
SA10canprasu:8547: avaśyaṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhagavatā kasmiṃścit phale vyavasthātavyam /
SA10canprasu:8548: tatra ca phale vyavasthitaḥ saṃghāntaḥpātyeva bhagavān bhavati /
SA10canprasu:8549: saṃghe cāsati niyataṃ nāsti bhagavān buddhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8551: tathā ca buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ ityabhidhānāt saṃghāntargata eva bhagavān iti kecidvarṇayanti /
SA10canprasu:8553: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /iti /
SA10canprasu:8554: madhyoddeśikāśca mahāvastūpadiṣṭabhūmivyavasthayā prathamabhūmisthitaṃ bodhisattvamutpannadarśanamārgaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ saṃghāntaḥpātinaṃ vyācakṣate /
SA10canprasu:8555: tadā saṃghe cāsati bodhisattvo 'pi nāstīti kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyatīti spaṣṭamevaitat / tad-
SA10canprasu:8557: śūnyatāmityevaṃ vadan buddhadharmasaṃghākhyāni trīṇyapi durlabhatvāt kadācideva utpattitaḥ alpapuṇyānāṃ ca tadaprāpteḥ mahārghamūlyatvād ratnāni pratibādhase // 5 //
SA10canprasu:8564: tadā sarvāntaḥ pātitvāt dharmādharmau saha taddhetukena iṣṭāniṣṭaphalena na saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:8565: sarva eva cāmī laukikā vyavahārāḥ- kuru,
SA10canprasu:8570: āgaccha ityevamādayo 'pi sarvāntargatatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatvānnaiva yujyante iti /
SA10canprasu:8572: atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
SA10canprasu:8573: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase // 7 //
SA10canprasu:8575_0: sa bhavān svavikalpanayaiva nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārtha ityevaṃ viparītamadhyāropya “yadi
SA10canprasu:8575_1: sarvamidaṃ śūnyamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ” ityādinopālambhaṃ bruvāṇo 'smāsu mahāntaṃ
SA10canprasu:8576: na tvayamasmābhiratra śāstre śūnyatārthaṃ upavarṇito yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8586: bhavāṃstu nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ parikalpayan prapañcajālameva saṃvardhayamāno na śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanaṃ vetti //
SA10canprasu:8591: ataḥ prapañcanivṛttisvabhāvāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ kuto nāstitvamiti śūnyatāmapina jānāti bhavān /
SA10canprasu:8596: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
SA10canprasu:8597: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnyu ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
SA10canprasu:8608: ata ācāryaḥ karuṇayā parasya mithyāpravacanārthāvabodhanirāsārthaṃ bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavyavasthāmeva tāvadadhikṛtyāha-
SA10canprasu:8612: iha hi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ satyadvayamāśritya dharmadeśanā pravartate /
SA10canprasu:8615: skandhātmā loka ākhyātastatra loko hi niśritaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8616: iti vacanātpañca skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalo loka ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8623: kiṃ punaralokasaṃvṛtirapyasti yata evaṃ viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti?
SA10canprasu:8633: na hi paramārthata ete vyavahārāḥ saṃbhavanti / tatra hi-
SA10canprasu:8636: iti kṛtvā kutastatra paramārthe vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ kuto vā jñānasya?
SA10canprasu:8637: sa hi paramārtho 'parapratyayaḥ śāntaḥ pratyātmavedya āryāṇāṃ sarvaprapañcātītaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8648: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane // 9 //
SA10canprasu:8649: atrāha- yadi tarhi paramārtho niṣprapañcasvabhāvaḥ sa evāstu,
SA10canprasu:8657: anadhigamya ca paramārthaṃ na śakyaṃ nirvāṇamadhigantumiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8662: tadevaṃ yaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthalakṣaṇasatyadvayasya vyavasthāmapākṛtya śūnyatāṃ varṇayati,
SA10canprasu:8665: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā // 19 //
SA10canprasu:8666: saṃvṛtisatyaṃ hi ajñānamātrasamutthāpitaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ buddhā tasya paramārthalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyamāno yogī nāntadvaye patati /
SA10canprasu:8667: kiṃ tadāsīdyadidānīṃ nāstītyevaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt paścādapi nāstitāṃ na pratipadyate /
SA10canprasu:8671: yastu evaṃ satyadvayavibhāgamapaśyan śūnyatāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ paśyati,
SA10canprasu:8672: sa śūnyatāṃ paśyan mumukṣurnāstitāṃ vā saṃskārāṇāṃ parikalpayed,
SA10canprasu:8675: ubhayathā cāsya durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā niyataṃ vināśayet /
SA10canprasu:8677: yadi tāvatsarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ nāstīti parikalpayet,
SA10canprasu:8682: tadā niyatamasya śūnyatāyāḥ pratikṣepa āpadyate- kathaṃ hi nāma amī bhāvāḥ sakalasurāsuranaralokairupalabhyamānā api śūnyā bhaviṣyanti?
SA10canprasu:8684: ityevaṃ pratikṣipya saddharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena pāpakena karmaṇā niyatamapāyānvayāt /
SA10canprasu:8688: evaṃ tāvadabhāvena gṛhyamāṇā śūnyatā grahītāraṃ vināśayati /
SA10canprasu:8692: tadevaṃ bhāvarūpeṇāpi śūnyatā gṛhyamāṇā grahītāraṃ vināśayati //
SA10canprasu:8693: nanu ca yadupakārakaṃ tadanyathā [kriyamāṇamakāloptamiva bījaṃ na phalāya kalpate,
SA10canprasu:8695: evameva maṇimantrauṣadhādibhi] rgṛhyamāṇaḥ [sarpaḥ] mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhamāvahati śiromaṇigrahaṇāt,
SA10canprasu:8699: yathā ca yathopadeśaṃ prasādhitā vidyā sādhakamanugṛhṇāti,
SA10canprasu:8701_0: evamihāpi yathopadeśaṃ śūnyatā mahatī vidyā sādhyamānā gṛhyamāṇā bhāvābhāvādigrāhatiraskāreṇa
SA10canprasu:8702: yathopadeśaviśeṣavigamena tu gṛhyamāṇā niyataṃ yathoditena nyāyena grahītārameva vināśayati //
SA10canprasu:8707: yasmādayaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇo dharmo mandamedhasamalpaprajñaṃ sattvaṃ viparyāsagrahaṇādvināśayati,
SA10canprasu:8708: ata eva asya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatāṃ matvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvadhātuṃ cāvalokya dharmasya cātigāmbhīryam,
SA10canprasu:8709: saddharmaṃ deśayituṃ cittaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato mahopāyajñānaviśeṣaśālinaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8711: atha bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhasyaitadabhavat- adhigato mayā dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8723: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8724: ityādinā, sa yasmāt satyadvayavyavasthānabhijñena satā śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ śūnyatāprayojanaṃ ca yathāvadabuddhā upakṣiptaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8727: ato yaṃ bhavān doṣaprasaṅgaṃ śūnyatāyāmudbhāvayan śūnyatāyāmadhilayamadhikṣepaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṃ karoti,
SA10canprasu:8729: abhāvārthaṃ hi śūnyatārthamadhyāropya prasaṅga udbhāvito bhavatā /
SA10canprasu:8734: api khalu sarvameva satyādi vyavasthānaṃ sutarāmupapadyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8736: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8737: sarvaṃna yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate // 14 //
SA10canprasu:8741: yasmāt pratītyasamutpādaṃ hi vayaṃ śūnyateti vyācakṣmahe-
SA10canprasu:8742: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
SA10canprasu:8743: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
SA10canprasu:8751: yasmāt pratītyasamutpannaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ bhavati nāpratītyasamutpannam /
SA10canprasu:8753: sati ca duḥkhe duḥkha samudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī ca pratipad yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8754: tataśca duḥkhaparijñānaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ nirodhasākṣātkaraṇaṃ mārgabhāvanā ca yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8759: āryasatyānāṃ ca sadbhāve sati saddharmo 'pi yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8760: sati ca saddharme saṃghe ca buddho 'pi yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8763: dharmādharmaṃ tatphalaṃ sugatidurgatiḥ laukikāśca sarvasaṃvyavahārā yujyante / tadevam-
SA10canprasu:8764: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8768: yasya tu śūnyatā yathoditā na yujyate,
SA10canprasu:8773: atisthūle atyāsanne tadviruddhe ca svakīye pakṣe doṣavati atimogho yathāvadavasthitau guṇadoṣāvapaśyan-
SA10canprasu:8786: yadi tvaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānān bhāvān paśyasi,
SA10canprasu:8787: tadā svabhāvasya hetupratyayanirapekṣatvāt ahetupratyayān avidyamānahetupratyayān padārthān bāhyādhyātmikabhedabhinnān nirhetukān tvamevaṃ sati paśyasi // 16 //
SA10canprasu:8789: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
SA10canprasu:8790: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase // 17 //
SA10canprasu:8793: tadā asya svabhāvato vidyamānasya kiṃ mṛdādibhirhetupratyayaiḥ prayojanamiti teṣāmabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8798: iti sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvametat kāryādikaṃ pratibādhase /
SA10canprasu:8799: tadevaṃ bhavataḥ sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvameva na yujyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:8809: yaḥ pratyatyairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
SA10canprasu:8810: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:8811: tathā āryalaṅkāvatāre- “svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti mayā deśitāḥ” //
SA10canprasu:8820: saiva svabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipaditi vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:8824: ato bhāvābhāvāntadvayarahitatvāt sarvasvabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipat,
SA10canprasu:8840: pratītya dharmānadhigacchate vidū na cāntadṛṣṭīya karoti niśrayam /
SA10canprasu:8841: sahetu sapratyaya dharma jānati ahetu apratyaya nāsti dharmatā //
SA10canprasu:8855: anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate // 21 //
SA10canprasu:8861: anityaṃ ca duḥkhamuktaṃ bhavagatā- yadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti /
SA10canprasu:8864: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham /
SA10canprasu:8865: tasmādanityaṃ yatsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ taditi jāyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:8868: evaṃ tāvat sasvabhāvatve sati bhāvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8869: na ca kevalaṃ duḥkhameva na yujyate,
SA10canprasu:8870: sati sasvabhāvābhyupagame samudayo 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8873: iha samudetyasmādduḥkhamiti duḥkhasya hetu [taḥ] samudaya ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8874: tadasya duḥkhasya śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya sasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya punarutpādavaiyarthyāt taddhetukalpanāvaiyarthyameva,
SA10canprasu:8875: ityevaṃ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya samudayo 'pi bhavato na yujyate // 22 //
SA10canprasu:8876: svābhāvikameva duḥkhamabhyupagacchato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8877: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8881: evaṃ svabhāvaparyavasthānāt svabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭhamāno duḥkhanirodhamapi pratibādhase // 23 //
SA10canprasu:8882: idānīmāryamārgo 'pi sasvabhāvavādino yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8884: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate // 24 //
SA10canprasu:8886: tadā mārgo 'pi sasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā abhāvita evāsāvasti /
SA10canprasu:8889: atha asya mārgasya bhāvanā abhyupagamyate bhavatā,
SA10canprasu:8890: evaṃ tarhi svabhāvatā āryamārgasya na syāt,
SA10canprasu:8892: api ca- duḥkhasya nirodhaprāptyarthaṃ samudayasya ca prahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanā mārgasyeṣyate /
SA10canprasu:8894: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8900: idānīṃ duḥkhādiparijñānādikamapi yathā parasya na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:8905: yadi pūrvaṃ duḥkhamaparijñātasvabhāvaṃ tat paścāt parijñāyata iti kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:8914: tadā pūrvamaparijñātasvabhāvasya duḥkhasya paścādapi parijñānaṃ nopapadyata iti /
SA10canprasu:8919: yadetat samudayasya prahāṇaṃ nirodhasya ca sākṣātkaraṇam,
SA10canprasu:8920: te ete dve prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe yā ca mārgasya bhāvanā, eṣāpi /
SA10canprasu:8922: samudayasya svabhāvenāprahīṇasya svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt paścādapi prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:8924: na ca kevalaṃ parijñānādikameva na saṃbhavati sasvabhāvavāde, api ca-
SA10canprasu:8926: yathā svabhāvenāparijñātasya duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ na yuktam,
SA10canprasu:8927: evaṃ svabhāvenāvidyamānasya pūrvaṃ srotaāpattiphalasya paścādastitvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:8930: na ca kevalametāni phalāni parijñāvanna yujyante,
SA10canprasu:8931: kiṃ tarhi adhigamo 'pyeṣāṃ na yujyata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8936: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8937: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ // 29 //
SA10canprasu:8939: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati // 30 //
SA10canprasu:8943: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
SA10canprasu:8944: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate // 31 //
SA10canprasu:8945: yadi hi svabhāvato buddho nāma kaścid bhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8947: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
SA10canprasu:8954: iha hi buddhatvātpūrvamabuddhasvabhāvasya sataḥ pudgalasya satyāmapi bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhyarthaṃ ghaṭamānasyāpi naiva bodhiḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8957: na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati /
SA10canprasu:8958: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi // 33 //
SA10canprasu:8959: sati hi svabhāvavādābhyupagame dharmādharmayoḥ karaṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:8963: vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8964: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate // 34 //
SA10canprasu:8968: yadā ca vinā dharmādharmaṃ phalaṃ tavāsti,
SA10canprasu:8969: tadā dharmādharmajaṃ phalaṃ tava na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:8971: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate / iti /
SA10canprasu:8974: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
SA10canprasu:8987: tadbādhanācca sarva eva laukikā vyavahārā bādhitā bhavantīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8996: yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ,
SA10canprasu:8998: tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:9009: tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyāvartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt /
SA10canprasu:9013: syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:9014: tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve /
SA10canprasu:9015: kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ // iti //
SA10canprasu:9017: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9018: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ // iti // 38 //
SA10canprasu:9019: na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante,
SA10canprasu:9025: yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt,
