SA10canprasu:9027: iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt /
SA10canprasu:9028: tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt /
SA10canprasu:9029: sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt // 39 //
SA10canprasu:9030: tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ-
SA10canprasu:9032: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // 40 //
SA10canprasu:9033: yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati,
SA10canprasu:9034: sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ /
SA10canprasu:9046_0: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ
SA10canprasu:9047: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti?
SA10canprasu:9048: bhagavānāha- ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
SA10canprasu:9050: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
SA10canprasu:9052: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano 'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate,
SA10canprasu:9055: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
SA10canprasu:9059: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān,
SA10canprasu:9075: tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
SA10canprasu:9079: sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
SA10canprasu:9088: sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
SA10canprasu:9089: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:9090: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate /
SA10canprasu:9097: tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
SA10canprasu:9100: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati //
SA10canprasu:9101: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
SA10canprasu:9111: sa na kalpayati- ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ,
SA10canprasu:9120: tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet /
SA10canprasu:9121: bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca /
SA10canprasu:9124: ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam //
SA10canprasu:9125: evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu /
SA10canprasu:9127: tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā /
SA10canprasu:9128: sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati,
SA10canprasu:9131: sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kvaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati /
SA10canprasu:9134: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:9139: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9141: iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:9142: tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate /
SA10canprasu:9156: abhedi kāyo nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā /
SA10canprasu:9162: etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho bhavati?
SA10canprasu:9173: svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ,
SA10canprasu:9176: na ca śūnyatāvādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:9178: yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti,
SA10canprasu:9187: tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet?
SA10canprasu:9193: atha syāt- yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ,
SA10canprasu:9199: yasmānnirvāṇādarvāk svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ na punarabhāvaḥ śakyate kartum /
SA10canprasu:9202: nivāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10canprasu:9204: tadevaṃ nirvāṇe na kasyacit prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:9207: nirvṛtti dharmāṇa ca asti dharmā ye neha astī na te jātu asti /
SA10canprasu:9208: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati // iti /
SA10canprasu:9209: asyā gāthāyā ayamarthaḥ- nivṛtau nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau dharmāṇāṃ kleśakarmajanmalakṣaṇānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā sarvathā astaṃgamādastitvaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:9211: ye tarhi dharmā iha nirvṛtau na santi,
SA10canprasu:9214: na te dharmāḥ kleśakarmajanmādilakṣaṇāḥ kasmiṃścit kāle saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi tattvato (Pp_229) vidyante /
SA10canprasu:9215: na hi rajjuḥ andhakārāvasthāyāṃ svarūpataḥ sarpo 'sti,
SA10canprasu:9217: kathaṃ tarhi saṃsāraḥ iti cet, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:9218: ātmātmīyāsadgrahagrastānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāmasatsvarūpā api bhāvāḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsante taimirikāṇāmiva asatkeśamaśakādaya iveti / āha-
SA10canprasu:9219: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati / iti /
SA10canprasu:9222: tadanyeṣāṃ ca atītānāgatasaṃsthānāṃ vijñaptiviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ nāstivādināṃ tadanyadastivādinām,
SA10canprasu:9225: evamastināstivādināmevaṃ caratāṃ na duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ śāmyatīti / tathā-
SA10canprasu:9226: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjña abhyupeti no cāpi koṣṭha gantu āviṣṭa papadyate /
SA10canprasu:9227: evameva bālu 'pagato ..... jāyi mriyate sadā abhūto // iti /
SA10canprasu:9228: tadevaṃ na kasyacinnirvāṇe prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:9231: na cābhāvo 'pi nirvāṇaṃ kuta evāsya bhāvanā /
SA10canprasu:9234: ye tu sarvakalpanopaśamarūpaṃ nirvāṇamapratipadyamānāḥ bhāvābhāvatadubhayānubhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parikalpayanti,
SA10canprasu:9237: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // 4 //
SA10canprasu:9238: tatraike bhāvato nirvāṇamabhiniviṣṭā evamācakṣate- iha kleśakarmajanmasaṃtānapravṛttiniyatarodhabhūto jalapravāharodhabhūtasetusthānīyo nirodhātmakaḥ padārthaḥ,
SA10canprasu:9240: na ca avidyamānasvabhāvo dharmaḥ evaṃ kāryakārī dṛśyate /
SA10canprasu:9241: nanu ca yo 'syā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇamityuktam,
SA10canprasu:9242: na ca kṣayamātraṃ bhāvo bhavitumarhati / tathā-
SA10canprasu:9245: ityuktam / na ca pradyotasya nivṛttirbhāva ityupapadyate /
SA10canprasu:9247: naitadevaṃ vijñeyaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:9248: kiṃ tarhi tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo 'sminniti nirvāṇākhye dharme sati bhavati,
SA10canprasu:9251: tatrāpi yasmin sati cetaso vimokṣo bhavatīti veditavyamiti //
SA10canprasu:9252: evaṃ bhāve nirvāṇa vyavasthāpite ācāryo nirūpayati- bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:9259: tāmeva ca jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇavyabhicāritāṃ spaṣṭayannāha- asti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vineti /
SA10canprasu:9265: bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:9266: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana // 5 //
SA10canprasu:9273: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana /
SA10canprasu:9279: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:9290: vyatirekakāraṇamāha- nānupādāya kaścidbhāvo hi vidyate iti // 6 //
SA10canprasu:9291: atrāha- yadi bhāvo hi na nirvāṇam,
SA10canprasu:9296: yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:9297: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate // 7 //
SA10canprasu:9312: tatra abhāvaḥ anityatā vā bhāvamupādāya prajñapyate,
SA10canprasu:9316: ataḥ parasparāpekṣikyāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇapravṛttau kuto lakṣyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya anityatā bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:9322: etadeva spaṣṭayannāha- na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti //
SA10canprasu:9331: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
SA10canprasu:9341: tataśca sthitameva na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti // 8 //
SA10canprasu:9342: atrāha- yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:9349: sa cāyamājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ kadāciddhetupratyayasāmagrīmāśritya astīti prajñapyate dīrghahrasvavat /
SA10canprasu:9352: yadi vā pratītya jāyata iti vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:9353: sarvathāsya janmamaraṇaparaṃparāprabandhasya apratītya vā anupādāya vā apravṛttistannirvāṇamiti (Pp_232)
SA10canprasu:9355: na ca apravṛttimātraṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti parikalpitu pāryata iti /
SA10canprasu:9358: teṣāṃ pratītya pratītya ya utpādaśca vināśaśca,
SA10canprasu:9361: teṣāṃ tasya nityānityatvenāvācyasya tattadupādānamāśritya ya ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ sa upādāya pravartate,
SA10canprasu:9362: sa evopādāyopādāya pravartayamānaḥ sannidānīmanupādāyāpravartayamāno nirvāṇamiti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:9363: na ca saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā apravṛttimātrakaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti śakyaṃ parikalpayitum /
SA10canprasu:9364: ityato 'pi na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:9368: tatra sūtra uktam- ye kecidbhikṣavo bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante vibhavena vā,
SA10canprasu:9371: ubhayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ bhave tṛṣṇā vibhave tṛṣṇā ca /
SA10canprasu:9378: yeṣāmapi kleśajanmanostatrābhāvādabhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca bhāvarūpatvādbhāvarūpamityubhayarūpam,
SA10canprasu:9384: tadā bhāvaśca abhāvaśca mokṣa iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:9385: tataśca yaḥ saṃskārāṇāmātmalābhaḥ tasya ca vigamaḥ,
SA10canprasu:9387: na ca saṃskārā eva mokṣa iti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:9388: ata evāha- tacca na yujyate iti // 11 //
SA10canprasu:9399: iti kṛtvā ubhayametad bhāvaṃ ca abhāvaṃ ca upādāyaiva bhavati,
SA10canprasu:9407: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau // 13 //
SA10canprasu:9416: athāpi syāt- naiva hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpam,
SA10canprasu:9422: bhāvābhāvayorapi parasparaviruddhayorekatra nirvāṇe nāsti saṃbhava iti, ataḥ,
SA10canprasu:9425: idānīṃ yathā naiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yujyate,
SA10canprasu:9428: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati // 15 //
SA10canprasu:9429: yadi hi bhāvo nāma kaścit syāt,
SA10canprasu:9430: tadā tatpratiṣedhena naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamityeṣā kalpanā,
SA10canprasu:9435: tasmānnaiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yā kalpanā,
SA10canprasu:9439: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
SA10canprasu:9440: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate // 16 //
SA10canprasu:9441: yadi etannirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvarūpaṃ naiva bhāvarūpamastīti kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:9442: kena tadānīṃ taditthaṃvidhaṃ nobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇamastīti ajyate gṛhyate prakāśate vā?
SA10canprasu:9443: kiṃ tatra nirvāṇe kaścidevaṃvidhaḥ pratipattāsti, atha nāsti?
SA10canprasu:9444: yadi asti, evaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pi tavātmā syāt /
SA10canprasu:9461: kathaṃ tenāvidyamānasvarūpeṇa naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:9463: tasmānna kenacinnirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvo naiva bhāva ityajyate /
SA10canprasu:9465: sarvathā yathā ca nirvāṇe etāścatasraḥ kalpanā na saṃbhavanti,
SA10canprasu:9466: evaṃ nirvāṇādhigantaryapi tathāgate etāḥ kalpanā naiva saṃbhavantīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:9468: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:9471: nāstīti vā kalpayan sa nirvṛtasya vikalpayet /
SA10canprasu:9472: evaṃ tāvat paraṃ nirodhādbhavati tathāgato na bhavati ceti nohyate /
SA10canprasu:9475: na ca kevalaṃ paraṃ nirodhāccaturbhiḥ prakārairbhagavānnohyate, api ca-
SA10canprasu:9478: yathā nājyaṃ na cohyaṃ tathā tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ pratipāditam // 18 //
SA10canprasu:9484: ata eva saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ parasparato nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:9486: yaccāpīdamuktaṃ bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti,
SA10canprasu:9491: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10canprasu:9493: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya nirvāṇenāviśiṣṭatvāt pūrvāparakoṭikalpanā na saṃbhavati, yā apyetāḥ-
SA10canprasu:9498: tatra paraṃ nirodhādityanenopalakṣaṇena catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ parigṛhyante /
SA10canprasu:9501: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA10canprasu:9502: naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi /
SA10canprasu:9510: tatra ātmano lokasya vā anāgatamutpādamapaśyan antavān loka ityevaṃ kalpayan aparāntamālambya pravartate/
SA10canprasu:9511: evamanāgatamutpādaṃ paśyan anantavān loka ioti pravartate/
SA10canprasu:9519: tatra ātmano lokasya vā atītamutpādaṃ paśyan śāśvato loka iti pratipadyate,
SA10canprasu:9522: naiva paśyannaivāpaśyan naivaśāśvato nāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate pūrvāntamāaśritya /
SA10canprasu:9530: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ // 23 //
SA10canprasu:9531: caturdaśāpyetāni avyākṛtavastūni asati bhāvasvarūpe naiva yujyante/
SA10canprasu:9532: yastu bhāvasvarūpamadhyāropya tadvigamāvigamataḥ etā dṛṣṭīrutpādya abhiniviśate,
SA10canprasu:9535: atrāha- yadi evaṃ bhavatā nirvāṇamapi pratiṣiddham,
SA10canprasu:9536_0: nanu ca ya eṣa bhavagatā anantacaritasattvarāśyanuvartakena viditāviparītasakalajagadāśayasvabhāvena
SA10canprasu:9537: sa evaṃ sati vyartha eva jāyate/
SA10canprasu:9538: ucyate- yadi kaściddharmo nāma svabhāvarūpataḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:9540: kaścidvā deśitā buddho bhagavānnāma bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:9545: iha hi sarveṣāṃ prapañcānāṃ nimittānāṃ ya upaśamo 'pravṛttistannirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:9551_0: yadā caivaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvaprapañcopaśāntarūpe nirvāṇe śive 'sthānayogena
SA10canprasu:9551_1: nabhasīva haṃsarājāḥ sthitāḥ svapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapakṣapātavāte vātagagane vā gaganasyākiṃcanatvāt,
SA10canprasu:9552: tadā sarvanimittānupalambhānna kvaciddeveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā na kasyaciddevasya vā manuṣyasya vā na kaściddharmaḥ sāṃkleśiko vā vaiyavadāniko vā deśita iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:9553: yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre- “yāṃ ca rātriṃ śāntamate tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:9555: atrāntare tathāgatenaikamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na vyāhṛtaṃ nāpi pravyāharati nāpi pravyāhariṣyati /
SA10canprasu:9556: atha ca yathādhimuktāḥ sarvasattvā nānādhātvāśayāstāṃ tāṃ vividhāṃ tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti /
SA10canprasu:9557: teṣāmevaṃ pṛthak pṛthagbhavati- ayaṃ bhagavānasmabhyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
SA10canprasu:9559: tatra tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
SA10canprasu:9564: ya evaṃ jānati dharmān kumāro buddha socyate //
SA10canprasu:9565: yadi tarhyevaṃ na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:9566: tatkathamime ete vicitrāḥ pravacanavyavahārāḥ prajñāyante? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:9567: avidyānidrānugatānāṃ dehināṃ svapnāyamānānāmiva svavikalpābhyudaya eṣaḥ- ayaṃ bhagavān sakalatribhuvanasurāsuranaranāthaḥ imaṃ dharmamasmabhyaṃ deśayatīti /
SA10canprasu:9569: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
SA10canprasu:9570: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // iti /
SA10canprasu:9573: tataśca nirvāṇārthaṃ dharmadeśanāyā abhāvāt kuto dharmadeśanāyāḥ sadbhāvena nirvāṇasyāstitvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:9578: tathā- na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:9580: nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām /
SA10canprasu:9581: tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ kṣīrātsarpiḥ /
SA10canprasu:9582: atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi /
SA10canprasu:9583: na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti,
SA10canprasu:9585: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:9596: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // iti,
SA10canprasu:9601: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamo yathābhūtārthapracchādakaṃ stimitatā /
SA10canprasu:9602: avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhavārthaṃ punarbhavotpattyarthamabhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśalādicetanāviśeṣāṃste punarbhavābhisaṃskārāt saṃskārāḥ /
SA10canprasu:9603: te ca trividhāḥ- kuśalā akuśalā ānejyāśca,
SA10canprasu:9606: taiśca saṃskārairabhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karmasaṃjñitaiḥ taddhetukāṃ gatiṃ gacchati // 1 //
SA10canprasu:9609: kṛtopacitasaṃskārasyāsya pudgalasya saṃskārānurūpāyāṃ gatau devādikāyāṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsārānarthabījabhūtam /
SA10canprasu:9617: idaṃ ca rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ ca nāma,
SA10canprasu:9619_1: skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasminneva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyenaiva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ (Pp_239)
SA10canprasu:9625: tathā samānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:9626: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:9627: na tu punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvarūpavicakṣaṇānāmevaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate sāhacaryāditvamekakṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmadṛṣṭānteneti /
SA10canprasu:9628: janmonmukhaṃ na sadidaṃ yadi jāyamānaṃnāśonmukhaṃ sadapi nāma nirudhyamānam /
SA10canprasu:9629: iṣṭaṃ tadā kathamidaṃ tulayā samānaṃ kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā //
SA10canprasu:9632: tathā anyasyāpi bhāvasya utpādasamanantaradhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na yuktam /
SA10canprasu:9633: yataḥ jātijarāsthityanityatākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasminneva kṣaṇe bhavantītyabhidharmapāṭhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9634: tatra jātijarayoḥ parasparavirodhāt sthityanityatayośca ekasminneva bhāve na yugapatsaṃbhava iṣyate sadbhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:9642: na ca jātimaraṇayoḥ parasparabhinnalakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavo bhavet,
SA10canprasu:9650: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
SA10canprasu:9652: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
SA10canprasu:9654: iti pratiṣedhāt kutaḥ samānakālatā bhāvānāṃ maraṇabhavopapattibhavayoriti?
SA10canprasu:9656: tena naikasminneva kṣaṇe nāmonnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāmonnāmayoḥ kālabhedāt /
SA10canprasu:9659: tathāpi atra utpalapatraśatasahasravedhaḥ sūcyagreṇa kramaśo vedho 'vaseyaḥ kṣaṇānāmatisūkṣmatvāt /
SA10canprasu:9665: iti pāṭhādutpādanirodhayorasaṃbhava eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake /
SA10canprasu:9670: sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:9676: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9679: ataḥ phenapiṇḍādīnāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya pratītya samutpannānāṃ sāravastuvigatānāṃ kutaḥ kṣaṇikākṣaṇikacinteti?
SA10canprasu:9681: supinopamā bhavagatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate /
SA10canprasu:9683: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato //
SA10canprasu:9684: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:9685: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
SA10canprasu:9686: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ svaputra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃca paśyati /
SA10canprasu:9687: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:9688: yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:9689: na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:9691: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra 'nucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA10canprasu:9692: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:9693: na ca anyu tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
SA10canprasu:9694: yatha muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA10canprasu:9695: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu nāsti vartanā //
SA10canprasu:9705: tadevaṃ bimbapratibimbādinyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate,
SA10canprasu:9707: yadi iha gatau vijñānaṃ na saṃmūrchitaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:9716: abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgajaṃ dvevajaṃ mohajaṃ karma karotītyādinā duḥkhotpattāvāyadvāratvaṃ ṣaṇṇāmāyatanānām /
SA10canprasu:9721: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
SA10canprasu:9725: cakṣurindriyaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāraṃ ca pratītya manaskāraṃ viṣayādivilakṣaṇaṃ samanantarapratyayaṃ vijñānabījabhūtaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA10canprasu:9729: tadevameṣāmindriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ sahotpādaḥ anyonyopakāreṇa tulyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ,
SA10canprasu:9735: yathā caiṣāṃ rūpavijñānacakṣuṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātalakṣaṇaṃ sparśamāgamya (Pp_243)
SA10canprasu:9750: sa tasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate /
SA10canprasu:9754: tasyā api nityamaparibhraṃśārthaṃ paritṛṣyate / sa evam-
SA10canprasu:9756: sa evaṃ vedanāsvabhiniviṣṭaḥ saktaḥ tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādopādānākhyaṃ caturvidhaṃ karmākṣepakāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA10canprasu:9762: caturvidhasya yathoktasya upādānasya upādātā grahītā utpādayitā /
SA10canprasu:9765: yasmāt, yo hi anutpāditavedanātṛṣṇaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena tṛṣṇāmasvīkurvan,
SA10canprasu:9766: caturvidhamupādānaṃ pravihāya upādātā amalādvayajñānasaṃmukhībhāvāt syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta saḥ /
SA10canprasu:9772: trividhamapi kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasikaṃ ca karma bhavatyasmādanāgataṃ skandha pañcakaṃ bhavaḥ iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:9773: tatra kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma rūpaskandhasvabhāvaṃ karmavijñaptitvāt /
SA10canprasu:9775: evaṃ sa bhavaḥ pañca skandhā iti vijñeyam / tasmāt-
SA10canprasu:9786: mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sāmiṣaṅgo hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9801: tatra saṃsārasya vijñānādipravṛttilakṣaṇasya mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃskārāḥ /
SA10canprasu:9803: avidyānugato yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣavaḥ puṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti,
SA10canprasu:9811: tattvadarśanāt tattvadarśane hi sarvapadārthanāmevānupalambhāt nāsti kiṃcid yadālambya karma kuryāditi // 10 //
SA10canprasu:9822: sa eva svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatīrṇo na kiṃcidvastu upalabhate bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:9832: pūrvasya pūrvasya aṅgasya nirodhena utarasyottarasya aṅgasya nirodho bhavatīti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:9833: anayā cānupūrvyā ayaṃ yogī ātmātmīyādyadarśanāyāsanirastaḥ kārakavedakavirahitaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyaṃ duḥkharāśiṃ punaranutpattyā samyaṅnirodhayati /
SA10canprasu:9850: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA10canprasu:9857: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA10canprasu:9859: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇābhinirvṛtti rbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9865: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9877: yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam,
SA10canprasu:9883: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA10canprasu:9889: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamemiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
SA10canprasu:9890: atha ca punaḥ satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpatti rbhavati /
SA10canprasu:9891: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
SA10canprasu:9893: na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit //
SA10canprasu:9895_0: yā eṣāmevaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāyamaiksaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
SA10canprasu:9919: ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti //
SA10canprasu:9938: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
SA10canprasu:9939: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:9943: vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vedanādayo 'rūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhāstatra tatra bhave nāmayantīti nāma /
SA10canprasu:9944: saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate /
SA10canprasu:9949: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA10canprasu:9951: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
SA10canprasu:9953: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam /
SA10canprasu:9956: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
SA10canprasu:9961_1: nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno
SA10canprasu:9961_2: nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo
SA10canprasu:9963: atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA10canprasu:9965: yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:9974: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:9975: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti /
SA10canprasu:9976: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
SA10canprasu:9978: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati /
SA10canprasu:9980: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9983_0: anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati
SA10canprasu:9986: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
SA10canprasu:9996: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:9997: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:9998: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti /
SA10canprasu:9999: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:10006: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate,
SA10canprasu:10012: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate,
SA10canprasu:10013: na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
SA10canprasu:10018_1: mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
SA10canprasu:10025: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA10canprasu:10027: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA10canprasu:10030: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu /
SA10canprasu:10032: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat /
SA10canprasu:10046: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:10058: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:10062: pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate /
SA10canprasu:10063: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
SA10canprasu:10078: tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate,
SA10canprasu:10084: athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ- yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā /
SA10canprasu:10086: ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā,
SA10canprasu:10089: ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ // 1 //
SA10canprasu:10092: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:10098: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
SA10canprasu:10105: bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca, naiva (Pp_250)
SA10canprasu:10108: kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha /
SA10canprasu:10109: kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
SA10canprasu:10110: tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10canprasu:10111: kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10canprasu:10113: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ,
SA10canprasu:10116: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:10117: tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva,
SA10canprasu:10123: iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ evaṃkalpayet- ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti,
SA10canprasu:10125: kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:10126: yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre- ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti,
SA10canprasu:10129: ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate /
SA10canprasu:10130: yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10135: yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10136: tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva /
SA10canprasu:10138: kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca /
SA10canprasu:10139: tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate //
SA10canprasu:10147: na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam- ayamasāvātmā,
SA10canprasu:10151: yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate,
SA10canprasu:10152: tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmāviśeṣa iti na śakyate kalpayitum // 4 //
SA10canprasu:10159: yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:10164: na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca /
SA10canprasu:10165: ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum,
SA10canprasu:10178: na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:10182: kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta eva ātmā bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:10186: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate // 7 //
SA10canprasu:10198: atha syāt- yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:10201: sa hi anyo 'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:10208: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate /
SA10canprasu:10209: kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:10213: ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate // 8 //
SA10canprasu:10215: idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:10217: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam // 9 //
SA10canprasu:10218: yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano 'nyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10222: yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10224: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:10225: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ // 10 //
SA10canprasu:10226: yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10227: tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:10229: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10230: tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne 'pi anirodhaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:10233: tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti /
SA10canprasu:10236: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet / iti,
SA10canprasu:10247: iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:10250: atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:10251: tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt / tataśca-
SA10canprasu:10254: api ca / yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10259: iti / yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10263: vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta?
SA10canprasu:10264: kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva,
SA10canprasu:10271: pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:10273: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannābhyupeyam /
SA10canprasu:10280: evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ,
SA10canprasu:10285: ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:10288: tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya pratiṣedhamāha-
SA10canprasu:10294: aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam //
SA10canprasu:10298: aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam //
SA10canprasu:10301: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:10302: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:10303: iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati /
SA10canprasu:10304: tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10306: na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti /
SA10canprasu:10317: idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:10320: yadi hi anyo devo 'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10321: tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:10325: tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati,
SA10canprasu:10326: evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt /
SA10canprasu:10331: asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti /
SA10canprasu:10332: tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:10337: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:10338: yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt,
SA10canprasu:10342: etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10344: tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:10355: atha syāt- anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:10357: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti /
SA10canprasu:10362: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ // 19 //
SA10canprasu:10363: yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10364: tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kvacid gamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:10368: na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kvacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:10371: tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:10372: saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet?
SA10canprasu:10375: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti,
SA10canprasu:10381: yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:10384: tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati // 20 //
SA10canprasu:10387: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:10391: tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:10397: idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:10412: atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ,
SA10canprasu:10413: tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto 'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt /
SA10canprasu:10414: yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante,
SA10canprasu:10425: ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate // 25 //
SA10canprasu:10426: kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:10428: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate // 26 //
SA10canprasu:10429: iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:10431: tatra yadi tāvadupādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:10436: naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:10440: sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:10444: ata evāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
SA10canprasu:10445: athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet,
SA10canprasu:10447: na caitadiṣyate ityāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
SA10canprasu:10449: idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:10453: tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:10457: ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi // 28 //
SA10canprasu:10458_0: evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ
SA10canprasu:10462: iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:10463: tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti,
SA10canprasu:10465: tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:10466: katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:10467: kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambananimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:10469: śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti,
SA10canprasu:10475: asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ // 29 //
SA10canprasu:10486_0: prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ
SA10canprasu:10491_0: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ
SA10canprasu:10491_2: paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato 'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ,
SA10canprasu:10497: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, (Pp_259)
SA10canprasu:10501: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvidaṃ kathaṃ nvidaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ ayaṃ sattvaḥ kutaṃ āgataḥ,
SA10canprasu:10502_0: sa itaścyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyatīti yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthagloke dṛṣṭigatāni
SA10canprasu:10503: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi //
SA10canprasu:10504: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ,
SA10canprasu:10506: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
